Verses.Text: Indeed, those who relapse ˹into disbelief˺ after ˹true˺ guidance has become clear to them, ˹it is˺ Satan ˹that˺ has tempted them, luring them with false hopes.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱرۡتَدُّواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَدۡبَٰرِهِم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَى ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ سَوَّلَ لَهُمۡ وَأَمۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ

Verses.Text: That is because they said ˹privately˺ to those who ˹also˺ detest what Allah has revealed, “We will obey you in some matters.” But Allah ˹fully˺ knows what they are hiding.
Verses.Arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَالُواْ لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُواْ مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمۡ فِي بَعۡضِ ٱلۡأَمۡرِۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِسۡرَارَهُمۡ

Verses.Text: Then how ˹horrible˺ will it be when the angels take their souls, beating their faces and backs!
Verses.Arabic: فَكَيۡفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتۡهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَضۡرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمۡ وَأَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ

Verses.Text: This is because they follow whatever displeases Allah and hate whatever pleases Him, so He has rendered their deeds void.
Verses.Arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱتَّبَعُواْ مَآ أَسۡخَطَ ٱللَّهَ وَكَرِهُواْ رِضۡوَٰنَهُۥ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

Verses.Text: Or do those with sickness in their hearts think that Allah will not ˹be able to˺ expose their malice?
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ أَن لَّن يُخۡرِجَ ٱللَّهُ أَضۡغَٰنَهُمۡ

Verses.Text: Had We willed, We could have truly shown them to you ˹O Prophet˺, and you would have certainly recognized them by their appearance. But you will surely recognize them by their tone of speech. And Allah ˹fully˺ knows your doings ˹O people˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَأَرَيۡنَٰكَهُمۡ فَلَعَرَفۡتَهُم بِسِيمَٰهُمۡۚ وَلَتَعۡرِفَنَّهُمۡ فِي لَحۡنِ ٱلۡقَوۡلِۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

Verses.Text: We will certainly test you ˹believers˺ until We prove those of you who ˹truly˺ struggle ˹in Allah’s cause˺ and remain steadfast, and reveal how you conduct yourselves.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَنَبۡلُوَنَّكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ نَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡمُجَٰهِدِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ وَنَبۡلُوَاْ أَخۡبَارَكُمۡ

Verses.Text: Indeed, those who disbelieve, hinder ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah, and defy the Messenger after ˹true˺ guidance has become clear to them; they will not harm Allah in the least, but He will render their deeds void.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَشَآقُّواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ لَن يَضُرُّواْ ٱللَّهَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَسَيُحۡبِطُ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

Verses.Text: O believers! Obey Allah and obey the Messenger, and do not let your deeds be in vain.
Verses.Arabic: ۞يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَلَا تُبۡطِلُوٓاْ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

Verses.Text: Surely those who disbelieve, hinder ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah, and then die as disbelievers; Allah will never forgive them.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ مَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ كُفَّارٞ فَلَن يَغۡفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ

Verses.Text: So do not falter or cry for peace, for you will have the upper hand and Allah is with you. And He will never let your deeds go to waste.
Verses.Arabic: فَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَتَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّلۡمِ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَكُمۡ وَلَن يَتِرَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

Verses.Text: This worldly life is no more than play and amusement. But if you are faithful and mindful ˹of Allah˺, He will grant you your ˹full˺ reward, and will not ask you ˹to donate all˺ your wealth.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا لَعِبٞ وَلَهۡوٞۚ وَإِن تُؤۡمِنُواْ وَتَتَّقُواْ يُؤۡتِكُمۡ أُجُورَكُمۡ وَلَا يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلَكُمۡ

Verses.Text: If He were to do so and pressure you, you would withhold and He would bring out your resentment.
Verses.Arabic: إِن يَسۡـَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَبۡخَلُواْ وَيُخۡرِجۡ أَضۡغَٰنَكُمۡ

Verses.Text: Here you are, being invited to donate ˹a little˺ in the cause of Allah. Still some of you withhold. And whoever does so, it is only to their own loss. For Allah is the Self-Sufficient, whereas you stand in need ˹of Him˺. If you ˹still˺ turn away, He will replace you with another people. And they will not be like you.
Verses.Arabic: هَـٰٓأَنتُمۡ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ تُدۡعَوۡنَ لِتُنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَمِنكُم مَّن يَبۡخَلُۖ وَمَن يَبۡخَلۡ فَإِنَّمَا يَبۡخَلُ عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦۚ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡفُقَرَآءُۚ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ يَسۡتَبۡدِلۡ قَوۡمًا غَيۡرَكُمۡ ثُمَّ لَا يَكُونُوٓاْ أَمۡثَٰلَكُم

Verses.Text: Indeed, We have granted you a clear triumph ˹O Prophet˺
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّا فَتَحۡنَا لَكَ فَتۡحٗا مُّبِينٗا

Verses.Text: so that Allah may forgive you for your past and future shortcomings, perfect His favour upon you, guide you along the Straight Path,
Verses.Arabic: لِّيَغۡفِرَ لَكَ ٱللَّهُ مَا تَقَدَّمَ مِن ذَنۢبِكَ وَمَا تَأَخَّرَ وَيُتِمَّ نِعۡمَتَهُۥ عَلَيۡكَ وَيَهۡدِيَكَ صِرَٰطٗا مُّسۡتَقِيمٗا

Verses.Text: and so that Allah will help you tremendously.
Verses.Arabic: وَيَنصُرَكَ ٱللَّهُ نَصۡرًا عَزِيزًا

Verses.Text: He is the One Who sent down serenity upon the hearts of the believers so that they may increase even more in their faith. To Allah ˹alone˺ belong the forces of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
Verses.Arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ ٱلسَّكِينَةَ فِي قُلُوبِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ لِيَزۡدَادُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنٗا مَّعَ إِيمَٰنِهِمۡۗ وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

Verses.Text: So He may admit believing men and women into Gardens under which rivers flow—to stay there forever—and absolve them of their sins. And that is a supreme achievement in the sight of Allah.
Verses.Arabic: لِّيُدۡخِلَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَيُكَفِّرَ عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمۡۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ فَوۡزًا عَظِيمٗا

Verses.Text: Also ˹so that˺ He may punish hypocrite men and women and polytheistic men and women, who harbour evil thoughts of Allah. May ill-fate befall them! Allah is displeased with them. He has condemned them and prepared for them Hell. What an evil destination!
Verses.Arabic: وَيُعَذِّبَ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكَٰتِ ٱلظَّآنِّينَ بِٱللَّهِ ظَنَّ ٱلسَّوۡءِۚ عَلَيۡهِمۡ دَآئِرَةُ ٱلسَّوۡءِۖ وَغَضِبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَعَنَهُمۡ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَسَآءَتۡ مَصِيرٗا

Verses.Text: To Allah ˹alone˺ belong the forces of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Almighty, All-Wise.
Verses.Arabic: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا

Verses.Text: Indeed, ˹O Prophet,˺ We have sent you as a witness, a deliverer of good news, and a warner,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ شَٰهِدٗا وَمُبَشِّرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا

Verses.Text: so that you ˹believers˺ may have faith in Allah and His Messenger, support and honour him, and glorify Allah morning and evening.
Verses.Arabic: لِّتُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَتُعَزِّرُوهُ وَتُوَقِّرُوهُۚ وَتُسَبِّحُوهُ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلًا

Verses.Text: Surely those who pledge allegiance to you ˹O Prophet˺ are actually pledging allegiance to Allah. Allah’s Hand is over theirs. Whoever breaks their pledge, it will only be to their own loss. And whoever fulfils their pledge to Allah, He will grant them a great reward.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَايِعُونَكَ إِنَّمَا يُبَايِعُونَ ٱللَّهَ يَدُ ٱللَّهِ فَوۡقَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ فَمَن نَّكَثَ فَإِنَّمَا يَنكُثُ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِمَا عَٰهَدَ عَلَيۡهُ ٱللَّهَ فَسَيُؤۡتِيهِ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

Verses.Text: The nomadic Arabs, who stayed behind, will say to you ˹O Prophet˺, “We were preoccupied with our wealth and families, so ask for forgiveness for us.” They say with their tongues what is not in their hearts. Say, “Who then can stand between you and Allah in any way, if He intends harm or benefit for you? In fact, Allah is All-Aware of what you do.
Verses.Arabic: سَيَقُولُ لَكَ ٱلۡمُخَلَّفُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ شَغَلَتۡنَآ أَمۡوَٰلُنَا وَأَهۡلُونَا فَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَنَاۚ يَقُولُونَ بِأَلۡسِنَتِهِم مَّا لَيۡسَ فِي قُلُوبِهِمۡۚ قُلۡ فَمَن يَمۡلِكُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔا إِنۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ ضَرًّا أَوۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ نَفۡعَۢاۚ بَلۡ كَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرَۢا

Verses.Text: The truth is: you thought that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families again. And that was made appealing in your hearts. You harboured evil thoughts ˹about Allah˺, and ˹so˺ became a doomed people.”
Verses.Arabic: بَلۡ ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن لَّن يَنقَلِبَ ٱلرَّسُولُ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِيهِمۡ أَبَدٗا وَزُيِّنَ ذَٰلِكَ فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡ وَظَنَنتُمۡ ظَنَّ ٱلسَّوۡءِ وَكُنتُمۡ قَوۡمَۢا بُورٗا

Verses.Text: And whoever does not believe in Allah and His Messenger, then We surely have prepared for the disbelievers a blazing Fire.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَن لَّمۡ يُؤۡمِنۢ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ فَإِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ سَعِيرٗا

Verses.Text: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. He forgives whoever He wills, and punishes whoever He wills. And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Verses.Arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ يَغۡفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

Verses.Text: Those who stayed behind will say, when you ˹believers˺ set out to take the spoils of war, “Let us accompany you.” They wish to change Allah’s promise. Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “You will not accompany us. This is what Allah has said before.” They will then say, “In fact, you are driven by jealousy against us!” The truth is: they can hardly comprehend.
Verses.Arabic: سَيَقُولُ ٱلۡمُخَلَّفُونَ إِذَا ٱنطَلَقۡتُمۡ إِلَىٰ مَغَانِمَ لِتَأۡخُذُوهَا ذَرُونَا نَتَّبِعۡكُمۡۖ يُرِيدُونَ أَن يُبَدِّلُواْ كَلَٰمَ ٱللَّهِۚ قُل لَّن تَتَّبِعُونَا كَذَٰلِكُمۡ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ مِن قَبۡلُۖ فَسَيَقُولُونَ بَلۡ تَحۡسُدُونَنَاۚ بَلۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا

Verses.Text: Say to nomadic Arabs, who stayed behind, “You will be called ˹to fight˺ against a people of great might, who you will fight unless they submit. If you then obey, Allah will grant you a fine reward. But if you turn away as you did before, He will inflict upon you a painful punishment.”
Verses.Arabic: قُل لِّلۡمُخَلَّفِينَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابِ سَتُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٍ أُوْلِي بَأۡسٖ شَدِيدٖ تُقَٰتِلُونَهُمۡ أَوۡ يُسۡلِمُونَۖ فَإِن تُطِيعُواْ يُؤۡتِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ أَجۡرًا حَسَنٗاۖ وَإِن تَتَوَلَّوۡاْ كَمَا تَوَلَّيۡتُم مِّن قَبۡلُ يُعَذِّبۡكُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا

Verses.Text: There is no blame on the blind, or the disabled, or the sick ˹for staying behind˺. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger will be admitted by Him into Gardens under which rivers flow. But whoever turns away will be subjected by Him to a painful punishment.
Verses.Arabic: لَّيۡسَ عَلَى ٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ حَرَجٞ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَعۡرَجِ حَرَجٞ وَلَا عَلَى ٱلۡمَرِيضِ حَرَجٞۗ وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ يُدۡخِلۡهُ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۖ وَمَن يَتَوَلَّ يُعَذِّبۡهُ عَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا

Verses.Text: Indeed, Allah was pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you ˹O Prophet˺ under the tree. He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down serenity upon them and rewarded them with a victory at hand,
Verses.Arabic: ۞لَّقَدۡ رَضِيَ ٱللَّهُ عَنِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ إِذۡ يُبَايِعُونَكَ تَحۡتَ ٱلشَّجَرَةِ فَعَلِمَ مَا فِي قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَأَنزَلَ ٱلسَّكِينَةَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَأَثَٰبَهُمۡ فَتۡحٗا قَرِيبٗا

Verses.Text: and many spoils of war they will gain. For Allah is Almighty, All-Wise.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةٗ يَأۡخُذُونَهَاۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

Verses.Text: Allah has promised you ˹believers˺ abundant spoils, which you will gain, so He hastened this ˹truce˺ for you. And He has held people’s hands back from ˹harming˺ you, so it may be a sign for the believers, and so He may guide you along the Straight Path.
Verses.Arabic: وَعَدَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ مَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةٗ تَأۡخُذُونَهَا فَعَجَّلَ لَكُمۡ هَٰذِهِۦ وَكَفَّ أَيۡدِيَ ٱلنَّاسِ عَنكُمۡ وَلِتَكُونَ ءَايَةٗ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَيَهۡدِيَكُمۡ صِرَٰطٗا مُّسۡتَقِيمٗا

Verses.Text: And ˹there are˺ other gains which are beyond your reach that Allah is keeping in store ˹for you˺. For Allah is Most Capable of everything.
Verses.Arabic: وَأُخۡرَىٰ لَمۡ تَقۡدِرُواْ عَلَيۡهَا قَدۡ أَحَاطَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَاۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٗا

Verses.Text: If the disbelievers were to fight you, they would certainly flee. Then they would never find any protector or helper.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَوۡ قَٰتَلَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوَلَّوُاْ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

Verses.Text: ˹This is˺ Allah’s way, already long established ˹in the past˺. And you will find no change in Allah’s way.
Verses.Arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

Verses.Text: He is the One Who held back their hands from you and your hands from them in the valley of ˹Ḥudaibiyah, near˺ Mecca, after giving you the upper hand over ˹a group of˺ them. And Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.
Verses.Arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي كَفَّ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ عَنكُمۡ وَأَيۡدِيَكُمۡ عَنۡهُم بِبَطۡنِ مَكَّةَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَنۡ أَظۡفَرَكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا

Verses.Text: They are the ones who persisted in disbelief and hindered you from the Sacred Mosque, preventing the sacrificial animals from reaching their destination. ˹We would have let you march through Mecca,˺ had there not been believing men and women, unknown to you. You might have trampled them underfoot, incurring guilt for ˹what you did to˺ them unknowingly. That was so Allah may admit into His mercy whoever He wills. Had those ˹unknown˺ believers stood apart, We would have certainly inflicted a painful punishment on the disbelievers.
Verses.Arabic: هُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّوكُمۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدِ ٱلۡحَرَامِ وَٱلۡهَدۡيَ مَعۡكُوفًا أَن يَبۡلُغَ مَحِلَّهُۥۚ وَلَوۡلَا رِجَالٞ مُّؤۡمِنُونَ وَنِسَآءٞ مُّؤۡمِنَٰتٞ لَّمۡ تَعۡلَمُوهُمۡ أَن تَطَـُٔوهُمۡ فَتُصِيبَكُم مِّنۡهُم مَّعَرَّةُۢ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖۖ لِّيُدۡخِلَ ٱللَّهُ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُۚ لَوۡ تَزَيَّلُواْ لَعَذَّبۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

Verses.Text: ˹Remember˺ when the disbelievers had filled their hearts with pride—the pride of ˹pre-Islamic˺ ignorance—then Allah sent down His serenity upon His Messenger and the believers, inspiring them to uphold the declaration of faith, for they were better entitled and more worthy of it. And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.
Verses.Arabic: إِذۡ جَعَلَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي قُلُوبِهِمُ ٱلۡحَمِيَّةَ حَمِيَّةَ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِيَّةِ فَأَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ وَعَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَأَلۡزَمَهُمۡ كَلِمَةَ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ وَكَانُوٓاْ أَحَقَّ بِهَا وَأَهۡلَهَاۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٗا

Verses.Text: Indeed, Allah will fulfil His Messenger’s vision in all truth: Allah willing, you will surely enter the Sacred Mosque, in security—˹some with˺ heads shaved and ˹others with˺ hair shortened—without fear. He knew what you did not know, so He first granted you the triumph at hand.
Verses.Arabic: لَّقَدۡ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُ رَسُولَهُ ٱلرُّءۡيَا بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ لَتَدۡخُلُنَّ ٱلۡمَسۡجِدَ ٱلۡحَرَامَ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ءَامِنِينَ مُحَلِّقِينَ رُءُوسَكُمۡ وَمُقَصِّرِينَ لَا تَخَافُونَۖ فَعَلِمَ مَا لَمۡ تَعۡلَمُواْ فَجَعَلَ مِن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ فَتۡحٗا قَرِيبًا

Verses.Text: He is the One Who has sent His Messenger with ˹right˺ guidance and the religion of truth, making it prevail over all others. And sufficient is Allah as a Witness.
Verses.Arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ رَسُولَهُۥ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ ٱلۡحَقِّ لِيُظۡهِرَهُۥ عَلَى ٱلدِّينِ كُلِّهِۦۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدٗا

Verses.Text: Muḥammad is the Messenger of Allah. And those with him are firm with the disbelievers and compassionate with one another. You see them bowing and prostrating ˹in prayer˺, seeking Allah’s bounty and pleasure. The sign ˹of brightness can be seen˺ on their faces from the trace of prostrating ˹in prayer˺. This is their description in the Torah. And their parable in the Gospel is that of a seed that sprouts its ˹tiny˺ branches, making it strong. Then it becomes thick, standing firmly on its stem, to the delight of the planters—in this way Allah makes the believers a source of dismay for the disbelievers. To those of them who believe and do good, Allah has promised forgiveness and a great reward.
Verses.Arabic: مُّحَمَّدٞ رَّسُولُ ٱللَّهِۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥٓ أَشِدَّآءُ عَلَى ٱلۡكُفَّارِ رُحَمَآءُ بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ تَرَىٰهُمۡ رُكَّعٗا سُجَّدٗا يَبۡتَغُونَ فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِضۡوَٰنٗاۖ سِيمَاهُمۡ فِي وُجُوهِهِم مِّنۡ أَثَرِ ٱلسُّجُودِۚ ذَٰلِكَ مَثَلُهُمۡ فِي ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِۚ وَمَثَلُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡإِنجِيلِ كَزَرۡعٍ أَخۡرَجَ شَطۡـَٔهُۥ فَـَٔازَرَهُۥ فَٱسۡتَغۡلَظَ فَٱسۡتَوَىٰ عَلَىٰ سُوقِهِۦ يُعۡجِبُ ٱلزُّرَّاعَ لِيَغِيظَ بِهِمُ ٱلۡكُفَّارَۗ وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ مِنۡهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٗ وَأَجۡرًا عَظِيمَۢا

Verses.Text: O believers! Do not proceed ˹in any matter˺ before ˹a decree from˺ Allah and His Messenger. And fear Allah. Surely Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.
Verses.Arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تُقَدِّمُواْ بَيۡنَ يَدَيِ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

Verses.Text: O believers! Do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet, nor speak loudly to him as you do to one another, or your deeds will become void while you are unaware.
Verses.Arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَرۡفَعُوٓاْ أَصۡوَٰتَكُمۡ فَوۡقَ صَوۡتِ ٱلنَّبِيِّ وَلَا تَجۡهَرُواْ لَهُۥ بِٱلۡقَوۡلِ كَجَهۡرِ بَعۡضِكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ أَن تَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلُكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تَشۡعُرُونَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, those who lower their voices in the presence of Allah’s Messenger are the ones whose hearts Allah has refined for righteousness. They will have forgiveness and a great reward.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَغُضُّونَ أَصۡوَٰتَهُمۡ عِندَ رَسُولِ ٱللَّهِ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱمۡتَحَنَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمۡ لِلتَّقۡوَىٰۚ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٌ

Verses.Text: Indeed, most of those who call out to you ˹O Prophet˺ from outside ˹your˺ private quarters have no understanding ˹of manners˺.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَآءِ ٱلۡحُجُرَٰتِ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

Verses.Text: Had they been patient until you could come out to them, it would have certainly been better for them. And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ صَبَرُواْ حَتَّىٰ تَخۡرُجَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لَكَانَ خَيۡرٗا لَّهُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

Verses.Text: O believers, if an evildoer brings you any news, verify ˹it˺ so you do not harm people unknowingly, becoming regretful for what you have done.
Verses.Arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن جَآءَكُمۡ فَاسِقُۢ بِنَبَإٖ فَتَبَيَّنُوٓاْ أَن تُصِيبُواْ قَوۡمَۢا بِجَهَٰلَةٖ فَتُصۡبِحُواْ عَلَىٰ مَا فَعَلۡتُمۡ نَٰدِمِينَ

Verses.Text: And keep in mind that Allah’s Messenger is ˹still˺ in your midst. If he were to yield to you in many matters, you would surely suffer ˹the consequences˺. But Allah has endeared faith to you, making it appealing in your hearts. And He has made disbelief, rebelliousness, and disobedience detestable to you. Those are the ones rightly guided.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ فِيكُمۡ رَسُولَ ٱللَّهِۚ لَوۡ يُطِيعُكُمۡ فِي كَثِيرٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ لَعَنِتُّمۡ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ حَبَّبَ إِلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنَ وَزَيَّنَهُۥ فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡ وَكَرَّهَ إِلَيۡكُمُ ٱلۡكُفۡرَ وَٱلۡفُسُوقَ وَٱلۡعِصۡيَانَۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلرَّـٰشِدُونَ

Verses.Text: ˹This is˺ a bounty and a blessing from Allah. And Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
Verses.Arabic: فَضۡلٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَنِعۡمَةٗۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

Verses.Text: And if two groups of believers fight each other, then make peace between them. But if one of them transgresses against the other, then fight against the transgressing group until they ˹are willing to˺ submit to the rule of Allah. If they do so, then make peace between both ˹groups˺ in all fairness and act justly. Surely Allah loves those who uphold justice.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِن طَآئِفَتَانِ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ ٱقۡتَتَلُواْ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَهُمَاۖ فَإِنۢ بَغَتۡ إِحۡدَىٰهُمَا عَلَى ٱلۡأُخۡرَىٰ فَقَٰتِلُواْ ٱلَّتِي تَبۡغِي حَتَّىٰ تَفِيٓءَ إِلَىٰٓ أَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ فَإِن فَآءَتۡ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَهُمَا بِٱلۡعَدۡلِ وَأَقۡسِطُوٓاْۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُقۡسِطِينَ

Verses.Text: The believers are but one brotherhood, so make peace between your brothers. And be mindful of Allah so you may be shown mercy.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ إِخۡوَةٞ فَأَصۡلِحُواْ بَيۡنَ أَخَوَيۡكُمۡۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

Verses.Text: O believers! Do not let some ˹men˺ ridicule others, they may be better than them, nor let ˹some˺ women ridicule other women, they may be better than them. Do not defame one another, nor call each other by offensive nicknames. How evil it is to act rebelliously after having faith! And whoever does not repent, it is they who are the ˹true˺ wrongdoers.
Verses.Arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا يَسۡخَرۡ قَوۡمٞ مِّن قَوۡمٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونُواْ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَلَا نِسَآءٞ مِّن نِّسَآءٍ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُنَّ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُنَّۖ وَلَا تَلۡمِزُوٓاْ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَلَا تَنَابَزُواْ بِٱلۡأَلۡقَٰبِۖ بِئۡسَ ٱلِٱسۡمُ ٱلۡفُسُوقُ بَعۡدَ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنِۚ وَمَن لَّمۡ يَتُبۡ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ

Verses.Text: O  believers! Avoid many suspicions, ˹for˺ indeed, some suspicions are sinful. And do not spy, nor backbite one another. Would any of you like to eat the flesh of their dead brother? You would despise that! And fear Allah. Surely Allah is ˹the˺ Accepter of Repentance, Most Merciful.
Verses.Arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱجۡتَنِبُواْ كَثِيرٗا مِّنَ ٱلظَّنِّ إِنَّ بَعۡضَ ٱلظَّنِّ إِثۡمٞۖ وَلَا تَجَسَّسُواْ وَلَا يَغۡتَب بَّعۡضُكُم بَعۡضًاۚ أَيُحِبُّ أَحَدُكُمۡ أَن يَأۡكُلَ لَحۡمَ أَخِيهِ مَيۡتٗا فَكَرِهۡتُمُوهُۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ تَوَّابٞ رَّحِيمٞ

Verses.Text: O humanity! Indeed, We created you from a male and a female, and made you into peoples and tribes so that you may ˹get to˺ know one another. Surely the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous among you. Allah is truly All-Knowing, All-Aware.
Verses.Arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰكُم مِّن ذَكَرٖ وَأُنثَىٰ وَجَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ شُعُوبٗا وَقَبَآئِلَ لِتَعَارَفُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ أَكۡرَمَكُمۡ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ أَتۡقَىٰكُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَبِيرٞ

Verses.Text: ˹Some of˺ the nomadic Arabs say, “We believe.” Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “You have not believed. But say, ‘We have submitted,’ for faith has not yet entered your hearts. But if you obey Allah and His Messenger ˹wholeheartedly˺, He will not discount anything from ˹the reward of˺ your deeds. Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.”
Verses.Arabic: ۞قَالَتِ ٱلۡأَعۡرَابُ ءَامَنَّاۖ قُل لَّمۡ تُؤۡمِنُواْ وَلَٰكِن قُولُوٓاْ أَسۡلَمۡنَا وَلَمَّا يَدۡخُلِ ٱلۡإِيمَٰنُ فِي قُلُوبِكُمۡۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ لَا يَلِتۡكُم مِّنۡ أَعۡمَٰلِكُمۡ شَيۡـًٔاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ

Verses.Text: The ˹true˺ believers are only those who believe in Allah and His Messenger—never doubting—and strive with their wealth and their lives in the cause of Allah. They are the ones true in faith.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّمَا ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَرۡتَابُواْ وَجَٰهَدُواْ بِأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلصَّـٰدِقُونَ

Verses.Text: Say, “Do you inform Allah of your faith, when Allah ˹already˺ knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth? And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.”
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ ٱللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ

Verses.Text: They regard their acceptance of Islam as a favour to you. Tell ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Do not regard your Islam as a favour to me. Rather, it is Allah Who has done you a favour by guiding you to the faith, if ˹indeed˺ you are faithful.
Verses.Arabic: يَمُنُّونَ عَلَيۡكَ أَنۡ أَسۡلَمُواْۖ قُل لَّا تَمُنُّواْ عَلَيَّ إِسۡلَٰمَكُمۖ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ يَمُنُّ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَنۡ هَدَىٰكُمۡ لِلۡإِيمَٰنِ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

Verses.Text: Surely Allah knows the unseen of the heavens and earth. And Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.”
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ غَيۡبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

Verses.Text: Qãf. By the glorious Quran!
Verses.Arabic: قٓۚ وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ ٱلۡمَجِيدِ

Verses.Text: ˹All will be resurrected,˺ yet the deniers are astonished that a warner has come to them from among themselves ˹warning of resurrection˺. So the disbelievers say, “This is an astonishing thing!
Verses.Arabic: بَلۡ عَجِبُوٓاْ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَقَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَيۡءٌ عَجِيبٌ

Verses.Text: ˹Will we be returned to life,˺ when we are dead and reduced to dust? Such a return is impossible.”
Verses.Arabic: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابٗاۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجۡعُۢ بَعِيدٞ

Verses.Text: We certainly know what the earth consumes of them ˹after their death˺, and with us is a well-preserved Record.
Verses.Arabic: قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَٰبٌ حَفِيظُۢ

Verses.Text: In fact, they reject the truth when it has come to them, so they are in a confused state.
Verses.Arabic: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِيٓ أَمۡرٖ مَّرِيجٍ

Verses.Text: Have they not then looked at the sky above them: how We built it and adorned it ˹with stars˺, leaving it flawless?
Verses.Arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَنظُرُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَيۡفَ بَنَيۡنَٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٖ

Verses.Text: As for the earth, We spread it out and placed upon it firm mountains, and produced in it every type of pleasant plant—
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ مَدَدۡنَٰهَا وَأَلۡقَيۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ وَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجِۭ بَهِيجٖ

Verses.Text: ˹all as˺ an insight and a reminder to every servant who turns ˹to Allah˺.
Verses.Arabic: تَبۡصِرَةٗ وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبۡدٖ مُّنِيبٖ

Verses.Text: And We send down blessed rain from the sky, bringing forth gardens and grains for harvest,
Verses.Arabic: وَنَزَّلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ مُّبَٰرَكٗا فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا بِهِۦ جَنَّـٰتٖ وَحَبَّ ٱلۡحَصِيدِ

Verses.Text: and towering palm trees ˹loaded˺ with clustered fruit,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلنَّخۡلَ بَاسِقَٰتٖ لَّهَا طَلۡعٞ نَّضِيدٞ

Verses.Text: ˹as˺ a provision for ˹Our˺ servants. And with this ˹rain˺ We revive a lifeless land. Similar is the emergence ˹from the graves˺.
Verses.Arabic: رِّزۡقٗا لِّلۡعِبَادِۖ وَأَحۡيَيۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡخُرُوجُ

Verses.Text: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth,˺ as did the people of the Water-pit, Thamûd,
Verses.Arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ

Verses.Text: ’Ȃd, Pharaoh, the kinfolk of Lot,
Verses.Arabic: وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ وَإِخۡوَٰنُ لُوطٖ

Verses.Text: the residents of the Forest, and the people of Tubba’. Each rejected ˹their˺ messenger, so My warning was fulfilled.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأَيۡكَةِ وَقَوۡمُ تُبَّعٖۚ كُلّٞ كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ

Verses.Text: Were We incapable of creating ˹them˺ the first time? In fact, they are in doubt about ˹their˺ re-creation.
Verses.Arabic: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلۡخَلۡقِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي لَبۡسٖ مِّنۡ خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

Verses.Text: Indeed, ˹it is˺ We ˹Who˺ created humankind and ˹fully˺ know what their souls whisper to them, and We are closer to them than ˹their˺ jugular vein.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ وَنَعۡلَمُ مَا تُوَسۡوِسُ بِهِۦ نَفۡسُهُۥۖ وَنَحۡنُ أَقۡرَبُ إِلَيۡهِ مِنۡ حَبۡلِ ٱلۡوَرِيدِ

Verses.Text: As the two recording-angels—˹one˺ sitting to the right, and ˹the other to˺ the left—note ˹everything˺,
Verses.Arabic: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٞ

Verses.Text: not a word does a person utter without having a ˹vigilant˺ observer ready ˹to write it down˺.
Verses.Arabic: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ

Verses.Text: ˹Ultimately,˺ with the throes of death will come the truth. This is what you were trying to escape!
Verses.Arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ سَكۡرَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنۡهُ تَحِيدُ

Verses.Text: And the Trumpet will be blown. This is the Day ˹you were˺ warned of.
Verses.Arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ

Verses.Text: Each soul will come forth with an angel to drive it and another to testify.
Verses.Arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ

Verses.Text: ˹It will be said to the denier,˺ “You were totally heedless of this. Now We have lifted this veil of yours, so Today your sight is sharp!”
Verses.Arabic: لَّقَدۡ كُنتَ فِي غَفۡلَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا فَكَشَفۡنَا عَنكَ غِطَآءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ حَدِيدٞ

Verses.Text: And one’s accompanying-angel will say, “Here is the record ready with me.”
Verses.Arabic: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ

Verses.Text: ˹It will be said to both angels,˺ “Throw into Hell every stubborn disbeliever,
Verses.Arabic: أَلۡقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٖ

Verses.Text: withholder of good, transgressor, and doubter,
Verses.Arabic: مَّنَّاعٖ لِّلۡخَيۡرِ مُعۡتَدٖ مُّرِيبٍ

Verses.Text: who set up another god with Allah. So cast them into the severe punishment.”
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلۡقِيَاهُ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلشَّدِيدِ

Verses.Text: One’s ˹devilish˺ associate will say, “Our Lord! I did not make them transgress. Rather, they were far astray ˹on their own˺.”
Verses.Arabic: ۞قَالَ قَرِينُهُۥ رَبَّنَا مَآ أَطۡغَيۡتُهُۥ وَلَٰكِن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلِۭ بَعِيدٖ

Verses.Text: Allah will respond, “Do not dispute in My presence, since I had already given you a warning.
Verses.Arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخۡتَصِمُواْ لَدَيَّ وَقَدۡ قَدَّمۡتُ إِلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡوَعِيدِ

Verses.Text: My Word cannot be changed, nor am I unjust to ˹My˺ creation.”
Verses.Arabic: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّـٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

Verses.Text: ˹Beware of˺ the Day We will ask Hell, “Are you full ˹yet˺?” And it will respond, “Are there any more?”
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ ٱمۡتَلَأۡتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلۡ مِن مَّزِيدٖ

Verses.Text: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far off.
Verses.Arabic: وَأُزۡلِفَتِ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ غَيۡرَ بَعِيدٍ

Verses.Text: ˹And it will be said to them,˺ “This is what you were promised, for whoever ˹constantly˺ turned ˹to Allah˺ and kept up ˹His commandments˺—
Verses.Arabic: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٖ

Verses.Text: who were in awe of the Most Compassionate without seeing ˹Him˺, and have come with a heart turning ˹only to Him˺.
Verses.Arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ

Verses.Text: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of eternal life!”
Verses.Arabic: ٱدۡخُلُوهَا بِسَلَٰمٖۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُلُودِ

Verses.Text: There they will have whatever they desire, and with Us is ˹even˺ more.
Verses.Arabic: لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَزِيدٞ

Verses.Text: ˹Imagine˺ how many peoples We destroyed before them, who were far mightier than them. Then ˹when the torment came,˺ they ˹desperately˺ sought refuge in the land. ˹But˺ was there any escape?
Verses.Arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا فَنَقَّبُواْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ هَلۡ مِن مَّحِيصٍ

Verses.Text: Surely in this is a reminder for whoever has a ˹mindful˺ heart and lends an attentive ear.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلۡبٌ أَوۡ أَلۡقَى ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٞ

Verses.Text: Indeed, We created the heavens and the earth and everything in between in six Days, and We were not ˹even˺ touched with fatigue.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٖ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٖ

Verses.Text: So be patient ˹O Prophet˺ with what they say. And glorify the praises of your Lord before sunrise and before sunset.
Verses.Arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ قَبۡلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَقَبۡلَ ٱلۡغُرُوبِ

Verses.Text: And glorify Him during part of the night and after the prayers.
Verses.Arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡهُ وَأَدۡبَٰرَ ٱلسُّجُودِ

Verses.Text: And listen! On the Day the caller will call out from a near place,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ

Verses.Text: the Day all will hear the ˹mighty˺ Blast in ˹all˺ truth, that will be the Day of emergence ˹from the graves˺.
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ يَسۡمَعُونَ ٱلصَّيۡحَةَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡخُرُوجِ

Verses.Text: It is certainly We Who give life and cause death. And to Us is the final return.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيۡنَا ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

Verses.Text: ˹Beware of˺ the Day the earth will split open, letting them rush forth. That will be an easy gathering for Us.
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ عَنۡهُمۡ سِرَاعٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشۡرٌ عَلَيۡنَا يَسِيرٞ

Verses.Text: We know best what they say. And you ˹O Prophet˺ are not ˹there˺ to compel them ˹to believe˺. So remind with the Quran ˹only˺ those who fear My warning.
Verses.Arabic: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِجَبَّارٖۖ فَذَكِّرۡ بِٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ

Verses.Text: By the winds scattering ˹dust˺,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلذَّـٰرِيَٰتِ ذَرۡوٗا

Verses.Text: and ˹the clouds˺ loaded with rain,
Verses.Arabic: فَٱلۡحَٰمِلَٰتِ وِقۡرٗا

Verses.Text: and ˹the ships˺ gliding with ease,
Verses.Arabic: فَٱلۡجَٰرِيَٰتِ يُسۡرٗا

Verses.Text: and ˹the angels˺ administering affairs by ˹Allah’s˺ command!
Verses.Arabic: فَٱلۡمُقَسِّمَٰتِ أَمۡرًا

Verses.Text: Indeed, what you are promised is true.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٞ

Verses.Text: And the Judgment will certainly come to pass.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ لَوَٰقِعٞ

Verses.Text: ˹And˺ by the heavens in their marvellous design!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡحُبُكِ

Verses.Text: Surely you are ˹lost˺ in conflicting views ˹regarding the truth˺.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّكُمۡ لَفِي قَوۡلٖ مُّخۡتَلِفٖ

Verses.Text: Only those ˹destined to be˺ deluded are turned away from it.
Verses.Arabic: يُؤۡفَكُ عَنۡهُ مَنۡ أُفِكَ

Verses.Text: Condemned are the liars—
Verses.Arabic: قُتِلَ ٱلۡخَرَّـٰصُونَ

Verses.Text: those who are ˹steeped˺ in ignorance, totally heedless.
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ فِي غَمۡرَةٖ سَاهُونَ

Verses.Text: They ask ˹mockingly˺, “When is this Day of Judgment?”
Verses.Arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ

Verses.Text: ˹It is˺ the Day they will be tormented over the Fire.
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ هُمۡ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفۡتَنُونَ

Verses.Text: ˹They will be told,˺ “Taste your torment! This is what you sought to hasten.”
Verses.Arabic: ذُوقُواْ فِتۡنَتَكُمۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, the righteous will be amid Gardens and springs,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ وَعُيُونٍ

Verses.Text: ˹joyfully˺ receiving what their Lord will grant them. Before this ˹reward˺ they were truly good-doers ˹in the world˺:
Verses.Arabic: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَبۡلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحۡسِنِينَ

Verses.Text: they used to sleep only little in the night,
Verses.Arabic: كَانُواْ قَلِيلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَعُونَ

Verses.Text: and pray for forgiveness before dawn.
Verses.Arabic: وَبِٱلۡأَسۡحَارِ هُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ

Verses.Text: And in their wealth there was a rightful share ˹fulfilled˺ for the beggar and the poor.
Verses.Arabic: وَفِيٓ أَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ حَقّٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلۡمَحۡرُومِ

Verses.Text: There are ˹countless˺ signs on earth for those with sure faith,
Verses.Arabic: وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلۡمُوقِنِينَ

Verses.Text: as there are within yourselves. Can you not see?
Verses.Arabic: وَفِيٓ أَنفُسِكُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

Verses.Text: In heaven is your sustenance and whatever you are promised.
Verses.Arabic: وَفِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزۡقُكُمۡ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ

Verses.Text: Then by the Lord of heaven and earth! ˹All˺ this is certainly as true as ˹the fact that˺ you can speak!
Verses.Arabic: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞ مِّثۡلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمۡ تَنطِقُونَ

Verses.Text: Has the story of Abraham’s honoured guests reached you ˹O Prophet˺?
Verses.Arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيۡفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

Verses.Text: ˹Remember˺ when they entered his presence and greeted ˹him with˺, “Peace!” He replied, “Peace ˹be upon you˺!” ˹Then he said to himself,˺ “˹These are˺ an unfamiliar people.”
Verses.Arabic: إِذۡ دَخَلُواْ عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُواْ سَلَٰمٗاۖ قَالَ سَلَٰمٞ قَوۡمٞ مُّنكَرُونَ

Verses.Text: Then he slipped off to his family and brought a fat ˹roasted˺ calf,
Verses.Arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجۡلٖ سَمِينٖ

Verses.Text: and placed it before them, asking, “Will you not eat?”
Verses.Arabic: فَقَرَّبَهُۥٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡ قَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُلُونَ

Verses.Text: ˹They did not eat,˺ so he grew fearful of them. They reassured ˹him˺, “Do not be afraid,” and gave him good news of a knowledgeable son.
Verses.Arabic: فَأَوۡجَسَ مِنۡهُمۡ خِيفَةٗۖ قَالُواْ لَا تَخَفۡۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

Verses.Text: Then his wife came forward with a cry, clasping her forehead ˹in astonishment˺, exclaiming, “˹A baby from˺ a barren, old woman!”
Verses.Arabic: فَأَقۡبَلَتِ ٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ فِي صَرَّةٖ فَصَكَّتۡ وَجۡهَهَا وَقَالَتۡ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٞ

Verses.Text: They replied, “Such has your Lord decreed. He is truly the All-Wise, All-Knowing.”
Verses.Arabic: قَالُواْ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

Verses.Text: ˹Later,˺ Abraham asked, “What is your mission, O  messengers?”
Verses.Arabic: ۞قَالَ فَمَا خَطۡبُكُمۡ أَيُّهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

Verses.Text: They replied, “We have actually been sent to a wicked people,
Verses.Arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ أُرۡسِلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ مُّجۡرِمِينَ

Verses.Text: to send upon them stones of ˹baked˺ clay,
Verses.Arabic: لِنُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حِجَارَةٗ مِّن طِينٖ

Verses.Text: marked by your Lord for the transgressors.”
Verses.Arabic: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

Verses.Text: Then ˹before the torment˺ We evacuated the believers from the city.
Verses.Arabic: فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

Verses.Text: But We only found one family that had submitted ˹to Allah˺.
Verses.Arabic: فَمَا وَجَدۡنَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡتٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ

Verses.Text: And We have left a sign there ˹as a lesson˺ for those who fear the painful punishment.
Verses.Arabic: وَتَرَكۡنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

Verses.Text: And in ˹the story of˺ Moses ˹was another lesson,˺ when We sent him to Pharaoh with compelling proof,
Verses.Arabic: وَفِي مُوسَىٰٓ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ

Verses.Text: but Pharaoh was carried away by his power, saying ˹of Moses˺, “A magician or a madman!”
Verses.Arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

Verses.Text: So We seized him and his soldiers, casting them into the sea while he was blameworthy.
Verses.Arabic: فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٞ

Verses.Text: And in ˹the story of˺ ’Âd ˹was another lesson,˺ when We sent against them the devastating wind.
Verses.Arabic: وَفِي عَادٍ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلۡعَقِيمَ

Verses.Text: There was nothing it came upon that it did not reduce to ashes.
Verses.Arabic: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَيۡءٍ أَتَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتۡهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ

Verses.Text: And in ˹the story of˺ Thamûd ˹was another lesson,˺ when they were told, “Enjoy yourselves ˹only˺ for a ˹short˺ while.”
Verses.Arabic: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذۡ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَمَتَّعُواْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

Verses.Text: Still they persisted in defying the commands of their Lord, so they were overtaken by a ˹mighty˺ blast while they were looking on.
Verses.Arabic: فَعَتَوۡاْ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ

Verses.Text: Then they were not able to rise up, nor were they helped.
Verses.Arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

Verses.Text: And the people of Noah ˹had also been destroyed˺ earlier. They were truly a rebellious people.
Verses.Arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

Verses.Text: We built the universe with ˹great˺ might, and We are certainly expanding ˹it˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيۡنَٰهَا بِأَيۡيْدٖ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ

Verses.Text: As for the earth, We spread it out. How superbly did We smooth it out!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَرَشۡنَٰهَا فَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡمَٰهِدُونَ

Verses.Text: And We created pairs of all things so perhaps you would be mindful.
Verses.Arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ

Verses.Text: So ˹proclaim, O  Prophet˺: “Flee to Allah! I am truly sent by Him with a clear warning to you.
Verses.Arabic: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

Verses.Text: And do not set up another god with Allah. I am truly sent by Him with a clear warning to you.”
Verses.Arabic: وَلَا تَجۡعَلُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

Verses.Text: Similarly, no messenger came to those before them without being told: “A magician or a madman!”
Verses.Arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُواْ سَاحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٌ

Verses.Text: Have they passed this ˹cliché˺ down to one another? In fact, they have ˹all˺ been a transgressing people.
Verses.Arabic: أَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِهِۦۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

Verses.Text: So ˹now˺ turn away from them ˹O Prophet˺, for you will not be blamed.
Verses.Arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٖ

Verses.Text: But ˹continue to˺ remind. For certainly reminders benefit the believers.
Verses.Arabic: وَذَكِّرۡ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

Verses.Text: I did not create jinn and humans except to worship Me.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ

Verses.Text: I seek no provision from them, nor do I need them to feed Me.
Verses.Arabic: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنۡهُم مِّن رِّزۡقٖ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطۡعِمُونِ

Verses.Text: Indeed, Allah ˹alone˺ is the Supreme Provider—Lord of all Power, Ever Mighty.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ

Verses.Text: The wrongdoers will certainly have a share ˹of the torment˺ like that of their predecessors. So do not let them ask Me to hasten ˹it˺.
Verses.Arabic: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ذَنُوبٗا مِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَٰبِهِمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ

Verses.Text: Woe then to the disbelievers when they face their Day which they are warned of!
Verses.Arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

Verses.Text: By Mount Ṭûr!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلطُّورِ

Verses.Text: And by the Book written
Verses.Arabic: وَكِتَٰبٖ مَّسۡطُورٖ

Verses.Text: on open pages ˹for all to read˺!
Verses.Arabic: فِي رَقّٖ مَّنشُورٖ

Verses.Text: And by the ˹Sacred˺ House frequently visited!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡمَعۡمُورِ

Verses.Text: And by the canopy raised ˹high˺!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلسَّقۡفِ ٱلۡمَرۡفُوعِ

Verses.Text: And by the seas set on fire!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ ٱلۡمَسۡجُورِ

Verses.Text: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will come to pass—
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٞ

Verses.Text: none will avert it—
Verses.Arabic: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٖ

Verses.Text: on the Day the heavens will be shaken violently,
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوۡرٗا

Verses.Text: and the mountains will be blown away entirely.
Verses.Arabic: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ سَيۡرٗا

Verses.Text: Then woe on that Day to the deniers—
Verses.Arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

Verses.Text: those who amuse themselves with falsehood!
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ فِي خَوۡضٖ يَلۡعَبُونَ

Verses.Text: ˹It is˺ the Day they will be fiercely shoved into the Fire of Hell.
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

Verses.Text: ˹They will be told,˺ “This is the Fire which you used to deny.
Verses.Arabic: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

Verses.Text: Is this magic, or do you not see?
Verses.Arabic: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

Verses.Text: Burn in it! It is the same whether you endure ˹it˺ patiently or not. You are only rewarded for what you used to do.”
Verses.Arabic: ٱصۡلَوۡهَا فَٱصۡبِرُوٓاْ أَوۡ لَا تَصۡبِرُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, the righteous will be in Gardens and bliss,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ وَنَعِيمٖ

Verses.Text: enjoying whatever their Lord will have granted them. And their Lord will have protected them from the torment of the Hellfire.
Verses.Arabic: فَٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

Verses.Text: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink happily for what you used to do.”
Verses.Arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

Verses.Text: They will be reclining on thrones, ˹neatly˺ lined up ˹facing each other˺. And We will pair them to maidens with gorgeous eyes.
Verses.Arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ

Verses.Text: As for those who believe and whose descendants follow them in faith, We will elevate their descendants to their rank, never discounting anything ˹of the reward˺ of their deeds. Every person will reap only what they sowed.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّبَعَتۡهُمۡ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَٰنٍ أَلۡحَقۡنَا بِهِمۡ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ وَمَآ أَلَتۡنَٰهُم مِّنۡ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖۚ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيِٕۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٞ

Verses.Text: And We will ˹continually˺ provide them with whatever fruit or meat they desire.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَمۡدَدۡنَٰهُم بِفَٰكِهَةٖ وَلَحۡمٖ مِّمَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ

Verses.Text: They will pass around to each other a drink ˹of pure wine,˺ which leads to no idle talk or sinfulness.
Verses.Arabic: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ

Verses.Text: And they will be waited on by their youthful servants like spotless pearls.
Verses.Arabic: ۞وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غِلۡمَانٞ لَّهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٞ مَّكۡنُونٞ

Verses.Text: They will turn to one another inquisitively.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَقۡبَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

Verses.Text: They will say, “Before ˹this reward˺ we used to be in awe ˹of Allah˺ in the midst of our people.
Verses.Arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ

Verses.Text: So Allah has graced us and protected us from the torment of ˹Hell’s˺ scorching heat.
Verses.Arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ

Verses.Text: Indeed, we used to call upon Him ˹alone˺ before. He is truly the Most Kind, Most Merciful.”
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

Verses.Text: So ˹continue to˺ remind ˹all, O  Prophet˺. For you, by the grace of your Lord, are not a fortune-teller or a madman.
Verses.Arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٖ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ

Verses.Text: Or do they say, “˹He is˺ a poet, for whom we ˹eagerly˺ await an ill-fate!”?
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ

Verses.Text: Say, “Keep waiting! I too am waiting with you.”
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

Verses.Text: Or do their ˹intelligent˺ minds prompt them to this ˹paradox˺? Or are they ˹just˺ a transgressing people?
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ تَأۡمُرُهُمۡ أَحۡلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآۚ أَمۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

Verses.Text: Or do they say, “He made this ˹Quran˺ up!”? In fact, they have no faith.
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥۚ بَل لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

Verses.Text: Let them then produce something like it, if what they say is true!
Verses.Arabic: فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِحَدِيثٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

Verses.Text: Or were they created by nothing, or are they ˹their own˺ creators?
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ خُلِقُواْ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ شَيۡءٍ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُونَ

Verses.Text: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? In fact, they have no firm belief ˹in Allah˺.
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

Verses.Text: Or do they possess the treasuries of your Lord, or are they in control ˹of everything˺?
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ

Verses.Text: Or do they have a stairway, by which they eavesdrop ˹on the heavens˺? Then let those who do so bring a compelling proof.
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ سُلَّمٞ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ فِيهِۖ فَلۡيَأۡتِ مُسۡتَمِعُهُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

Verses.Text: Or does He have daughters ˹as you claim˺, while you ˹prefer to˺ have sons?
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ لَهُ ٱلۡبَنَٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلۡبَنُونَ

Verses.Text: Or are you ˹O Prophet˺ asking them for a reward ˹for the message˺ so that they are overburdened by debt?
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ

Verses.Text: Or do they have access to ˹the Record in˺ the unseen, so they copy it ˹for all to see˺?
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبُ فَهُمۡ يَكۡتُبُونَ

Verses.Text: Or do they intend to scheme ˹against the Prophet˺? Then it is the disbelievers who will fall victim to ˹their˺ schemes.
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ

Verses.Text: Or do they have a god other than Allah? Glorified is Allah far above what they associate ˹with Him˺!
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

Verses.Text: If they were to see a ˹deadly˺ piece of the sky fall down ˹upon them˺, still they would say, “˹This is just˺ a pile of clouds.”
Verses.Arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كِسۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطٗا يَقُولُواْ سَحَابٞ مَّرۡكُومٞ

Verses.Text: So leave them until they face their Day in which they will be struck dead—
Verses.Arabic: فَذَرۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يُصۡعَقُونَ

Verses.Text: the Day their scheming will be of no benefit to them whatsoever, nor will they be helped.
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ

Verses.Text: Also, the wrongdoers will certainly have another torment before that ˹Day˺, but most of them do not know.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ عَذَابٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

Verses.Text: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, for you are truly under Our ˹watchful˺ Eyes. And glorify the praises of your Lord when you rise.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَاۖ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ

Verses.Text: And glorify Him during part of the night and at the fading of the stars.
Verses.Arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡهُ وَإِدۡبَٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ

Verses.Text: By the stars when they fade away!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلنَّجۡمِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ

Verses.Text: Your fellow man is neither misguided nor astray.
Verses.Arabic: مَا ضَلَّ صَاحِبُكُمۡ وَمَا غَوَىٰ

Verses.Text: Nor does he speak of his own whims.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا يَنطِقُ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: It is only a revelation sent down ˹to him˺.
Verses.Arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحۡيٞ يُوحَىٰ

Verses.Text: He has been taught by one ˹angel˺ of mighty power
Verses.Arabic: عَلَّمَهُۥ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡقُوَىٰ

Verses.Text: and great perfection, who once rose to ˹his˺ true form
Verses.Arabic: ذُو مِرَّةٖ فَٱسۡتَوَىٰ

Verses.Text: while on the highest point above the horizon,
Verses.Arabic: وَهُوَ بِٱلۡأُفُقِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ

Verses.Text: then he approached ˹the Prophet˺, coming so close
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ دَنَا فَتَدَلَّىٰ

Verses.Text: that he was only two arms-lengths away or even less.
Verses.Arabic: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوۡسَيۡنِ أَوۡ أَدۡنَىٰ

Verses.Text: Then Allah revealed to His servant what He revealed ˹through Gabriel˺.
Verses.Arabic: فَأَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦ مَآ أَوۡحَىٰ

Verses.Text: The ˹Prophet’s˺ heart did not doubt what he saw.
Verses.Arabic: مَا كَذَبَ ٱلۡفُؤَادُ مَا رَأَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: How can you ˹O pagans˺ then dispute with him regarding what he saw?
Verses.Arabic: أَفَتُمَٰرُونَهُۥ عَلَىٰ مَا يَرَىٰ

Verses.Text: And he certainly saw that ˹angel descend˺ a second time
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ رَءَاهُ نَزۡلَةً أُخۡرَىٰ

Verses.Text: at the Lote Tree of the most extreme limit ˹in the seventh heaven˺—
Verses.Arabic: عِندَ سِدۡرَةِ ٱلۡمُنتَهَىٰ

Verses.Text: near which is the Garden of ˹Eternal˺ Residence—
Verses.Arabic: عِندَهَا جَنَّةُ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: while the Lote Tree was overwhelmed with ˹heavenly˺ splendours!
Verses.Arabic: إِذۡ يَغۡشَى ٱلسِّدۡرَةَ مَا يَغۡشَىٰ

Verses.Text: The ˹Prophet’s˺ sight never wandered, nor did it overreach.
Verses.Arabic: مَا زَاغَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ وَمَا طَغَىٰ

Verses.Text: He certainly saw some of his Lord’s greatest signs.
Verses.Arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Now, have you considered ˹the idols of˺ Lât and ’Uzza,
Verses.Arabic: أَفَرَءَيۡتُمُ ٱللَّـٰتَ وَٱلۡعُزَّىٰ

Verses.Text: and the third one, Manât, as well?
Verses.Arabic: وَمَنَوٰةَ ٱلثَّالِثَةَ ٱلۡأُخۡرَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Do you ˹prefer to˺ have sons while ˹you attribute˺ to Him daughters?
Verses.Arabic: أَلَكُمُ ٱلذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ ٱلۡأُنثَىٰ

Verses.Text: Then this is ˹truly˺ a biased distribution!
Verses.Arabic: تِلۡكَ إِذٗا قِسۡمَةٞ ضِيزَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: These ˹idols˺ are mere names that you and your forefathers have made up—a practice Allah has never authorized. They follow nothing but ˹inherited˺ assumptions and whatever ˹their˺ souls desire, although ˹true˺ guidance has already come to them from their Lord.
Verses.Arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّآ أَسۡمَآءٞ سَمَّيۡتُمُوهَآ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُم مَّآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَا مِن سُلۡطَٰنٍۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَمَا تَهۡوَى ٱلۡأَنفُسُۖ وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مِّن رَّبِّهِمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Or should every person ˹simply˺ have whatever ˹intercessors˺ they desire?
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ مَا تَمَنَّىٰ

Verses.Text: In fact, to Allah ˹alone˺ belongs this world and the next.
Verses.Arabic: فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰ

Verses.Text: ˹Imagine˺ how many ˹noble˺ angels are in the heavens! ˹Even˺ their intercession would be of no benefit whatsoever, until Allah gives permission to whoever He wills and ˹only for the people He˺ approves.
Verses.Arabic: ۞وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ لَا تُغۡنِي شَفَٰعَتُهُمۡ شَيۡـًٔا إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَن يَأۡذَنَ ٱللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡضَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter label angels as female,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَيُسَمُّونَ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ تَسۡمِيَةَ ٱلۡأُنثَىٰ

Verses.Text: although they have no knowledge ˹in support˺ of this. They follow nothing but ˹inherited˺ assumptions. And surely assumptions can in no way replace the truth.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍۖ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّۖ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّنَّ لَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّ شَيۡـٔٗا

Verses.Text: So turn away ˹O Prophet˺ from whoever has shunned Our Reminder, only seeking the ˹fleeting˺ life of this world.
Verses.Arabic: فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَن مَّن تَوَلَّىٰ عَن ذِكۡرِنَا وَلَمۡ يُرِدۡ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا

Verses.Text: This is the extent of their knowledge. Surely your Lord knows best who has strayed from His Way and who is ˹rightly˺ guided.
Verses.Arabic: ذَٰلِكَ مَبۡلَغُهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعِلۡمِۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱهۡتَدَىٰ

Verses.Text: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth so that He may reward the evildoers according to what they did, and reward the good-doers with the finest reward—
Verses.Arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَسَـٰٓـُٔواْ بِمَا عَمِلُواْ وَيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَى

Verses.Text: those who avoid major sins and shameful deeds, despite ˹stumbling on˺ minor sins. Surely your Lord is infinite in forgiveness. He knew well what would become of you as He created you from the earth and while you were ˹still˺ fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not ˹falsely˺ elevate yourselves. He knows best who is ˹truly˺ righteous.
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجۡتَنِبُونَ كَبَـٰٓئِرَ ٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡفَوَٰحِشَ إِلَّا ٱللَّمَمَۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ وَٰسِعُ ٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِۚ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِكُمۡ إِذۡ أَنشَأَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِذۡ أَنتُمۡ أَجِنَّةٞ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَٰتِكُمۡۖ فَلَا تُزَكُّوٓاْ أَنفُسَكُمۡۖ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَنِ ٱتَّقَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Have you seen the one who turned away ˹from Islam,˺
Verses.Arabic: أَفَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي تَوَلَّىٰ

Verses.Text: and ˹initially˺ paid a little ˹for his salvation˺, and then stopped?
Verses.Arabic: وَأَعۡطَىٰ قَلِيلٗا وَأَكۡدَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Does he have the knowledge of the unseen so that he sees ˹the Hereafter˺?
Verses.Arabic: أَعِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ فَهُوَ يَرَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Or has he not been informed of what is in the Scripture of Moses,
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ لَمۡ يُنَبَّأۡ بِمَا فِي صُحُفِ مُوسَىٰ

Verses.Text: and ˹that of˺ Abraham, who ˹perfectly˺ fulfilled ˹his covenant˺?
Verses.Arabic: وَإِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلَّذِي وَفَّىٰٓ

Verses.Text: ˹They state˺ that no soul burdened with sin will bear the burden of another,
Verses.Arabic: أَلَّا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٞ وِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰ

Verses.Text: and that each person will only have what they endeavoured towards,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَن لَّيۡسَ لِلۡإِنسَٰنِ إِلَّا مَا سَعَىٰ

Verses.Text: and that ˹the outcome of˺ their endeavours will be seen ˹in their record˺,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّ سَعۡيَهُۥ سَوۡفَ يُرَىٰ

Verses.Text: then they will be fully rewarded,
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ يُجۡزَىٰهُ ٱلۡجَزَآءَ ٱلۡأَوۡفَىٰ

Verses.Text: and that to your Lord ˹alone˺ is the ultimate return ˹of all things˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡمُنتَهَىٰ

Verses.Text: Moreover, He is the One Who brings about joy and sadness.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَضۡحَكَ وَأَبۡكَىٰ

Verses.Text: And He is the One Who gives life and causes death.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَمَاتَ وَأَحۡيَا

Verses.Text: And He created the pairs—males and females—
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ خَلَقَ ٱلزَّوۡجَيۡنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰ

Verses.Text: from a sperm-drop when it is emitted.
Verses.Arabic: مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ إِذَا تُمۡنَىٰ

Verses.Text: And it is upon Him to bring about re-creation.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّ عَلَيۡهِ ٱلنَّشۡأَةَ ٱلۡأُخۡرَىٰ

Verses.Text: And He is the One Who enriches and impoverishes.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ أَغۡنَىٰ وَأَقۡنَىٰ

Verses.Text: And He alone is the Lord of Sirius.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلشِّعۡرَىٰ

Verses.Text: And He destroyed the first ˹people of˺ ’Ȃd,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥٓ أَهۡلَكَ عَادًا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

Verses.Text: and ˹then˺ Thamûd, sparing no one.
Verses.Arabic: وَثَمُودَاْ فَمَآ أَبۡقَىٰ

Verses.Text: And before ˹that He destroyed˺ the people of Noah, who were truly far worse in wrongdoing and transgression.
Verses.Arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ هُمۡ أَظۡلَمَ وَأَطۡغَىٰ

Verses.Text: And ˹it was˺ He ˹Who˺ turned the cities ˹of Sodom and Gomorrah˺ upside down.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَةَ أَهۡوَىٰ

Verses.Text: How overwhelming was what covered ˹them˺!
Verses.Arabic: فَغَشَّىٰهَا مَا غَشَّىٰ

Verses.Text: Now, which of your Lord’s favours will you dispute?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكَ تَتَمَارَىٰ

Verses.Text: This ˹Prophet˺ is a warner like earlier ones.
Verses.Arabic: هَٰذَا نَذِيرٞ مِّنَ ٱلنُّذُرِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: The approaching ˹Hour˺ has drawn near.
Verses.Arabic: أَزِفَتِ ٱلۡأٓزِفَةُ

Verses.Text: None but Allah can disclose it.
Verses.Arabic: لَيۡسَ لَهَا مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ كَاشِفَةٌ

Verses.Text: Do you find this revelation astonishing,
Verses.Arabic: أَفَمِنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِ تَعۡجَبُونَ

Verses.Text: laughing ˹at it˺ and not weeping ˹in awe˺,
Verses.Arabic: وَتَضۡحَكُونَ وَلَا تَبۡكُونَ

Verses.Text: while persisting in heedlessness?
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنتُمۡ سَٰمِدُونَ

Verses.Text: Instead, prostrate to Allah and worship ˹Him alone˺!
Verses.Arabic: فَٱسۡجُدُواْۤ لِلَّهِۤ وَٱعۡبُدُواْ۩

Verses.Text: The Hour has drawn near and the moon was split ˹in two˺.
Verses.Arabic: ٱقۡتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلۡقَمَرُ

Verses.Text: Yet, whenever they see a sign, they turn away, saying, “Same old magic!”
Verses.Arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ ءَايَةٗ يُعۡرِضُواْ وَيَقُولُواْ سِحۡرٞ مُّسۡتَمِرّٞ

Verses.Text: They rejected ˹the truth˺ and followed their own desires—and every matter will be settled—
Verses.Arabic: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ

Verses.Text: even though the stories ˹of destroyed nations˺ that have already come to them are a sufficient deterrent.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزۡدَجَرٌ

Verses.Text: ˹This Quran is˺ profound ˹in˺ wisdom, but warnings are of no benefit ˹to them˺.
Verses.Arabic: حِكۡمَةُۢ بَٰلِغَةٞۖ فَمَا تُغۡنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ

Verses.Text: So turn away from them ˹O Prophet˺. ˹And wait for˺ the Day ˹when˺ the caller will summon ˹them˺ for something horrifying.
Verses.Arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ نُّكُرٍ

Verses.Text: With eyes downcast, they will come forth from the graves as if they were swarming locusts,
Verses.Arabic: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ

Verses.Text: rushing towards the caller. The disbelievers will cry, “This is a difficult Day!”
Verses.Arabic: مُّهۡطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِۖ يَقُولُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا يَوۡمٌ عَسِرٞ

Verses.Text: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth˺ and rejected Our servant, calling ˹him˺ insane. And he was intimidated.
Verses.Arabic: ۞كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ فَكَذَّبُواْ عَبۡدَنَا وَقَالُواْ مَجۡنُونٞ وَٱزۡدُجِرَ

Verses.Text: So he cried out to his Lord, “I am helpless, so help ˹me˺!”
Verses.Arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَغۡلُوبٞ فَٱنتَصِرۡ

Verses.Text: So We opened the gates of the sky with pouring rain,
Verses.Arabic: فَفَتَحۡنَآ أَبۡوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٖ مُّنۡهَمِرٖ

Verses.Text: and caused the earth to burst with springs, so the waters met for a fate already set.
Verses.Arabic: وَفَجَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ عُيُونٗا فَٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرٖ قَدۡ قُدِرَ

Verses.Text: We carried him on that ˹Ark made˺ of planks and nails,
Verses.Arabic: وَحَمَلۡنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلۡوَٰحٖ وَدُسُرٖ

Verses.Text: sailing under Our ˹watchful˺ Eyes—a ˹fair˺ punishment on behalf of the one ˹they˺ denied.
Verses.Arabic: تَجۡرِي بِأَعۡيُنِنَا جَزَآءٗ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ

Verses.Text: We certainly left this as a sign. So is there anyone who will be mindful?
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

Verses.Text: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!
Verses.Arabic: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

Verses.Text: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

Verses.Text: ’Ȃd ˹also˺ rejected ˹the truth˺. Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!
Verses.Arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

Verses.Text: Indeed, We sent against them a furious wind, on a day of unrelenting misery,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِيحٗا صَرۡصَرٗا فِي يَوۡمِ نَحۡسٖ مُّسۡتَمِرّٖ

Verses.Text: that snatched people up, leaving them like trunks of uprooted palm trees.
Verses.Arabic: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٖ مُّنقَعِرٖ

Verses.Text: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!
Verses.Arabic: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

Verses.Text: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

Verses.Text: Thamûd rejected the warnings ˹as well˺,
Verses.Arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ

Verses.Text: arguing, “How can we follow one ˹average˺ human being from among us? We would then truly be misguided and insane.
Verses.Arabic: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَبَشَرٗا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدٗا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّفِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٍ

Verses.Text: Has the revelation been sent down ˹only˺ to him out of ˹all of˺ us? In fact, he is a boastful liar.”
Verses.Arabic: أَءُلۡقِيَ ٱلذِّكۡرُ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا بَلۡ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٞ

Verses.Text: ˹It was revealed to Ṣâliḥ,˺ “They will soon know who the boastful liar is.
Verses.Arabic: سَيَعۡلَمُونَ غَدٗا مَّنِ ٱلۡكَذَّابُ ٱلۡأَشِرُ

Verses.Text: We are sending the she-camel as a test for them. So watch them ˹closely˺, and have patience.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ

Verses.Text: And tell them that the ˹drinking˺ water must be divided between them ˹and her˺, each taking a turn to drink ˹every other day˺.”
Verses.Arabic: وَنَبِّئۡهُمۡ أَنَّ ٱلۡمَآءَ قِسۡمَةُۢ بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلُّ شِرۡبٖ مُّحۡتَضَرٞ

Verses.Text: But they roused a companion of theirs, so he dared to kill ˹her˺.
Verses.Arabic: فَنَادَوۡاْ صَاحِبَهُمۡ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ

Verses.Text: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!
Verses.Arabic: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

Verses.Text: Indeed, We sent against them ˹only˺ one ˹mighty˺ blast, leaving them like the twigs of fence-builders.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَكَانُواْ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلۡمُحۡتَظِرِ

Verses.Text: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

Verses.Text: The people of Lot ˹also˺ rejected the warnings.
Verses.Arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَوۡمُ لُوطِۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ

Verses.Text: We unleashed upon them a storm of stones. As for ˹the believers of˺ Lot’s family, We delivered them before dawn
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٖۖ نَّجَّيۡنَٰهُم بِسَحَرٖ

Verses.Text: as a blessing from Us. This is how We reward whoever gives thanks.
Verses.Arabic: نِّعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَن شَكَرَ

Verses.Text: He had already warned them of Our ˹crushing˺ blow but they disputed the warnings.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَنذَرَهُم بَطۡشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوۡاْ بِٱلنُّذُرِ

Verses.Text: And they even demanded his angel-guests from him, so We blinded their eyes. ˹And they were told,˺ “Taste then My punishment and warnings!”
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيۡفِهِۦ فَطَمَسۡنَآ أَعۡيُنَهُمۡ فَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

Verses.Text: And indeed, by the early morning they were overwhelmed by an unrelenting torment.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَبَّحَهُم بُكۡرَةً عَذَابٞ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ

Verses.Text: ˹Again they were told,˺ “Taste now My punishment and warnings!”
Verses.Arabic: فَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ

Verses.Text: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

Verses.Text: And indeed, the warnings ˹also˺ came to the people of Pharaoh.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ

Verses.Text: ˹But˺ they rejected all of Our signs, so We seized them with the ˹crushing˺ grip of the Almighty, Most Powerful.
Verses.Arabic: كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ أَخۡذَ عَزِيزٖ مُّقۡتَدِرٍ

Verses.Text: Now, are you ˹Meccan˺ disbelievers superior to those ˹destroyed peoples˺? Or have you ˹been granted˺ immunity ˹from punishment˺ in divine Books?
Verses.Arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ

Verses.Text: Or do they say, “We are all ˹a˺ united ˹front˺, bound to prevail.”?
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ نَحۡنُ جَمِيعٞ مُّنتَصِرٞ

Verses.Text: ˹Soon˺ their united front will be defeated and ˹forced to˺ flee.
Verses.Arabic: سَيُهۡزَمُ ٱلۡجَمۡعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ

Verses.Text: Better yet, the Hour is their appointed time—and the Hour will be most catastrophic and most bitter.
Verses.Arabic: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ

Verses.Text: Indeed, the wicked are ˹entrenched˺ in misguidance, and ˹are bound for˺ blazes.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٖ

Verses.Text: On the Day they will be dragged into the Fire on their faces, ˹they will be told,˺ “Taste the touch of Hell!”
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ يُسۡحَبُونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ ذُوقُواْ مَسَّ سَقَرَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, We have created everything, perfectly preordained.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ بِقَدَرٖ

Verses.Text: Our command is but a single word, done in the blink of an eye.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ

Verses.Text: We have already destroyed the likes of you. So will any ˹of you˺ be mindful?
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

Verses.Text: Everything they have done is ˹listed˺ in ˹their˺ records.
Verses.Arabic: وَكُلُّ شَيۡءٖ فَعَلُوهُ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ

Verses.Text: Every matter, small and large, is written ˹precisely˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٖ وَكَبِيرٖ مُّسۡتَطَرٌ

Verses.Text: Indeed, the righteous will be amid Gardens and rivers,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ وَنَهَرٖ

Verses.Text: at the Seat of Honour in the presence of the Most Powerful Sovereign.
Verses.Arabic: فِي مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٖ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ

Verses.Text: The Most Compassionate
Verses.Arabic: ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ

Verses.Text: taught the Quran,
Verses.Arabic: عَلَّمَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ

Verses.Text: created humanity,
Verses.Arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ

Verses.Text: ˹and˺ taught them speech.
Verses.Arabic: عَلَّمَهُ ٱلۡبَيَانَ

Verses.Text: The sun and the moon ˹travel˺ with precision.
Verses.Arabic: ٱلشَّمۡسُ وَٱلۡقَمَرُ بِحُسۡبَانٖ

Verses.Text: The stars and the trees bow down ˹in submission˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلنَّجۡمُ وَٱلشَّجَرُ يَسۡجُدَانِ

Verses.Text: As for the sky, He raised it ˹high˺, and set the balance ˹of justice˺
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ رَفَعَهَا وَوَضَعَ ٱلۡمِيزَانَ

Verses.Text: so that you do not defraud the scales.
Verses.Arabic: أَلَّا تَطۡغَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡمِيزَانِ

Verses.Text: Weigh with justice, and do not give short measure.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلۡوَزۡنَ بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَلَا تُخۡسِرُواْ ٱلۡمِيزَانَ

Verses.Text: He laid out the earth for all beings.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَضَعَهَا لِلۡأَنَامِ

Verses.Text: In it are fruit, palm trees with date stalks,
Verses.Arabic: فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَٱلنَّخۡلُ ذَاتُ ٱلۡأَكۡمَامِ

Verses.Text: and grain with husks, and aromatic plants.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡحَبُّ ذُو ٱلۡعَصۡفِ وَٱلرَّيۡحَانُ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you ˹humans and jinn˺ both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: He created humankind from ˹sounding˺ clay like pottery,
Verses.Arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ كَٱلۡفَخَّارِ

Verses.Text: and created jinn from a ˹smokeless˺ flame of fire.
Verses.Arabic: وَخَلَقَ ٱلۡجَآنَّ مِن مَّارِجٖ مِّن نَّارٖ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: ˹He is˺ Lord of the two easts and the two wests.
Verses.Arabic: رَبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقَيۡنِ وَرَبُّ ٱلۡمَغۡرِبَيۡنِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: He merges the two bodies of ˹fresh and salt˺ water,
Verses.Arabic: مَرَجَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَيۡنِ يَلۡتَقِيَانِ

Verses.Text: yet between them is a barrier they never cross.
Verses.Arabic: بَيۡنَهُمَا بَرۡزَخٞ لَّا يَبۡغِيَانِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: Out of both ˹waters˺ come forth pearls and coral.
Verses.Arabic: يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهُمَا ٱللُّؤۡلُؤُ وَٱلۡمَرۡجَانُ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: To Him belong the ships with raised sails, sailing through the seas like mountains.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: Every being on earth is bound to perish.
Verses.Arabic: كُلُّ مَنۡ عَلَيۡهَا فَانٖ

Verses.Text: Only your Lord Himself, full of Majesty and Honour, will remain ˹forever˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: All those in the heavens and the earth are dependent on Him. Day in and day out He has something to bring about.
Verses.Arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ كُلَّ يَوۡمٍ هُوَ فِي شَأۡنٖ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: We will soon attend to you ˹for judgment˺, O  two multitudes ˹of jinn and humans˺!
Verses.Arabic: سَنَفۡرُغُ لَكُمۡ أَيُّهَ ٱلثَّقَلَانِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: O  assembly of jinn and humans! If you can penetrate beyond the realms of the heavens and the earth, then do so. ˹But˺ you cannot do that without ˹Our˺ authority.
Verses.Arabic: يَٰمَعۡشَرَ ٱلۡجِنِّ وَٱلۡإِنسِ إِنِ ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُمۡ أَن تَنفُذُواْ مِنۡ أَقۡطَارِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنفُذُواْۚ لَا تَنفُذُونَ إِلَّا بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: Flames of fire and ˹molten˺ copper will be sent against you, and you will not be able to defend one another.
Verses.Arabic: يُرۡسَلُ عَلَيۡكُمَا شُوَاظٞ مِّن نَّارٖ وَنُحَاسٞ فَلَا تَنتَصِرَانِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: ˹How horrible will it be˺ when the heavens will split apart, becoming rose-red like ˹burnt˺ oil!
Verses.Arabic: فَإِذَا ٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ وَرۡدَةٗ كَٱلدِّهَانِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: On that Day there will be no need for any human or jinn to be asked about their sins.
Verses.Arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُسۡـَٔلُ عَن ذَنۢبِهِۦٓ إِنسٞ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: The wicked will be recognized by their appearance, then will be seized by ˹their˺ forelocks and feet.
Verses.Arabic: يُعۡرَفُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ بِسِيمَٰهُمۡ فَيُؤۡخَذُ بِٱلنَّوَٰصِي وَٱلۡأَقۡدَامِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: ˹They will be told,˺ “This is the Hell which the wicked denied.”
Verses.Arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

Verses.Text: They will alternate between its flames and scalding water.
Verses.Arabic: يَطُوفُونَ بَيۡنَهَا وَبَيۡنَ حَمِيمٍ ءَانٖ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: And whoever is in awe of standing before their Lord will have two Gardens.
Verses.Arabic: وَلِمَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ جَنَّتَانِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: ˹Both will be˺ with lush branches.
Verses.Arabic: ذَوَاتَآ أَفۡنَانٖ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: In each ˹Garden˺ will be two flowing springs.
Verses.Arabic: فِيهِمَا عَيۡنَانِ تَجۡرِيَانِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: In each will be two types of every fruit.
Verses.Arabic: فِيهِمَا مِن كُلِّ فَٰكِهَةٖ زَوۡجَانِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: Those ˹believers˺ will recline on furnishings lined with rich brocade. And the fruit of both Gardens will hang within reach.
Verses.Arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ فُرُشِۭ بَطَآئِنُهَا مِنۡ إِسۡتَبۡرَقٖۚ وَجَنَى ٱلۡجَنَّتَيۡنِ دَانٖ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: In both ˹Gardens˺ will be maidens of modest gaze, who no human or jinn has ever touched before.
Verses.Arabic: فِيهِنَّ قَٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرۡفِ لَمۡ يَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسٞ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: Those ˹maidens˺ will be ˹as elegant˺ as rubies and coral.
Verses.Arabic: كَأَنَّهُنَّ ٱلۡيَاقُوتُ وَٱلۡمَرۡجَانُ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: Is there any reward for goodness except goodness?
Verses.Arabic: هَلۡ جَزَآءُ ٱلۡإِحۡسَٰنِ إِلَّا ٱلۡإِحۡسَٰنُ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: And below these two ˹Gardens˺ will be two others.
Verses.Arabic: وَمِن دُونِهِمَا جَنَّتَانِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: Both will be dark green.
Verses.Arabic: مُدۡهَآمَّتَانِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: In each will be two gushing springs.
Verses.Arabic: فِيهِمَا عَيۡنَانِ نَضَّاخَتَانِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: In both will be fruit, palm trees, and pomegranates.
Verses.Arabic: فِيهِمَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَنَخۡلٞ وَرُمَّانٞ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: In all Gardens will be noble, pleasant mates.
Verses.Arabic: فِيهِنَّ خَيۡرَٰتٌ حِسَانٞ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: ˹They will be˺ maidens with gorgeous eyes, reserved in pavilions.
Verses.Arabic: حُورٞ مَّقۡصُورَٰتٞ فِي ٱلۡخِيَامِ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: No human or jinn has ever touched these ˹maidens˺ before.
Verses.Arabic: لَمۡ يَطۡمِثۡهُنَّ إِنسٞ قَبۡلَهُمۡ وَلَا جَآنّٞ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: All ˹believers˺ will be reclining on green cushions and splendid carpets.
Verses.Arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفۡرَفٍ خُضۡرٖ وَعَبۡقَرِيٍّ حِسَانٖ

Verses.Text: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ ءَالَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ

Verses.Text: Blessed is the Name of your Lord, full of Majesty and Honour.
Verses.Arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ
