Verses.Text: Allah sets forth an example for the disbelievers: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. Each was married to one of Our righteous servants, yet betrayed them. So their husbands were of no benefit to them against Allah whatsoever. Both were told, “Enter the Fire, along with the others!”
Verses.Arabic: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ نُوحٖ وَٱمۡرَأَتَ لُوطٖۖ كَانَتَا تَحۡتَ عَبۡدَيۡنِ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا صَٰلِحَيۡنِ فَخَانَتَاهُمَا فَلَمۡ يُغۡنِيَا عَنۡهُمَا مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗا وَقِيلَ ٱدۡخُلَا ٱلنَّارَ مَعَ ٱلدَّـٰخِلِينَ

Verses.Text: And Allah sets forth an example for the believers: the wife of Pharaoh, who prayed, “My Lord! Build me a house in Paradise near You, deliver me from Pharaoh and his ˹evil˺ doing, and save me from the wrongdoing people.”
Verses.Arabic: وَضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِذۡ قَالَتۡ رَبِّ ٱبۡنِ لِي عِندَكَ بَيۡتٗا فِي ٱلۡجَنَّةِ وَنَجِّنِي مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَعَمَلِهِۦ وَنَجِّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

Verses.Text: ˹There is˺ also ˹the example of˺ Mary, the daughter of ’Imrân, who guarded her chastity, so We breathed into her ˹womb˺ through Our angel ˹Gabriel˺. She testified to the words of her Lord and His Scriptures, and was one of the ˹sincerely˺ devout.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَرۡيَمَ ٱبۡنَتَ عِمۡرَٰنَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَحۡصَنَتۡ فَرۡجَهَا فَنَفَخۡنَا فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتۡ بِكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَكَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِتِينَ

Verses.Text: Blessed is the One in Whose Hands rests all authority. And He is Most Capable of everything.
Verses.Arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

Verses.Text: ˹He is the One˺ Who created death and life in order to test which of you is best in deeds. And He is the Almighty, All-Forgiving.
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ وَٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ لِيَبۡلُوَكُمۡ أَيُّكُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡغَفُورُ

Verses.Text: ˹He is the One˺ Who created seven heavens, one above the other. You will never see any imperfection in the creation of the Most Compassionate. So look again: do you see any flaws?
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗاۖ مَّا تَرَىٰ فِي خَلۡقِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِن تَفَٰوُتٖۖ فَٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ هَلۡ تَرَىٰ مِن فُطُورٖ

Verses.Text: Then look again and again—your sight will return frustrated and weary.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ ٱرۡجِعِ ٱلۡبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيۡنِ يَنقَلِبۡ إِلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ خَاسِئٗا وَهُوَ حَسِيرٞ

Verses.Text: And indeed, We adorned the lowest heaven with ˹stars like˺ lamps, and made them ˹as missiles˺ for stoning ˹eavesdropping˺ devils, for whom We have also prepared the torment of the Blaze.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِمَصَٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا رُجُومٗا لِّلشَّيَٰطِينِۖ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لَهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

Verses.Text: Those who disbelieve in their Lord will suffer the punishment of Hell. What an evil destination!
Verses.Arabic: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

Verses.Text: When they are tossed into it, they will hear its roaring as it boils over,
Verses.Arabic: إِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ فِيهَا سَمِعُواْ لَهَا شَهِيقٗا وَهِيَ تَفُورُ

Verses.Text: almost bursting in fury. Every time a group is cast into it, its keepers will ask them, “Did a warner not come to you?”
Verses.Arabic: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ ٱلۡغَيۡظِۖ كُلَّمَآ أُلۡقِيَ فِيهَا فَوۡجٞ سَأَلَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَآ أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ

Verses.Text: They will reply, “Yes, a warner did come to us, but we denied and said, ‘Allah has revealed nothing. You are extremely astray.’”
Verses.Arabic: قَالُواْ بَلَىٰ قَدۡ جَآءَنَا نَذِيرٞ فَكَذَّبۡنَا وَقُلۡنَا مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن شَيۡءٍ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ كَبِيرٖ

Verses.Text: And they will lament, “If only we had listened and reasoned, we would not be among the residents of the Blaze!”
Verses.Arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡ كُنَّا نَسۡمَعُ أَوۡ نَعۡقِلُ مَا كُنَّا فِيٓ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

Verses.Text: And so they will confess their sins. So away with the residents of the Blaze!
Verses.Arabic: فَٱعۡتَرَفُواْ بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسُحۡقٗا لِّأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

Verses.Text: Indeed, those in awe of their Lord without seeing Him will have forgiveness and a mighty reward.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٞ

Verses.Text: Whether you speak secretly or openly—He surely knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَسِرُّواْ قَوۡلَكُمۡ أَوِ ٱجۡهَرُواْ بِهِۦٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

Verses.Text: How could He not know His Own creation? For He ˹alone˺ is the Most Subtle, All-Aware.
Verses.Arabic: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

Verses.Text: He is the One Who smoothed out the earth for you, so move about in its regions and eat from His provisions. And to Him is the resurrection ˹of all˺.
Verses.Arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ ذَلُولٗا فَٱمۡشُواْ فِي مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُواْ مِن رِّزۡقِهِۦۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ ٱلنُّشُورُ

Verses.Text: Do you feel secure that the One Who is in heaven will not cause the earth to swallow you up as it quakes violently?
Verses.Arabic: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخۡسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ

Verses.Text: Or do you feel secure that the One Who is in heaven will not unleash upon you a storm of stones. Only then would you know how ˹serious˺ My warning was!
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ أَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِبٗاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ كَيۡفَ نَذِيرِ

Verses.Text: And certainly those before them denied ˹as well˺, then how severe was My response!
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

Verses.Text: Have they not seen the birds above them, spreading and folding their wings? None holds them up except the Most Compassionate. Indeed, He is All-Seeing of everything.
Verses.Arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيۡرِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ صَـٰٓفَّـٰتٖ وَيَقۡبِضۡنَۚ مَا يُمۡسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءِۭ بَصِيرٌ

Verses.Text: Also, which ˹powerless˺ force will come to your help instead of the Most Compassionate? Indeed, the disbelievers are only ˹lost˺ in delusion.
Verses.Arabic: أَمَّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي هُوَ جُندٞ لَّكُمۡ يَنصُرُكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ إِنِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ إِلَّا فِي غُرُورٍ

Verses.Text: Or who is it that will provide for you if He withholds His provision? In fact, they persist in arrogance and aversion ˹to the truth˺.
Verses.Arabic: أَمَّنۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي يَرۡزُقُكُمۡ إِنۡ أَمۡسَكَ رِزۡقَهُۥۚ بَل لَّجُّواْ فِي عُتُوّٖ وَنُفُورٍ

Verses.Text: Who is ˹rightly˺ guided: the one who crawls facedown or the one who walks upright on the Straight Path?
Verses.Arabic: أَفَمَن يَمۡشِي مُكِبًّا عَلَىٰ وَجۡهِهِۦٓ أَهۡدَىٰٓ أَمَّن يَمۡشِي سَوِيًّا عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

Verses.Text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “He is the One Who brought you into being and gave you hearing, sight, and intellect. ˹Yet˺ you hardly give any thanks.”
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَكُمۡ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَ وَٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةَۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ

Verses.Text: ˹Also˺ say, “He is the One Who has dispersed you ˹all˺ over the earth, and to Him you will ˹all˺ be gathered.”
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلَّذِي ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

Verses.Text: ˹Still˺ they ask ˹the believers˺, “When will this threat come to pass, if what you say is true?”
Verses.Arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

Verses.Text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “That knowledge is with Allah alone, and I am only sent with a clear warning.”
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡعِلۡمُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

Verses.Text: Then when they see the torment drawing near, the faces of the disbelievers will become gloomy, and it will be said ˹to them˺, “This is what you claimed would never come.”
Verses.Arabic: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡهُ زُلۡفَةٗ سِيٓـَٔتۡ وُجُوهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَقِيلَ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَدَّعُونَ

Verses.Text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Consider this: whether Allah causes me and those with me to die or shows us mercy, who will save the disbelievers from a painful punishment?”
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَهۡلَكَنِيَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَن مَّعِيَ أَوۡ رَحِمَنَا فَمَن يُجِيرُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ مِنۡ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٖ

Verses.Text: Say, “He is the Most Compassionate—in Him ˹alone˺ we believe, and in Him ˹alone˺ we trust. You will soon know who is clearly astray.”
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَعَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَاۖ فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ هُوَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

Verses.Text: Say, “Consider this: if your water were to sink ˹into the earth˺, then who ˹else˺ could bring you flowing water?”
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَصۡبَحَ مَآؤُكُمۡ غَوۡرٗا فَمَن يَأۡتِيكُم بِمَآءٖ مَّعِينِۭ

Verses.Text: Nũn. By the pen and what everyone writes!
Verses.Arabic: نٓۚ وَٱلۡقَلَمِ وَمَا يَسۡطُرُونَ

Verses.Text: By the grace of your Lord, you ˹O Prophet˺ are not insane.
Verses.Arabic: مَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ بِمَجۡنُونٖ

Verses.Text: You will certainly have a never-ending reward.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِنَّ لَكَ لَأَجۡرًا غَيۡرَ مَمۡنُونٖ

Verses.Text: And you are truly ˹a man˺ of outstanding character.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ خُلُقٍ عَظِيمٖ

Verses.Text: Soon you and the pagans will see,
Verses.Arabic: فَسَتُبۡصِرُ وَيُبۡصِرُونَ

Verses.Text: which of you is mad.
Verses.Arabic: بِأَييِّكُمُ ٱلۡمَفۡتُونُ

Verses.Text: Surely your Lord ˹alone˺ knows best who has strayed from His Way and who is ˹rightly˺ guided.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ

Verses.Text: So do not give in to the deniers.
Verses.Arabic: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

Verses.Text: They wish you would compromise so they would yield ˹to you˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَدُّواْ لَوۡ تُدۡهِنُ فَيُدۡهِنُونَ

Verses.Text: And do not obey the despicable, vain oath-taker,
Verses.Arabic: وَلَا تُطِعۡ كُلَّ حَلَّافٖ مَّهِينٍ

Verses.Text: slanderer, gossip-monger,
Verses.Arabic: هَمَّازٖ مَّشَّآءِۭ بِنَمِيمٖ

Verses.Text: withholder of good, transgressor, evildoer,
Verses.Arabic: مَّنَّاعٖ لِّلۡخَيۡرِ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

Verses.Text: brute, and—on top of all that—an illegitimate child.
Verses.Arabic: عُتُلِّۭ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ زَنِيمٍ

Verses.Text: Now, ˹simply˺ because he has been blessed with ˹abundant˺ wealth and children,
Verses.Arabic: أَن كَانَ ذَا مَالٖ وَبَنِينَ

Verses.Text: whenever Our revelations are recited to him, he says, “Ancient fables!”
Verses.Arabic: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

Verses.Text: We will soon mark his snout.
Verses.Arabic: سَنَسِمُهُۥ عَلَى ٱلۡخُرۡطُومِ

Verses.Text: Indeed, We have tested those ˹Meccans˺ as We tested the owners of the garden—when they swore they would surely harvest ˹all˺ its fruit in the early morning,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّا بَلَوۡنَٰهُمۡ كَمَا بَلَوۡنَآ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ إِذۡ أَقۡسَمُواْ لَيَصۡرِمُنَّهَا مُصۡبِحِينَ

Verses.Text: leaving no thought for Allah’s Will.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَا يَسۡتَثۡنُونَ

Verses.Text: Then it was struck by a torment from your Lord while they slept,
Verses.Arabic: فَطَافَ عَلَيۡهَا طَآئِفٞ مِّن رَّبِّكَ وَهُمۡ نَآئِمُونَ

Verses.Text: so it was reduced to ashes.
Verses.Arabic: فَأَصۡبَحَتۡ كَٱلصَّرِيمِ

Verses.Text: Then by daybreak they called out to each other,
Verses.Arabic: فَتَنَادَوۡاْ مُصۡبِحِينَ

Verses.Text: ˹saying,˺ “Go early to your harvest, if you want to pick ˹all˺ the fruit.”
Verses.Arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

Verses.Text: So they went off, whispering to one another,
Verses.Arabic: فَٱنطَلَقُواْ وَهُمۡ يَتَخَٰفَتُونَ

Verses.Text: “Do not let any poor person enter your garden today.”
Verses.Arabic: أَن لَّا يَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّسۡكِينٞ

Verses.Text: And they proceeded early, totally fixated on their purpose.
Verses.Arabic: وَغَدَوۡاْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡدٖ قَٰدِرِينَ

Verses.Text: But when they saw it ˹devastated˺, they cried, “We must have lost ˹our˺ way!
Verses.Arabic: فَلَمَّا رَأَوۡهَا قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا لَضَآلُّونَ

Verses.Text: In fact, we have been deprived ˹of our livelihood˺.”
Verses.Arabic: بَلۡ نَحۡنُ مَحۡرُومُونَ

Verses.Text: The most sensible of them said, “Did I not urge you to say, ‘Allah willing.’?”
Verses.Arabic: قَالَ أَوۡسَطُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ لَوۡلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ

Verses.Text: They replied, “Glory be to our Lord! We have truly been wrongdoers.”
Verses.Arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

Verses.Text: Then they turned on each other, throwing blame.
Verses.Arabic: فَأَقۡبَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ يَتَلَٰوَمُونَ

Verses.Text: They said, “Woe to us! We have certainly been transgressors.
Verses.Arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا طَٰغِينَ

Verses.Text: We trust our Lord will give us a better garden than this, ˹for˺ we are indeed turning to our Lord with hope.”
Verses.Arabic: عَسَىٰ رَبُّنَآ أَن يُبۡدِلَنَا خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهَآ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا رَٰغِبُونَ

Verses.Text: That is the ˹way of Our˺ punishment ˹in this world˺. But the punishment of the Hereafter is certainly far worse, if only they knew.
Verses.Arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡعَذَابُۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُۚ لَوۡ كَانُواْ يَعۡلَمُونَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, the righteous will have the Gardens of Bliss with their Lord.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

Verses.Text: Should We then treat those who have submitted like the wicked?
Verses.Arabic: أَفَنَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡمُسۡلِمِينَ كَٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

Verses.Text: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?
Verses.Arabic: مَا لَكُمۡ كَيۡفَ تَحۡكُمُونَ

Verses.Text: Or do you have a scripture, in which you read
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ لَكُمۡ كِتَٰبٞ فِيهِ تَدۡرُسُونَ

Verses.Text: that you will have whatever you choose?
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ لَكُمۡ فِيهِ لَمَا تَخَيَّرُونَ

Verses.Text: Or do you have oaths binding on Us until the Day of Judgment that you will have whatever you decide?
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ لَكُمۡ أَيۡمَٰنٌ عَلَيۡنَا بَٰلِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ إِنَّ لَكُمۡ لَمَا تَحۡكُمُونَ

Verses.Text: Ask them ˹O Prophet˺ which of them can guarantee all that.
Verses.Arabic: سَلۡهُمۡ أَيُّهُم بِذَٰلِكَ زَعِيمٌ

Verses.Text: Or do they have associate-gods ˹supporting this claim˺? Then let them bring forth their associate-gods, if what they say is true.
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَآءُ فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

Verses.Text: ˹Beware of˺ the Day the Shin ˹of Allah˺ will be bared, and the wicked will be asked to prostrate, but they will not be able to do so,
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ يُكۡشَفُ عَن سَاقٖ وَيُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ

Verses.Text: with eyes downcast, totally covered with disgrace. For they were ˹always˺ called to prostrate ˹in the world˺ when they were fully capable ˹but they chose not to˺.
Verses.Arabic: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ وَقَدۡ كَانُواْ يُدۡعَوۡنَ إِلَى ٱلسُّجُودِ وَهُمۡ سَٰلِمُونَ

Verses.Text: So leave to Me ˹O Prophet˺ those who reject this message. We will gradually draw them to destruction in ways they cannot comprehend.
Verses.Arabic: فَذَرۡنِي وَمَن يُكَذِّبُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِۖ سَنَسۡتَدۡرِجُهُم مِّنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

Verses.Text: I ˹only˺ delay their end for a while, but My planning is flawless.
Verses.Arabic: وَأُمۡلِي لَهُمۡۚ إِنَّ كَيۡدِي مَتِينٌ

Verses.Text: Or are you asking them for a reward ˹for the message˺ so that they are overburdened by debt?
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ

Verses.Text: Or do they have access to ˹the Record in˺ the unseen, so they copy it ˹for all to see˺?
Verses.Arabic: أَمۡ عِندَهُمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبُ فَهُمۡ يَكۡتُبُونَ

Verses.Text: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not be like ˹Jonah,˺ the Man of the Whale, who cried out ˹to Allah˺, in total distress.
Verses.Arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُن كَصَاحِبِ ٱلۡحُوتِ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكۡظُومٞ

Verses.Text: Had he not been shown grace by his Lord, he would have certainly been cast onto the open ˹shore˺, still blameworthy.
Verses.Arabic: لَّوۡلَآ أَن تَدَٰرَكَهُۥ نِعۡمَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ لَنُبِذَ بِٱلۡعَرَآءِ وَهُوَ مَذۡمُومٞ

Verses.Text: Then his Lord chose him, making him one of the righteous.
Verses.Arabic: فَٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَجَعَلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ

Verses.Text: The disbelievers would almost cut you down with their eyes when they hear ˹you recite˺ the Reminder, and say, “He is certainly a madman.”
Verses.Arabic: وَإِن يَكَادُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَيُزۡلِقُونَكَ بِأَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡ لَمَّا سَمِعُواْ ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِنَّهُۥ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

Verses.Text: But it is simply a reminder to the whole world.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

Verses.Text: The Inevitable Hour!
Verses.Arabic: ٱلۡحَآقَّةُ

Verses.Text: What is the Inevitable Hour?
Verses.Arabic: مَا ٱلۡحَآقَّةُ

Verses.Text: And what will make you realize what the Inevitable Hour is?
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡحَآقَّةُ

Verses.Text: ˹Both˺ Thamûd and ’Ȃd denied the Striking Disaster.
Verses.Arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ وَعَادُۢ بِٱلۡقَارِعَةِ

Verses.Text: As for Thamûd, they were destroyed by an overwhelming blast.
Verses.Arabic: فَأَمَّا ثَمُودُ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِٱلطَّاغِيَةِ

Verses.Text: And as for ’Ȃd, they were destroyed by a furious, bitter wind
Verses.Arabic: وَأَمَّا عَادٞ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِرِيحٖ صَرۡصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٖ

Verses.Text: which Allah unleashed on them non-stop for seven nights and eight days, so that you would have seen its people lying dead like trunks of uprooted palm trees.
Verses.Arabic: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَبۡعَ لَيَالٖ وَثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومٗاۖ فَتَرَى ٱلۡقَوۡمَ فِيهَا صَرۡعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٍ خَاوِيَةٖ

Verses.Text: Do you see any of them left alive?
Verses.Arabic: فَهَلۡ تَرَىٰ لَهُم مِّنۢ بَاقِيَةٖ

Verses.Text: Also, Pharaoh and those before him, and ˹the people of˺ the overturned cities ˹of Lot˺ indulged in sin,
Verses.Arabic: وَجَآءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَن قَبۡلَهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلۡخَاطِئَةِ

Verses.Text: each disobeying their Lord’s messenger, so He seized them with a crushing grip.
Verses.Arabic: فَعَصَوۡاْ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ أَخۡذَةٗ رَّابِيَةً

Verses.Text: Indeed, when the floodwater had overflowed, We carried you in the floating Ark ˹with Noah˺,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ

Verses.Text: so that We may make this a reminder to you, and that attentive ears may grasp it.
Verses.Arabic: لِنَجۡعَلَهَا لَكُمۡ تَذۡكِرَةٗ وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٞ وَٰعِيَةٞ

Verses.Text: At last, when the Trumpet will be blown with one blast,
Verses.Arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ نَفۡخَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ

Verses.Text: and the earth and mountains will be lifted up and crushed with one blow,
Verses.Arabic: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ

Verses.Text: on that Day the Inevitable Event will have come to pass.
Verses.Arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ وَقَعَتِ ٱلۡوَاقِعَةُ

Verses.Text: The sky will then be so torn that it will be frail,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱنشَقَّتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَهِيَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَاهِيَةٞ

Verses.Text: with the angels on its sides. On that Day eight ˹mighty angels˺ will bear the Throne of your Lord above them.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرۡجَآئِهَاۚ وَيَحۡمِلُ عَرۡشَ رَبِّكَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ ثَمَٰنِيَةٞ

Verses.Text: You will then be presented ˹before Him for judgment˺, and none of your secrets will stay hidden.
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ

Verses.Text: As for those given their records in their right hand, they will cry ˹happily˺, “Here ˹everyone˺! Read my record!
Verses.Arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقۡرَءُواْ كِتَٰبِيَهۡ

Verses.Text: I surely knew I would face my reckoning.”
Verses.Arabic: إِنِّي ظَنَنتُ أَنِّي مُلَٰقٍ حِسَابِيَهۡ

Verses.Text: They will be in a life of bliss,
Verses.Arabic: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٖ رَّاضِيَةٖ

Verses.Text: in an elevated Garden,
Verses.Arabic: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٖ

Verses.Text: whose fruit will hang within reach.
Verses.Arabic: قُطُوفُهَا دَانِيَةٞ

Verses.Text: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink joyfully for what you did in the days gone by.”
Verses.Arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَآ أَسۡلَفۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَيَّامِ ٱلۡخَالِيَةِ

Verses.Text: And as for those given their record in their left hand, they will cry ˹bitterly˺, “I wish I had not been given my record,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أُوتَ كِتَٰبِيَهۡ

Verses.Text: nor known anything of my reckoning!
Verses.Arabic: وَلَمۡ أَدۡرِ مَا حِسَابِيَهۡ

Verses.Text: I wish death was the end!
Verses.Arabic: يَٰلَيۡتَهَا كَانَتِ ٱلۡقَاضِيَةَ

Verses.Text: My wealth has not benefited me!
Verses.Arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنِّي مَالِيَهۡۜ

Verses.Text: My authority has been stripped from me.”
Verses.Arabic: هَلَكَ عَنِّي سُلۡطَٰنِيَهۡ

Verses.Text: ˹It will be said,˺ “Seize and shackle them,
Verses.Arabic: خُذُوهُ فَغُلُّوهُ

Verses.Text: then burn them in Hell,
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ ٱلۡجَحِيمَ صَلُّوهُ

Verses.Text: then tie them up with chains seventy arms long.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ فِي سِلۡسِلَةٖ ذَرۡعُهَا سَبۡعُونَ ذِرَاعٗا فَٱسۡلُكُوهُ

Verses.Text: For they never had faith in Allah, the Greatest,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

Verses.Text: nor encouraged the feeding of the poor.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ

Verses.Text: So this Day they will have no close friend here,
Verses.Arabic: فَلَيۡسَ لَهُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ هَٰهُنَا حَمِيمٞ

Verses.Text: nor any food except ˹oozing˺ pus,
Verses.Arabic: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنۡ غِسۡلِينٖ

Verses.Text: which none will eat except the evildoers.”
Verses.Arabic: لَّا يَأۡكُلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡخَٰطِـُٔونَ

Verses.Text: Now, I do swear by whatever you see,
Verses.Arabic: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِمَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

Verses.Text: and whatever you cannot see!
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the recitation of a noble Messenger.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلُ رَسُولٖ كَرِيمٖ

Verses.Text: It is not the prose of a poet ˹as you claim˺, ˹yet˺ you hardly have any faith.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَاعِرٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تُؤۡمِنُونَ

Verses.Text: Nor is it the mumbling of a fortune-teller, ˹yet˺ you are hardly mindful.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِنٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ

Verses.Text: ˹It is˺ a revelation from the Lord of all worlds.
Verses.Arabic: تَنزِيلٞ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

Verses.Text: Had the Messenger made up something in Our Name,
Verses.Arabic: وَلَوۡ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَيۡنَا بَعۡضَ ٱلۡأَقَاوِيلِ

Verses.Text: We would have certainly seized him by his right hand,
Verses.Arabic: لَأَخَذۡنَا مِنۡهُ بِٱلۡيَمِينِ

Verses.Text: then severed his aorta,
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ لَقَطَعۡنَا مِنۡهُ ٱلۡوَتِينَ

Verses.Text: and none of you could have shielded him ˹from Us˺!
Verses.Arabic: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنۡ أَحَدٍ عَنۡهُ حَٰجِزِينَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is a reminder to those mindful ˹of Allah˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَتَذۡكِرَةٞ لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

Verses.Text: And We certainly know that some of you will persist in denial,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَعۡلَمُ أَنَّ مِنكُم مُّكَذِّبِينَ

Verses.Text: and it will surely be a source of regret for the disbelievers.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَسۡرَةٌ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

Verses.Text: And indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the absolute truth.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَحَقُّ ٱلۡيَقِينِ

Verses.Text: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Greatest.
Verses.Arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

Verses.Text: A challenger has demanded a punishment bound to come
Verses.Arabic: سَأَلَ سَآئِلُۢ بِعَذَابٖ وَاقِعٖ

Verses.Text: for the disbelievers—to be averted by none—
Verses.Arabic: لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ لَيۡسَ لَهُۥ دَافِعٞ

Verses.Text: from Allah, Lord of pathways of ˹heavenly˺ ascent,
Verses.Arabic: مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ذِي ٱلۡمَعَارِجِ

Verses.Text: ˹through which˺ the angels and the ˹holy˺ spirit will ascend to Him on a Day fifty thousand years in length.
Verses.Arabic: تَعۡرُجُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ إِلَيۡهِ فِي يَوۡمٖ كَانَ مِقۡدَارُهُۥ خَمۡسِينَ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٖ

Verses.Text: So endure ˹this denial, O  Prophet,˺ with beautiful patience.
Verses.Arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ صَبۡرٗا جَمِيلًا

Verses.Text: They truly see this ˹Day˺ as impossible,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ يَرَوۡنَهُۥ بَعِيدٗا

Verses.Text: but We see it as inevitable.
Verses.Arabic: وَنَرَىٰهُ قَرِيبٗا

Verses.Text: On that Day the sky will be like molten brass
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ تَكُونُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ كَٱلۡمُهۡلِ

Verses.Text: and the mountains like ˹tufts of˺ wool.
Verses.Arabic: وَتَكُونُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَٱلۡعِهۡنِ

Verses.Text: And no close friend will ask ˹about˺ their friends,
Verses.Arabic: وَلَا يَسۡـَٔلُ حَمِيمٌ حَمِيمٗا

Verses.Text: ˹although˺ they will be made to see each other. The wicked will wish to ransom themselves from the punishment of that Day by their children,
Verses.Arabic: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمۡۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُ لَوۡ يَفۡتَدِي مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمِئِذِۭ بِبَنِيهِ

Verses.Text: their spouses, their siblings,
Verses.Arabic: وَصَٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَأَخِيهِ

Verses.Text: their clan that sheltered them,
Verses.Arabic: وَفَصِيلَتِهِ ٱلَّتِي تُـٔۡوِيهِ

Verses.Text: and everyone on earth altogether, just to save themselves.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ

Verses.Text: But no! There will certainly be a raging Flame
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِنَّهَا لَظَىٰ

Verses.Text: ripping off scalps.
Verses.Arabic: نَزَّاعَةٗ لِّلشَّوَىٰ

Verses.Text: It will summon whoever turned their backs ˹on Allah˺ and turned away ˹from the truth˺,
Verses.Arabic: تَدۡعُواْ مَنۡ أَدۡبَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

Verses.Text: and gathered and hoarded ˹wealth˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَجَمَعَ فَأَوۡعَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Indeed, humankind was created impatient:
Verses.Arabic: ۞إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا

Verses.Text: distressed when touched with evil,
Verses.Arabic: إِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلشَّرُّ جَزُوعٗا

Verses.Text: and withholding when touched with good—
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ ٱلۡخَيۡرُ مَنُوعًا

Verses.Text: except those who pray,
Verses.Arabic: إِلَّا ٱلۡمُصَلِّينَ

Verses.Text: consistently performing their prayers;
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمۡ دَآئِمُونَ

Verses.Text: and who give the rightful share of their wealth
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ فِيٓ أَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ حَقّٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

Verses.Text: to the beggar and the poor;
Verses.Arabic: لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلۡمَحۡرُومِ

Verses.Text: and who ˹firmly˺ believe in the Day of Judgment;
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

Verses.Text: and those who fear the punishment of their Lord—
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

Verses.Text: ˹knowing that˺ none should feel secure from their Lord’s punishment—
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمۡ غَيۡرُ مَأۡمُونٖ

Verses.Text: and those who guard their chastity
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ لِفُرُوجِهِمۡ حَٰفِظُونَ

Verses.Text: except with their wives or those ˹bondwomen˺ in their possession, for then they are free from blame,
Verses.Arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُومِينَ

Verses.Text: but whoever seeks beyond that are the transgressors.
Verses.Arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

Verses.Text: ˹The faithful are˺ also those who are true to their trusts and covenants;
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ لِأَمَٰنَٰتِهِمۡ وَعَهۡدِهِمۡ رَٰعُونَ

Verses.Text: and who are honest in their testimony;
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِشَهَٰدَٰتِهِمۡ قَآئِمُونَ

Verses.Text: and who are ˹properly˺ observant of their prayers.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمۡ يُحَافِظُونَ

Verses.Text: These will be in Gardens, held in honour.
Verses.Arabic: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ مُّكۡرَمُونَ

Verses.Text: So what is the matter with the disbelievers that they rush ˹head-long˺ towards you ˹O Prophet˺,
Verses.Arabic: فَمَالِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ قِبَلَكَ مُهۡطِعِينَ

Verses.Text: from the right and the left, in groups ˹to mock you˺?
Verses.Arabic: عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ عِزِينَ

Verses.Text: Does every one of them expect to be admitted into a Garden of Bliss?
Verses.Arabic: أَيَطۡمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُدۡخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٖ

Verses.Text: But no! Indeed, they ˹already˺ know what We created them from.
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُم مِّمَّا يَعۡلَمُونَ

Verses.Text: So, I do swear by the Lord of ˹all˺ the points of sunrise and sunset that We are truly capable
Verses.Arabic: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغَٰرِبِ إِنَّا لَقَٰدِرُونَ

Verses.Text: of replacing them with ˹others˺ better than them, and We cannot be prevented ˹from doing so˺.
Verses.Arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

Verses.Text: So let them indulge ˹in falsehood˺ and amuse ˹themselves˺ until they face their Day, which they have been threatened with—
Verses.Arabic: فَذَرۡهُمۡ يَخُوضُواْ وَيَلۡعَبُواْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

Verses.Text: the Day they will come forth from the graves swiftly, as if racing to an idol ˹for a blessing˺,
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ سِرَاعٗا كَأَنَّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ نُصُبٖ يُوفِضُونَ

Verses.Text: with eyes downcast, utterly covered with disgrace. That is the Day they have ˹always˺ been warned of.
Verses.Arabic: خَٰشِعَةً أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلَّذِي كَانُواْ يُوعَدُونَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people ˹saying to him˺, “Warn your people before a painful punishment comes to them.”
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَنۡ أَنذِرۡ قَوۡمَكَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

Verses.Text: Noah proclaimed, “O my people! I am truly sent to you with a clear warning:
Verses.Arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

Verses.Text: worship Allah ˹alone˺, fear Him, and obey me.
Verses.Arabic: أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ

Verses.Text: He will forgive your sins, and delay your end until the appointed time. Indeed, when the time set by Allah comes, it cannot be delayed, if only you knew!”
Verses.Arabic: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمًّىۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُۚ لَوۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

Verses.Text: He cried, “My Lord! I have surely called my people day and night,
Verses.Arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

Verses.Text: but my calls only made them run farther away.
Verses.Arabic: فَلَمۡ يَزِدۡهُمۡ دُعَآءِيٓ إِلَّا فِرَارٗا

Verses.Text: And whenever I invite them to be forgiven by You, they press their fingers into their ears, cover themselves with their clothes, persist ˹in denial˺, and act very arrogantly.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ لِتَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ جَعَلُوٓاْ أَصَٰبِعَهُمۡ فِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَٱسۡتَغۡشَوۡاْ ثِيَابَهُمۡ وَأَصَرُّواْ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ ٱسۡتِكۡبَارٗا

Verses.Text: Then I certainly called them openly,
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ جِهَارٗا

Verses.Text: then I surely preached to them publicly and privately,
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارٗا

Verses.Text: saying, ‘Seek your Lord’s forgiveness, ˹for˺ He is truly Most Forgiving.
Verses.Arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

Verses.Text: He will shower you with abundant rain,
Verses.Arabic: يُرۡسِلِ ٱلسَّمَآءَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّدۡرَارٗا

Verses.Text: supply you with wealth and children, and give you gardens as well as rivers.
Verses.Arabic: وَيُمۡدِدۡكُم بِأَمۡوَٰلٖ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٖ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ أَنۡهَٰرٗا

Verses.Text: What is the matter with you that you are not in awe of the Majesty of Allah,
Verses.Arabic: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارٗا

Verses.Text: when He truly created you in stages ˹of development˺?
Verses.Arabic: وَقَدۡ خَلَقَكُمۡ أَطۡوَارًا

Verses.Text: Do you not see how Allah created seven heavens, one above the other,
Verses.Arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَٰتٖ طِبَاقٗا

Verses.Text: placing the moon within them as a ˹reflected˺ light, and the sun as a ˹radiant˺ lamp?
Verses.Arabic: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجٗا

Verses.Text: Allah ˹alone˺ caused you to grow from the earth like a plant.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ نَبَاتٗا

Verses.Text: Then He will return you to it, and then simply bring you forth ˹again˺.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمۡ فِيهَا وَيُخۡرِجُكُمۡ إِخۡرَاجٗا

Verses.Text: And Allah ˹alone˺ spread out the earth for you
Verses.Arabic: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِسَاطٗا

Verses.Text: to walk along its spacious pathways.’”
Verses.Arabic: لِّتَسۡلُكُواْ مِنۡهَا سُبُلٗا فِجَاجٗا

Verses.Text: ˹Eventually,˺ Noah cried, “My Lord! They have certainly persisted in disobeying me, and followed ˹instead˺ those ˹elite˺ whose ˹abundant˺ wealth and children only increase them in loss,
Verses.Arabic: قَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِي وَٱتَّبَعُواْ مَن لَّمۡ يَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا

Verses.Text: and who have devised a tremendous plot,
Verses.Arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا كُبَّارٗا

Verses.Text: urging ˹their followers˺, ‘Do not abandon your idols—especially Wadd, Suwâ’, Yaghûth, Ya’ûq, and Nasr.’
Verses.Arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدّٗا وَلَا سُوَاعٗا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرٗا

Verses.Text: Those ˹elite˺ have already led many astray. So ˹O Lord˺, only allow the wrongdoers to stray farther away.”
Verses.Arabic: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلٗا

Verses.Text: So because of their sins, they were drowned, then admitted into the Fire. And they found none to help them against Allah.
Verses.Arabic: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٰٔتِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُواْ فَأُدۡخِلُواْ نَارٗا فَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارٗا

Verses.Text: Noah had prayed, “My Lord! Do not leave a single disbeliever on earth.
Verses.Arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا

Verses.Text: For if You spare ˹any of˺ them, they will certainly mislead Your servants, and give birth only to ˹wicked˺ sinners, staunch disbelievers.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ يُضِلُّواْ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓاْ إِلَّا فَاجِرٗا كَفَّارٗا

Verses.Text: My Lord! Forgive me, my parents, and whoever enters my house in faith, and ˹all˺ believing men and women. And increase the wrongdoers only in destruction.”
Verses.Arabic: رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيۡتِيَ مُؤۡمِنٗا وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارَۢا

Verses.Text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “It has been revealed to me that a group of jinn listened ˹to the Quran,˺ and said ˹to their fellow jinn˺: ‘Indeed, we have heard a wondrous recitation.
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسۡتَمَعَ نَفَرٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا سَمِعۡنَا قُرۡءَانًا عَجَبٗا

Verses.Text: It leads to Right Guidance so we believed in it, and we will never associate anyone with our Lord ˹in worship˺.
Verses.Arabic: يَهۡدِيٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشۡدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ وَلَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدٗا

Verses.Text: ˹Now, we believe that˺ our Lord—Exalted is His Majesty—has neither taken a mate nor offspring,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةٗ وَلَا وَلَدٗا

Verses.Text: and that the foolish of us used to utter ˹outrageous˺ falsehoods about Allah.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطٗا

Verses.Text: We certainly thought that humans and jinn would never speak lies about Allah.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلۡإِنسُ وَٱلۡجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا

Verses.Text: And some men used to seek refuge with some jinn—so they increased each other in wickedness.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمۡ رَهَقٗا

Verses.Text: And those ˹humans˺ thought, just like you ˹jinn˺, that Allah would not resurrect anyone ˹for judgment˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّهُمۡ ظَنُّواْ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن لَّن يَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٗا

Verses.Text: ˹Earlier˺ we tried to reach heaven ˹for news˺, only to find it filled with stern guards and shooting stars.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَسۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدۡنَٰهَا مُلِئَتۡ حَرَسٗا شَدِيدٗا وَشُهُبٗا

Verses.Text: We used to take up positions there for eavesdropping, but whoever dares eavesdrop now will find a flare lying in wait for them.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقۡعُدُ مِنۡهَا مَقَٰعِدَ لِلسَّمۡعِۖ فَمَن يَسۡتَمِعِ ٱلۡأٓنَ يَجِدۡ لَهُۥ شِهَابٗا رَّصَدٗا

Verses.Text: Now, we have no clue whether evil is intended for those on earth, or their Lord intends for them what is right.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدۡرِيٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ أَرَادَ بِهِمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ رَشَدٗا

Verses.Text: Among us are those who are righteous and those who are less so. We have been of different factions.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدٗا

Verses.Text: ˹Now,˺ we truly know that we cannot frustrate Allah on earth, nor can we escape from Him ˹into heaven˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعۡجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَن نُّعۡجِزَهُۥ هَرَبٗا

Verses.Text: When we heard the guidance ˹of the Quran˺, we ˹readily˺ believed in it. For whoever believes in their Lord will have no fear of being denied ˹a reward˺ or wronged.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعۡنَا ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ فَمَن يُؤۡمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخۡسٗا وَلَا رَهَقٗا

Verses.Text: And among us are those who have submitted ˹to Allah˺ and those who are deviant. So ˹as for˺ those who submitted, it is they who have attained Right Guidance.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلۡمُسۡلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلۡقَٰسِطُونَۖ فَمَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوۡاْ رَشَدٗا

Verses.Text: And as for the deviant, they will be fuel for Hell.’”
Verses.Arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلۡقَٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُواْ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبٗا

Verses.Text: Had the deniers followed the Right Way, We would have certainly granted them abundant rain to drink—
Verses.Arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقٗا

Verses.Text: as a test for them. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of their Lord will be admitted by Him into an overwhelming punishment.
Verses.Arabic: لِّنَفۡتِنَهُمۡ فِيهِۚ وَمَن يُعۡرِضۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسۡلُكۡهُ عَذَابٗا صَعَدٗا

Verses.Text: The places of worship are ˹only˺ for Allah, so do not invoke anyone besides Him.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٗا

Verses.Text: Yet when the servant of Allah stood up calling upon Him ˹alone˺, the pagans almost swarmed over him.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدۡعُوهُ كَادُواْ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِ لِبَدٗا

Verses.Text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I call only upon my Lord, associating none with Him ˹in worship˺.”
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا

Verses.Text: Say, “It is not in my power to harm or benefit you.”
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا رَشَدٗا

Verses.Text: Say, “No one can protect me from Allah ˹if I were to disobey Him˺, nor can I find any refuge other than Him.
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٞ وَلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدًا

Verses.Text: ˹My duty is˺ only to convey ˹the truth˺ from Allah and ˹deliver˺ His messages.” And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger will certainly be in the Fire of Hell, to stay there for ever and ever.
Verses.Arabic: إِلَّا بَلَٰغٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَٰلَٰتِهِۦۚ وَمَن يَعۡصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا

Verses.Text: Only when they see what they have been threatened with will they know who is weaker in helpers and inferior in manpower.
Verses.Arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوۡاْ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَضۡعَفُ نَاصِرٗا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدٗا

Verses.Text: Say, “I do not know if what you are promised is near or my Lord has set a distant time for it.
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ يَجۡعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّيٓ أَمَدًا

Verses.Text: ˹He is the˺ Knower of the unseen, disclosing none of it to anyone,
Verses.Arabic: عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ فَلَا يُظۡهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيۡبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا

Verses.Text: except messengers of His choice. Then He appoints angel-guards before and behind them
Verses.Arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٖ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسۡلُكُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦ رَصَدٗا

Verses.Text: to ensure that the messengers fully deliver the messages of their Lord—though He ˹already˺ knows all about them, and keeps account of everything.”
Verses.Arabic: لِّيَعۡلَمَ أَن قَدۡ أَبۡلَغُواْ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ وَأَحۡصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عَدَدَۢا

Verses.Text: O you wrapped ˹in your clothes˺!
Verses.Arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمُزَّمِّلُ

Verses.Text: Stand all night ˹in prayer˺ except a little—
Verses.Arabic: قُمِ ٱلَّيۡلَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا

Verses.Text: ˹pray˺ half the night, or a little less,
Verses.Arabic: نِّصۡفَهُۥٓ أَوِ ٱنقُصۡ مِنۡهُ قَلِيلًا

Verses.Text: or a little more—and recite the Quran ˹properly˺ in a measured way.
Verses.Arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا

Verses.Text: ˹For˺ We will soon send upon you a weighty revelation.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّا سَنُلۡقِي عَلَيۡكَ قَوۡلٗا ثَقِيلًا

Verses.Text: Indeed, worship in the night is more impactful and suitable for recitation.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ نَاشِئَةَ ٱلَّيۡلِ هِيَ أَشَدُّ وَطۡـٔٗا وَأَقۡوَمُ قِيلًا

Verses.Text: For during the day you are over-occupied ˹with worldly duties˺.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ لَكَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ سَبۡحٗا طَوِيلٗا

Verses.Text: ˹Always˺ remember the Name of your Lord, and devote yourself to Him wholeheartedly.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

Verses.Text: ˹He is the˺ Lord of the east and the west. There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him, so take Him ˹alone˺ as a Trustee of Affairs.
Verses.Arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلۡمَشۡرِقِ وَٱلۡمَغۡرِبِ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَٱتَّخِذۡهُ وَكِيلٗا

Verses.Text: Be patient ˹O Prophet˺ with what they say, and depart from them courteously.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهۡجُرۡهُمۡ هَجۡرٗا جَمِيلٗا

Verses.Text: And leave to Me the deniers—the people of luxury—and bear with them for a little while.
Verses.Arabic: وَذَرۡنِي وَٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ أُوْلِي ٱلنَّعۡمَةِ وَمَهِّلۡهُمۡ قَلِيلًا

Verses.Text: ˹For˺ We certainly have shackles, a ˹raging˺ Fire,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ لَدَيۡنَآ أَنكَالٗا وَجَحِيمٗا

Verses.Text: choking food, and a painful punishment ˹in store for them˺
Verses.Arabic: وَطَعَامٗا ذَا غُصَّةٖ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمٗا

Verses.Text: on the Day the earth and mountains will shake ˹violently˺, and mountains will be ˹reduced to˺ dunes of shifting sand.
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَثِيبٗا مَّهِيلًا

Verses.Text: Indeed, We have sent to you a messenger as a witness over you, just as We sent a messenger to Pharaoh.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ رَسُولٗا شَٰهِدًا عَلَيۡكُمۡ كَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ رَسُولٗا

Verses.Text: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a stern grip.
Verses.Arabic: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ أَخۡذٗا وَبِيلٗا

Verses.Text: If you ˹pagans˺ persist in disbelief, then how will you guard yourselves against ˹the horrors of˺ a Day which will turn children’s hair grey?
Verses.Arabic: فَكَيۡفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرۡتُمۡ يَوۡمٗا يَجۡعَلُ ٱلۡوِلۡدَٰنَ شِيبًا

Verses.Text: It will ˹even˺ cause the sky to split apart. His promise ˹of judgment˺ must be fulfilled.
Verses.Arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا

Verses.Text: Surely this is a reminder. So let whoever wills take the ˹Right˺ Way to their Lord.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

Verses.Text: Surely your Lord knows that you ˹O Prophet˺ stand ˹in prayer˺ for nearly two-thirds of the night, or ˹sometimes˺ half of it, or a third, as do some of those with you. Allah ˹alone˺ keeps a ˹precise˺ measure of the day and night. He knows that you ˹believers˺ are unable to endure this, and has turned to you in mercy. So recite ˹in prayer˺ whatever you can from the Quran. He knows that some of you will be sick, some will be travelling throughout the land seeking Allah’s bounty, and some fighting in the cause of Allah. So recite whatever you can from it. And ˹continue to˺ perform ˹regular˺ prayers, pay alms-tax, and lend to Allah a good loan. Whatever good you send forth for yourselves, you will find it with Allah far better and more rewarding. And seek Allah’s forgiveness. Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Verses.Arabic: ۞إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعۡلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدۡنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَيِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَنِصۡفَهُۥ وَثُلُثَهُۥ وَطَآئِفَةٞ مِّنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مَعَكَۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحۡصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ فَٱقۡرَءُواْ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرۡضَىٰ وَءَاخَرُونَ يَضۡرِبُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَبۡتَغُونَ مِن فَضۡلِ ٱللَّهِ وَءَاخَرُونَ يُقَٰتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۖ فَٱقۡرَءُواْ مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنۡهُۚ وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَقۡرِضُواْ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗاۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُواْ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنۡ خَيۡرٖ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ هُوَ خَيۡرٗا وَأَعۡظَمَ أَجۡرٗاۚ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمُۢ

Verses.Text: O you covered up ˹in your clothes˺!
Verses.Arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمُدَّثِّرُ

Verses.Text: Arise and warn ˹all˺.
Verses.Arabic: قُمۡ فَأَنذِرۡ

Verses.Text: Revere your Lord ˹alone˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرۡ

Verses.Text: Purify your garments.
Verses.Arabic: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرۡ

Verses.Text: ˹Continue to˺ shun idols.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلرُّجۡزَ فَٱهۡجُرۡ

Verses.Text: Do not do a favour expecting more ˹in return˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَا تَمۡنُن تَسۡتَكۡثِرُ

Verses.Text: And persevere for ˹the sake of˺ your Lord.
Verses.Arabic: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَٱصۡبِرۡ

Verses.Text: ˹For˺ when the Trumpet will be sounded,
Verses.Arabic: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِي ٱلنَّاقُورِ

Verses.Text: that will ˹truly˺ be a difficult Day—
Verses.Arabic: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَوۡمٌ عَسِيرٌ

Verses.Text: far from easy for the disbelievers.
Verses.Arabic: عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ غَيۡرُ يَسِيرٖ

Verses.Text: And leave to me ˹O Prophet˺ the one I created all by Myself,
Verses.Arabic: ذَرۡنِي وَمَنۡ خَلَقۡتُ وَحِيدٗا

Verses.Text: and granted him abundant wealth,
Verses.Arabic: وَجَعَلۡتُ لَهُۥ مَالٗا مَّمۡدُودٗا

Verses.Text: and children always by his side,
Verses.Arabic: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودٗا

Verses.Text: and made life very easy for him.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُۥ تَمۡهِيدٗا

Verses.Text: Yet he is hungry for more.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ يَطۡمَعُ أَنۡ أَزِيدَ

Verses.Text: But no! ˹For˺ he has been truly stubborn with Our revelations.
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِأٓيَٰتِنَا عَنِيدٗا

Verses.Text: I will make his fate unbearable,
Verses.Arabic: سَأُرۡهِقُهُۥ صَعُودًا

Verses.Text: for he contemplated and determined ˹a degrading label for the Quran˺.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهُۥ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ

Verses.Text: May he be condemned! How evil was what he determined!
Verses.Arabic: فَقُتِلَ كَيۡفَ قَدَّرَ

Verses.Text: May he be condemned even more! How evil was what he determined!
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيۡفَ قَدَّرَ

Verses.Text: Then he re-contemplated ˹in frustration˺,
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ

Verses.Text: then frowned and scowled,
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ

Verses.Text: then turned his back ˹on the truth˺ and acted arrogantly,
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ أَدۡبَرَ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ

Verses.Text: saying, “This ˹Quran˺ is nothing but magic from the ancients.
Verses.Arabic: فَقَالَ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ يُؤۡثَرُ

Verses.Text: This is no more than the word of a man.”
Verses.Arabic: إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا قَوۡلُ ٱلۡبَشَرِ

Verses.Text: Soon I will burn him in Hell!
Verses.Arabic: سَأُصۡلِيهِ سَقَرَ

Verses.Text: And what will make you realize what Hell is?
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا سَقَرُ

Verses.Text: It does not let anyone live or die,
Verses.Arabic: لَا تُبۡقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ

Verses.Text: scorching the skin.
Verses.Arabic: لَوَّاحَةٞ لِّلۡبَشَرِ

Verses.Text: It is overseen by nineteen ˹keepers˺.
Verses.Arabic: عَلَيۡهَا تِسۡعَةَ عَشَرَ

Verses.Text: We have appointed only ˹stern˺ angels as wardens of the Fire. And We have made their number only as a test for the disbelievers, so that the People of the Book will be certain, and the believers will increase in faith, and neither the People of the Book nor the believers will have any doubts, and so that those ˹hypocrites˺ with sickness in their hearts and the disbelievers will argue, “What does Allah mean by such a number?” In this way Allah leaves whoever He wills to stray and guides whoever He wills. And none knows the forces of your Lord except He. And this ˹description of Hell˺ is only a reminder to humanity.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَآ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلنَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَـٰٓئِكَةٗۖ وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا عِدَّتَهُمۡ إِلَّا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِيَسۡتَيۡقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَيَزۡدَادَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنٗا وَلَا يَرۡتَابَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَلِيَقُولَ ٱلَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٞ وَٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ مَاذَآ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ بِهَٰذَا مَثَلٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَمَا يَعۡلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَمَا هِيَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡبَشَرِ

Verses.Text: But no! By the moon,
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّا وَٱلۡقَمَرِ

Verses.Text: and the night as it retreats,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذۡ أَدۡبَرَ

Verses.Text: and the day as it breaks!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلصُّبۡحِ إِذَآ أَسۡفَرَ

Verses.Text: Surely Hell is one of the mightiest catastrophes—
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهَا لَإِحۡدَى ٱلۡكُبَرِ

Verses.Text: a warning to humankind,
Verses.Arabic: نَذِيرٗا لِّلۡبَشَرِ

Verses.Text: to whichever of you chooses to take the lead or lag behind.
Verses.Arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوۡ يَتَأَخَّرَ

Verses.Text: Every soul will be detained for what it has done,
Verses.Arabic: كُلُّ نَفۡسِۭ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ رَهِينَةٌ

Verses.Text: except the people of the right,
Verses.Arabic: إِلَّآ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

Verses.Text: who will be in Gardens, asking one another
Verses.Arabic: فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

Verses.Text: about the wicked ˹who will then be asked˺:
Verses.Arabic: عَنِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

Verses.Text: “What has landed you in Hell?”
Verses.Arabic: مَا سَلَكَكُمۡ فِي سَقَرَ

Verses.Text: They will reply, “We were not of those who prayed,
Verses.Arabic: قَالُواْ لَمۡ نَكُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُصَلِّينَ

Verses.Text: nor did we feed the poor.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَمۡ نَكُ نُطۡعِمُ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ

Verses.Text: We used to indulge ˹in falsehood˺ along with others,
Verses.Arabic: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ ٱلۡخَآئِضِينَ

Verses.Text: and deny the Day of Judgment,
Verses.Arabic: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

Verses.Text: until the inevitable came to us.”
Verses.Arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ أَتَىٰنَا ٱلۡيَقِينُ

Verses.Text: So the pleas of intercessors will be of no benefit to them.
Verses.Arabic: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمۡ شَفَٰعَةُ ٱلشَّـٰفِعِينَ

Verses.Text: Now, what is the matter with them that they are turning away from the reminder,
Verses.Arabic: فَمَا لَهُمۡ عَنِ ٱلتَّذۡكِرَةِ مُعۡرِضِينَ

Verses.Text: as if they were spooked zebras
Verses.Arabic: كَأَنَّهُمۡ حُمُرٞ مُّسۡتَنفِرَةٞ

Verses.Text: fleeing from a lion?
Verses.Arabic: فَرَّتۡ مِن قَسۡوَرَةِۭ

Verses.Text: In fact, each one of them wishes to be given a ˹personal˺ letter ˹from Allah˺ for all ˹to read˺.
Verses.Arabic: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُؤۡتَىٰ صُحُفٗا مُّنَشَّرَةٗ

Verses.Text: But no! In fact, they do not fear the Hereafter.
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ

Verses.Text: Enough! Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a reminder.
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُۥ تَذۡكِرَةٞ

Verses.Text: So let whoever wills be mindful of it.
Verses.Arabic: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ

Verses.Text: But they cannot do so unless Allah wills. He ˹alone˺ is worthy to be feared and entitled to forgive.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا يَذۡكُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ أَهۡلُ ٱلتَّقۡوَىٰ وَأَهۡلُ ٱلۡمَغۡفِرَةِ

Verses.Text: I do swear by the Day of Judgment!
Verses.Arabic: لَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ

Verses.Text: And I do swear by the self-reproaching soul!
Verses.Arabic: وَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلنَّفۡسِ ٱللَّوَّامَةِ

Verses.Text: Do people think We cannot reassemble their bones?
Verses.Arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَلَّن نَّجۡمَعَ عِظَامَهُۥ

Verses.Text: Yes ˹indeed˺! We are ˹most˺ capable of restoring ˹even˺ their very fingertips.
Verses.Arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ

Verses.Text: Still people want to deny what is yet to come,
Verses.Arabic: بَلۡ يُرِيدُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ لِيَفۡجُرَ أَمَامَهُۥ

Verses.Text: asking ˹mockingly˺, “When is this Day of Judgment?”
Verses.Arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُ أَيَّانَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ

Verses.Text: But when the sight is stunned,
Verses.Arabic: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ ٱلۡبَصَرُ

Verses.Text: and the moon is dimmed,
Verses.Arabic: وَخَسَفَ ٱلۡقَمَرُ

Verses.Text: and the sun and the moon are brought together,
Verses.Arabic: وَجُمِعَ ٱلشَّمۡسُ وَٱلۡقَمَرُ

Verses.Text: on that Day one will cry, “Where is the escape?”
Verses.Arabic: يَقُولُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ أَيۡنَ ٱلۡمَفَرُّ

Verses.Text: But no! There will be no refuge.
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ

Verses.Text: On that Day all will end up before your Lord.
Verses.Arabic: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقَرُّ

Verses.Text: All will then be informed of what they have sent forth and left behind.
Verses.Arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

Verses.Text: In fact, people will testify against their own souls,
Verses.Arabic: بَلِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦ بَصِيرَةٞ

Verses.Text: despite the excuses they come up with.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَوۡ أَلۡقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُۥ

Verses.Text: Do not rush your tongue trying to memorize ˹a revelation of˺ the Quran.
Verses.Arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ

Verses.Text: It is certainly upon Us to ˹make you˺ memorize and recite it.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا جَمۡعَهُۥ وَقُرۡءَانَهُۥ

Verses.Text: So once We have recited a revelation ˹through Gabriel˺, follow its recitation ˹closely˺.
Verses.Arabic: فَإِذَا قَرَأۡنَٰهُ فَٱتَّبِعۡ قُرۡءَانَهُۥ

Verses.Text: Then it is surely upon Us to make it clear ˹to you˺.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا بَيَانَهُۥ

Verses.Text: But no! In fact, you love this fleeting world,
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّا بَلۡ تُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ

Verses.Text: and neglect the Hereafter.
Verses.Arabic: وَتَذَرُونَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ

Verses.Text: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be bright,
Verses.Arabic: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ نَّاضِرَةٌ

Verses.Text: looking at their Lord.
Verses.Arabic: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٞ

Verses.Text: And ˹other˺ faces will be gloomy,
Verses.Arabic: وَوُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بَاسِرَةٞ

Verses.Text: anticipating something devastating to befall them.
Verses.Arabic: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفۡعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٞ

Verses.Text: But no! ˹Beware of the day˺ when the soul reaches the collar bone ˹as it leaves˺,
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّآ إِذَا بَلَغَتِ ٱلتَّرَاقِيَ

Verses.Text: and it will be said, “Is there any healer ˹who can save this life˺?”
Verses.Arabic: وَقِيلَ مَنۡۜ رَاقٖ

Verses.Text: And the dying person realizes it is ˹their˺ time to depart,
Verses.Arabic: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ ٱلۡفِرَاقُ

Verses.Text: and ˹then˺ their feet are tied together ˹in a shroud˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡتَفَّتِ ٱلسَّاقُ بِٱلسَّاقِ

Verses.Text: On that day they will be driven to your Lord ˹alone˺.
Verses.Arabic: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡمَسَاقُ

Verses.Text: This denier neither believed nor prayed,
Verses.Arabic: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ

Verses.Text: but persisted in denial and turned away,
Verses.Arabic: وَلَٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

Verses.Text: then went to their own people, walking boastfully.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ يَتَمَطَّىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Woe to you, and more woe!
Verses.Arabic: أَوۡلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوۡلَىٰ

Verses.Text: Again, woe to you, and even more woe!
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ أَوۡلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوۡلَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Do people think they will be left without purpose?
Verses.Arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَن يُتۡرَكَ سُدًى

Verses.Text: Were they not ˹once˺ a sperm-drop emitted?
Verses.Arabic: أَلَمۡ يَكُ نُطۡفَةٗ مِّن مَّنِيّٖ يُمۡنَىٰ

Verses.Text: Then they became a clinging clot ˹of blood˺, then He developed and perfected their form,
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةٗ فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ

Verses.Text: producing from it both sexes, male and female.
Verses.Arabic: فَجَعَلَ مِنۡهُ ٱلزَّوۡجَيۡنِ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Is such ˹a Creator˺ unable to bring the dead back to life?
Verses.Arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يُحۡـِۧيَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ

Verses.Text: Is there not a period of time when each human is nothing yet worth mentioning?
Verses.Arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلۡإِنسَٰنِ حِينٞ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهۡرِ لَمۡ يَكُن شَيۡـٔٗا مَّذۡكُورًا

Verses.Text: ˹For˺ indeed, We ˹alone˺ created humans from a drop of mixed fluids, ˹in order˺ to test them, so We made them hear and see.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّا خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ أَمۡشَاجٖ نَّبۡتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرًا

Verses.Text: We already showed them the Way, whether they ˹choose to˺ be grateful or ungrateful.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

Verses.Text: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains, shackles, and a blazing Fire.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَاْ وَأَغۡلَٰلٗا وَسَعِيرًا

Verses.Text: Indeed, the virtuous will have a drink ˹of pure wine˺—flavoured with camphor—
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ يَشۡرَبُونَ مِن كَأۡسٖ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا

Verses.Text: ˹from˺ a spring where Allah’s servants will drink, flowing at their will.
Verses.Arabic: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا

Verses.Text: They ˹are those who˺ fulfil ˹their˺ vows and fear a Day of sweeping horror,
Verses.Arabic: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذۡرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوۡمٗا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسۡتَطِيرٗا

Verses.Text: and give food—despite their desire for it—to the poor, the orphan, and the captive,
Verses.Arabic: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا

Verses.Text: ˹saying to themselves,˺ “We feed you only for the sake of Allah, seeking neither reward nor thanks from you.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطۡعِمُكُمۡ لِوَجۡهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَلَا شُكُورًا

Verses.Text: We fear from our Lord a horribly distressful Day.”
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا

Verses.Text: So Allah will deliver them from the horror of that Day, and grant them radiance and joy,
Verses.Arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمۡ نَضۡرَةٗ وَسُرُورٗا

Verses.Text: and reward them for their perseverance with a Garden ˹in Paradise˺ and ˹garments of˺ silk.
Verses.Arabic: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُواْ جَنَّةٗ وَحَرِيرٗا

Verses.Text: There they will be reclining on ˹canopied˺ couches, never seeing scorching heat or bitter cold.
Verses.Arabic: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِۖ لَا يَرَوۡنَ فِيهَا شَمۡسٗا وَلَا زَمۡهَرِيرٗا

Verses.Text: The Garden’s shade will be right above them, and its fruit will be made very easy to reach.
Verses.Arabic: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلٗا

Verses.Text: They will be waited on with silver vessels and cups of crystal—
Verses.Arabic: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٖ مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖ كَانَتۡ قَوَارِيرَا۠

Verses.Text: crystalline silver, filled precisely as desired.
Verses.Arabic: قَوَارِيرَاْ مِن فِضَّةٖ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقۡدِيرٗا

Verses.Text: And they will be given a drink ˹of pure wine˺ flavoured with ginger
Verses.Arabic: وَيُسۡقَوۡنَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا

Verses.Text: from a spring there, called Salsabîl.
Verses.Arabic: عَيۡنٗا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلۡسَبِيلٗا

Verses.Text: They will be waited on by eternal youths. If you saw them, you would think they were scattered pearls.
Verses.Arabic: ۞وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وِلۡدَٰنٞ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ حَسِبۡتَهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٗا مَّنثُورٗا

Verses.Text: And if you looked around, you would see ˹indescribable˺ bliss and a vast kingdom.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيۡتَ نَعِيمٗا وَمُلۡكٗا كَبِيرًا

Verses.Text: The virtuous will be ˹dressed˺ in garments of fine green silk and rich brocade, and adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.
Verses.Arabic: عَٰلِيَهُمۡ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضۡرٞ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقٞۖ وَحُلُّوٓاْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٖ وَسَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ شَرَابٗا طَهُورًا

Verses.Text: ˹And they will be told,˺ “All this is surely a reward for you. Your striving has been appreciated.”
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَكَانَ سَعۡيُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا

Verses.Text: Indeed, it is We Who have revealed the Quran to you ˹O Prophet˺ in stages.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا

Verses.Text: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not yield to any evildoer or ˹staunch˺ disbeliever from among them.
Verses.Arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مِنۡهُمۡ ءَاثِمًا أَوۡ كَفُورٗا

Verses.Text: ˹Always˺ remember the Name of your Lord morning and evening,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ بُكۡرَةٗ وَأَصِيلٗا

Verses.Text: and prostrate before Him during part of the night, and glorify Him long at night.
Verses.Arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَٱسۡجُدۡ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحۡهُ لَيۡلٗا طَوِيلًا

Verses.Text: Surely those ˹pagans˺ love this fleeting world, ˹totally˺ neglecting a weighty Day ahead of them.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمۡ يَوۡمٗا ثَقِيلٗا

Verses.Text: It is We Who created them and perfected their ˹physical˺ form. But if We will, We can easily replace them with others.
Verses.Arabic: نَّحۡنُ خَلَقۡنَٰهُمۡ وَشَدَدۡنَآ أَسۡرَهُمۡۖ وَإِذَا شِئۡنَا بَدَّلۡنَآ أَمۡثَٰلَهُمۡ تَبۡدِيلًا

Verses.Text: Surely this is a reminder. So let whoever wills take the ˹Right˺ Way to their Lord.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلٗا

Verses.Text: But you cannot will ˹to do so˺ unless Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

Verses.Text: He admits whoever He wills into His mercy. As for the wrongdoers, He has prepared for them a painful punishment
Verses.Arabic: يُدۡخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمَۢا

Verses.Text: By those ˹winds˺ sent forth successively,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡمُرۡسَلَٰتِ عُرۡفٗا

Verses.Text: and those blowing violently,
Verses.Arabic: فَٱلۡعَٰصِفَٰتِ عَصۡفٗا

Verses.Text: and those scattering ˹rainclouds˺ widely!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلنَّـٰشِرَٰتِ نَشۡرٗا

Verses.Text: And ˹by˺ those ˹angels˺ fully distinguishing ˹truth from falsehood˺,
Verses.Arabic: فَٱلۡفَٰرِقَٰتِ فَرۡقٗا

Verses.Text: and those delivering revelation,
Verses.Arabic: فَٱلۡمُلۡقِيَٰتِ ذِكۡرًا

Verses.Text: ending excuses and giving warnings.
Verses.Arabic: عُذۡرًا أَوۡ نُذۡرًا

Verses.Text: Surely, what you are promised will come to pass.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَٰقِعٞ

Verses.Text: So when the stars are put out,
Verses.Arabic: فَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ طُمِسَتۡ

Verses.Text: and the sky is torn apart,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ فُرِجَتۡ

Verses.Text: and the mountains are blown away,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجِبَالُ نُسِفَتۡ

Verses.Text: and the messengers’ time ˹to testify˺ comes up—
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتۡ

Verses.Text: for which Day has all this been set?
Verses.Arabic: لِأَيِّ يَوۡمٍ أُجِّلَتۡ

Verses.Text: For the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision!
Verses.Arabic: لِيَوۡمِ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ

Verses.Text: And what will make you realize what the Day of Decision is?
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ

Verses.Text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
Verses.Arabic: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

Verses.Text: Did We not destroy earlier disbelievers?
Verses.Arabic: أَلَمۡ نُهۡلِكِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

Verses.Text: And We will make the later disbelievers follow them.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ نُتۡبِعُهُمُ ٱلۡأٓخِرِينَ

Verses.Text: This is how We deal with the wicked.
Verses.Arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفۡعَلُ بِٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ

Verses.Text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
Verses.Arabic: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

Verses.Text: Did We not create you from a humble fluid,
Verses.Arabic: أَلَمۡ نَخۡلُقكُّم مِّن مَّآءٖ مَّهِينٖ

Verses.Text: placing it in a secure place
Verses.Arabic: فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ فِي قَرَارٖ مَّكِينٍ

Verses.Text: until an appointed time?
Verses.Arabic: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ

Verses.Text: We ˹perfectly˺ ordained ˹its development˺. How excellent are We in doing so!
Verses.Arabic: فَقَدَرۡنَا فَنِعۡمَ ٱلۡقَٰدِرُونَ

Verses.Text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
Verses.Arabic: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

Verses.Text: Have We not made the earth a lodging
Verses.Arabic: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَلِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ كِفَاتًا

Verses.Text: for the living and the dead,
Verses.Arabic: أَحۡيَآءٗ وَأَمۡوَٰتٗا

Verses.Text: and placed upon it towering, firm mountains, and given you fresh water to drink?
Verses.Arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ شَٰمِخَٰتٖ وَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُم مَّآءٗ فُرَاتٗا

Verses.Text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
Verses.Arabic: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

Verses.Text: ˹The disbelievers will be told,˺ “Proceed into that ˹Fire˺ which you used to deny!
Verses.Arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

Verses.Text: Proceed into the shade ˹of smoke˺ which rises in three columns,
Verses.Arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ ظِلّٖ ذِي ثَلَٰثِ شُعَبٖ

Verses.Text: providing neither coolness nor shelter from the flames.
Verses.Arabic: لَّا ظَلِيلٖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ

Verses.Text: Indeed, it hurls sparks ˹as big˺ as huge castles,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهَا تَرۡمِي بِشَرَرٖ كَٱلۡقَصۡرِ

Verses.Text: and ˹as dark˺ as black camels.”
Verses.Arabic: كَأَنَّهُۥ جِمَٰلَتٞ صُفۡرٞ

Verses.Text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
Verses.Arabic: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

Verses.Text: On that Day they will not ˹be in a position to˺ speak,
Verses.Arabic: هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ

Verses.Text: nor will they be permitted to offer excuses.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَا يُؤۡذَنُ لَهُمۡ فَيَعۡتَذِرُونَ

Verses.Text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
Verses.Arabic: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

Verses.Text: ˹They will be told by Allah,˺ “This is the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision: We have gathered you along with earlier disbelievers ˹for punishment˺.
Verses.Arabic: هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِۖ جَمَعۡنَٰكُمۡ وَٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

Verses.Text: So if you have a scheme ˹to save yourselves˺, then use it against Me.”
Verses.Arabic: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمۡ كَيۡدٞ فَكِيدُونِ

Verses.Text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
Verses.Arabic: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, the righteous will be amid ˹cool˺ shade and springs
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَٰلٖ وَعُيُونٖ

Verses.Text: and any fruit they desire.
Verses.Arabic: وَفَوَٰكِهَ مِمَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ

Verses.Text: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink happily for what you used to do.”
Verses.Arabic: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

Verses.Text: Surely this is how We reward the good-doers.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

Verses.Text: ˹But˺ woe on that Day to the deniers!
Verses.Arabic: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

Verses.Text: “Eat and enjoy yourselves for a little while, ˹for˺ you are truly wicked.”
Verses.Arabic: كُلُواْ وَتَمَتَّعُواْ قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجۡرِمُونَ

Verses.Text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
Verses.Arabic: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

Verses.Text: When it is said to them, “Bow down ˹before Allah,” they do not bow.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرۡكَعُواْ لَا يَرۡكَعُونَ

Verses.Text: Woe on that Day to the deniers!
Verses.Arabic: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

Verses.Text: So what message after this ˹Quran˺ would they believe in?
Verses.Arabic: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثِۭ بَعۡدَهُۥ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

Verses.Text: What are they asking one another about?
Verses.Arabic: عَمَّ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ

Verses.Text: About the momentous news,
Verses.Arabic: عَنِ ٱلنَّبَإِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

Verses.Text: over which they disagree.
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِي هُمۡ فِيهِ مُخۡتَلِفُونَ

Verses.Text: But no! They will come to know.
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّا سَيَعۡلَمُونَ

Verses.Text: Again, no! They will come to know.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعۡلَمُونَ

Verses.Text: Have We not smoothed out the earth ˹like a bed˺,
Verses.Arabic: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَلِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِهَٰدٗا

Verses.Text: and ˹made˺ the mountains as ˹its˺ pegs,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡجِبَالَ أَوۡتَادٗا

Verses.Text: and created you in pairs,
Verses.Arabic: وَخَلَقۡنَٰكُمۡ أَزۡوَٰجٗا

Verses.Text: and made your sleep for rest,
Verses.Arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا نَوۡمَكُمۡ سُبَاتٗا

Verses.Text: and made the night as a cover,
Verses.Arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلَّيۡلَ لِبَاسٗا

Verses.Text: and made the day for livelihood,
Verses.Arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا ٱلنَّهَارَ مَعَاشٗا

Verses.Text: and built above you seven mighty ˹heavens˺,
Verses.Arabic: وَبَنَيۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمۡ سَبۡعٗا شِدَادٗا

Verses.Text: and placed ˹in them˺ a shining lamp,
Verses.Arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا سِرَاجٗا وَهَّاجٗا

Verses.Text: and sent down from rainclouds pouring water,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡمُعۡصِرَٰتِ مَآءٗ ثَجَّاجٗا

Verses.Text: producing by it grain and ˹various˺ plants,
Verses.Arabic: لِّنُخۡرِجَ بِهِۦ حَبّٗا وَنَبَاتٗا

Verses.Text: and dense orchards?
Verses.Arabic: وَجَنَّـٰتٍ أَلۡفَافًا

Verses.Text: Indeed, the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision is an appointed time—
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ كَانَ مِيقَٰتٗا

Verses.Text: ˹it is˺ the Day the Trumpet will be blown, and you will ˹all˺ come forth in crowds.
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا

Verses.Text: The sky will be ˹split˺ open, becoming ˹many˺ gates,
Verses.Arabic: وَفُتِحَتِ ٱلسَّمَآءُ فَكَانَتۡ أَبۡوَٰبٗا

Verses.Text: and the mountains will be blown away, becoming ˹like˺ a mirage.
Verses.Arabic: وَسُيِّرَتِ ٱلۡجِبَالُ فَكَانَتۡ سَرَابًا

Verses.Text: Indeed, Hell is lying in ambush
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتۡ مِرۡصَادٗا

Verses.Text: as a home for the transgressors,
Verses.Arabic: لِّلطَّـٰغِينَ مَـَٔابٗا

Verses.Text: where they will remain for ˹endless˺ ages.
Verses.Arabic: لَّـٰبِثِينَ فِيهَآ أَحۡقَابٗا

Verses.Text: There they will not taste any coolness or drink,
Verses.Arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا

Verses.Text: except boiling water and ˹oozing˺ pus—
Verses.Arabic: إِلَّا حَمِيمٗا وَغَسَّاقٗا

Verses.Text: a fitting reward.
Verses.Arabic: جَزَآءٗ وِفَاقًا

Verses.Text: For they never expected any reckoning,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَرۡجُونَ حِسَابٗا

Verses.Text: and totally rejected Our signs.
Verses.Arabic: وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كِذَّابٗا

Verses.Text: And We have everything recorded precisely.
Verses.Arabic: وَكُلَّ شَيۡءٍ أَحۡصَيۡنَٰهُ كِتَٰبٗا

Verses.Text: ˹So the deniers will be told,˺ “Taste ˹the punishment˺, for all you will get from Us is more torment.”
Verses.Arabic: فَذُوقُواْ فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمۡ إِلَّا عَذَابًا

Verses.Text: Indeed, the righteous will have salvation—
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا

Verses.Text: Gardens, vineyards,
Verses.Arabic: حَدَآئِقَ وَأَعۡنَٰبٗا

Verses.Text: and full-bosomed maidens of equal age,
Verses.Arabic: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتۡرَابٗا

Verses.Text: and full cups ˹of pure wine˺,
Verses.Arabic: وَكَأۡسٗا دِهَاقٗا

Verses.Text: never to hear any idle talk or lying therein—
Verses.Arabic: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا كِذَّـٰبٗا

Verses.Text: a ˹fitting˺ reward as a generous gift from your Lord,
Verses.Arabic: جَزَآءٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَآءً حِسَابٗا

Verses.Text: the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, the Most Compassionate. No one will dare speak to Him
Verses.Arabic: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابٗا

Verses.Text: on the Day the ˹holy˺ spirit and the angels will stand in ranks. None will talk, except those granted permission by the Most Compassionate and whose words are true.
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفّٗاۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابٗا

Verses.Text: That Day is the ˹ultimate˺ truth. So let whoever wills take the path leading back to their Lord.
Verses.Arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا

Verses.Text: Indeed, We have warned you of an imminent punishment—the Day every person will see ˹the consequences of˺ what their hands have done, and the disbelievers will cry, “I wish I were dust.”
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّآ أَنذَرۡنَٰكُمۡ عَذَابٗا قَرِيبٗا يَوۡمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلۡكَافِرُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَٰبَۢا

Verses.Text: By those ˹angels˺ stripping out ˹evil souls˺ harshly,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلنَّـٰزِعَٰتِ غَرۡقٗا

Verses.Text: and those pulling out ˹good souls˺ gently,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلنَّـٰشِطَٰتِ نَشۡطٗا

Verses.Text: and those gliding ˹through heavens˺ swiftly,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلسَّـٰبِحَٰتِ سَبۡحٗا

Verses.Text: and those taking the lead vigorously,
Verses.Arabic: فَٱلسَّـٰبِقَٰتِ سَبۡقٗا

Verses.Text: and those conducting affairs ˹obediently˺!
Verses.Arabic: فَٱلۡمُدَبِّرَٰتِ أَمۡرٗا

Verses.Text: ˹Consider˺ the Day ˹when˺ the quaking Blast will come to pass,
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ تَرۡجُفُ ٱلرَّاجِفَةُ

Verses.Text: followed by a second Blast.
Verses.Arabic: تَتۡبَعُهَا ٱلرَّادِفَةُ

Verses.Text: ˹The deniers’˺ hearts on that Day will be trembling ˹in horror˺,
Verses.Arabic: قُلُوبٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَاجِفَةٌ

Verses.Text: with their eyes downcast.
Verses.Arabic: أَبۡصَٰرُهَا خَٰشِعَةٞ

Verses.Text: ˹But now˺ they ask ˹mockingly˺, “Will we really be restored to our former state,
Verses.Arabic: يَقُولُونَ أَءِنَّا لَمَرۡدُودُونَ فِي ٱلۡحَافِرَةِ

Verses.Text: even after we have been reduced to decayed bones?”
Verses.Arabic: أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَٰمٗا نَّخِرَةٗ

Verses.Text: Adding, “Then such a return would be a ˹total˺ loss ˹for us˺!”
Verses.Arabic: قَالُواْ تِلۡكَ إِذٗا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٞ

Verses.Text: But indeed, it will take only one ˹mighty˺ Blast,
Verses.Arabic: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجۡرَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ

Verses.Text: and at once they will be above ground.
Verses.Arabic: فَإِذَا هُم بِٱلسَّاهِرَةِ

Verses.Text: Has the story of Moses reached you ˹O Prophet˺?
Verses.Arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: His Lord called him in the sacred valley of Ṭuwa,
Verses.Arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

Verses.Text: ˹commanding,˺ “Go to Pharaoh, for he has truly transgressed ˹all bounds˺.
Verses.Arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّهُۥ طَغَىٰ

Verses.Text: And say, ‘Would you ˹be willing to˺ purify yourself,
Verses.Arabic: فَقُلۡ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ

Verses.Text: and let me guide you to your Lord so that you will be in awe ˹of Him˺?’”
Verses.Arabic: وَأَهۡدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخۡشَىٰ

Verses.Text: Then Moses showed him the great sign,
Verses.Arabic: فَأَرَىٰهُ ٱلۡأٓيَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ

Verses.Text: but he denied and disobeyed ˹Allah˺,
Verses.Arabic: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ

Verses.Text: then turned his back, striving ˹against the truth˺.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ أَدۡبَرَ يَسۡعَىٰ

Verses.Text: Then he summoned ˹his people˺ and called out,
Verses.Arabic: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ

Verses.Text: saying, “I am your lord, the most high!”
Verses.Arabic: فَقَالَ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ

Verses.Text: So Allah overtook him, making him an example in this life and the next.
Verses.Arabic: فَأَخَذَهُ ٱللَّهُ نَكَالَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Surely in this is a lesson for whoever stands in awe of ˹Allah˺.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّمَن يَخۡشَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Which is harder to create: you or the sky? He built it,
Verses.Arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أَمِ ٱلسَّمَآءُۚ بَنَىٰهَا

Verses.Text: raising it high and forming it flawlessly.
Verses.Arabic: رَفَعَ سَمۡكَهَا فَسَوَّىٰهَا

Verses.Text: He dimmed its night, and brought forth its daylight.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَغۡطَشَ لَيۡلَهَا وَأَخۡرَجَ ضُحَىٰهَا

Verses.Text: As for the earth, He spread it out as well,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَىٰهَآ

Verses.Text: bringing forth its water and pastures
Verses.Arabic: أَخۡرَجَ مِنۡهَا مَآءَهَا وَمَرۡعَىٰهَا

Verses.Text: and setting the mountains firmly ˹upon it˺—
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡجِبَالَ أَرۡسَىٰهَا

Verses.Text: all as ˹a means of˺ sustenance for you and your animals.
Verses.Arabic: مَتَٰعٗا لَّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَٰمِكُمۡ

Verses.Text: But, when the Supreme Disaster comes to pass—
Verses.Arabic: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلطَّآمَّةُ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ

Verses.Text: the Day every person will remember all ˹their˺ striving,
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا سَعَىٰ

Verses.Text: and the Hellfire will be displayed for all to see—
Verses.Arabic: وَبُرِّزَتِ ٱلۡجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ

Verses.Text: then as for those who transgressed
Verses.Arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ

Verses.Text: and preferred the ˹fleeting˺ life of this world,
Verses.Arabic: وَءَاثَرَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا

Verses.Text: the Hellfire will certainly be ˹their˺ home.
Verses.Arabic: فَإِنَّ ٱلۡجَحِيمَ هِيَ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ

Verses.Text: And as for those who were in awe of standing before their Lord and restrained themselves from ˹evil˺ desires,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِۦ وَنَهَى ٱلنَّفۡسَ عَنِ ٱلۡهَوَىٰ

Verses.Text: Paradise will certainly be ˹their˺ home.
Verses.Arabic: فَإِنَّ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ هِيَ ٱلۡمَأۡوَىٰ

Verses.Text: They ask you ˹O Prophet˺ regarding the Hour, “When will it be?”
Verses.Arabic: يَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلسَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرۡسَىٰهَا

Verses.Text: But it is not for you to tell its time.
Verses.Arabic: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكۡرَىٰهَآ

Verses.Text: That knowledge rests with your Lord ˹alone˺.
Verses.Arabic: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَىٰهَآ

Verses.Text: Your duty is only to warn whoever is in awe of it.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخۡشَىٰهَا

Verses.Text: On the Day they see it, it will be as if they had stayed ˹in the world˺ no more than one evening or its morning.
Verses.Arabic: كَأَنَّهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَهَا لَمۡ يَلۡبَثُوٓاْ إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوۡ ضُحَىٰهَا

Verses.Text: He frowned and turned ˹his attention˺ away,
Verses.Arabic: عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ

Verses.Text: ˹simply˺ because the blind man came to him ˹interrupting˺.
Verses.Arabic: أَن جَآءَهُ ٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ

Verses.Text: You never know ˹O Prophet˺, perhaps he may be purified,
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا يُدۡرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُۥ يَزَّكَّىٰٓ

Verses.Text: or he may be mindful, benefitting from the reminder.
Verses.Arabic: أَوۡ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: As for the one who was indifferent,
Verses.Arabic: أَمَّا مَنِ ٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰ

Verses.Text: you gave him your ˹undivided˺ attention,
Verses.Arabic: فَأَنتَ لَهُۥ تَصَدَّىٰ

Verses.Text: even though you are not to blame if he would not be purified.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا عَلَيۡكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ

Verses.Text: But as for the one who came to you, eager ˹to learn˺,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَمَّا مَن جَآءَكَ يَسۡعَىٰ

Verses.Text: being in awe ˹of Allah˺,
Verses.Arabic: وَهُوَ يَخۡشَىٰ

Verses.Text: you were inattentive to him.
