Verses.Arabic: فَأَنتَ عَنۡهُ تَلَهَّىٰ

Verses.Text: But no! This ˹revelation˺ is truly a reminder.
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهَا تَذۡكِرَةٞ

Verses.Text: So let whoever wills be mindful of it.
Verses.Arabic: فَمَن شَآءَ ذَكَرَهُۥ

Verses.Text: It is ˹written˺ on pages held in honour—
Verses.Arabic: فِي صُحُفٖ مُّكَرَّمَةٖ

Verses.Text: highly esteemed, purified—
Verses.Arabic: مَّرۡفُوعَةٖ مُّطَهَّرَةِۭ

Verses.Text: by the hands of angel-scribes,
Verses.Arabic: بِأَيۡدِي سَفَرَةٖ

Verses.Text: honourable and virtuous.
Verses.Arabic: كِرَامِۭ بَرَرَةٖ

Verses.Text: Condemned are ˹disbelieving˺ humans! How ungrateful they are ˹to Allah˺!
Verses.Arabic: قُتِلَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَآ أَكۡفَرَهُۥ

Verses.Text: From what substance did He create them?
Verses.Arabic: مِنۡ أَيِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقَهُۥ

Verses.Text: He created them from a sperm-drop, and ordained their development.
Verses.Arabic: مِن نُّطۡفَةٍ خَلَقَهُۥ فَقَدَّرَهُۥ

Verses.Text: Then He makes the way easy for them,
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ ٱلسَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُۥ

Verses.Text: then causes them to die and be buried.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُۥ فَأَقۡبَرَهُۥ

Verses.Text: Then when He wills, He will resurrect them.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَآءَ أَنشَرَهُۥ

Verses.Text: But no! They have failed to comply with what He ordered.
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقۡضِ مَآ أَمَرَهُۥ

Verses.Text: Let people then consider their food:
Verses.Arabic: فَلۡيَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِۦٓ

Verses.Text: how We pour down rain in abundance
Verses.Arabic: أَنَّا صَبَبۡنَا ٱلۡمَآءَ صَبّٗا

Verses.Text: and meticulously split the earth open ˹for sprouts˺,
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ شَقَقۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ شَقّٗا

Verses.Text: causing grain to grow in it,
Verses.Arabic: فَأَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا حَبّٗا

Verses.Text: as well as grapes and greens,
Verses.Arabic: وَعِنَبٗا وَقَضۡبٗا

Verses.Text: and olives and palm trees,
Verses.Arabic: وَزَيۡتُونٗا وَنَخۡلٗا

Verses.Text: and dense orchards,
Verses.Arabic: وَحَدَآئِقَ غُلۡبٗا

Verses.Text: and fruit and fodder—
Verses.Arabic: وَفَٰكِهَةٗ وَأَبّٗا

Verses.Text: all as ˹a means of˺ sustenance for you and your animals.
Verses.Arabic: مَّتَٰعٗا لَّكُمۡ وَلِأَنۡعَٰمِكُمۡ

Verses.Text: Then, when the Deafening Blast comes to pass—
Verses.Arabic: فَإِذَا جَآءَتِ ٱلصَّآخَّةُ

Verses.Text: on that Day every person will flee from their own siblings,
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ يَفِرُّ ٱلۡمَرۡءُ مِنۡ أَخِيهِ

Verses.Text: and ˹even˺ their mother and father,
Verses.Arabic: وَأُمِّهِۦ وَأَبِيهِ

Verses.Text: and ˹even˺ their spouse and children.
Verses.Arabic: وَصَٰحِبَتِهِۦ وَبَنِيهِ

Verses.Text: For then everyone will have enough concern of their own.
Verses.Arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ

Verses.Text: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be bright,
Verses.Arabic: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ مُّسۡفِرَةٞ

Verses.Text: laughing and rejoicing,
Verses.Arabic: ضَاحِكَةٞ مُّسۡتَبۡشِرَةٞ

Verses.Text: while ˹other˺ faces will be dusty,
Verses.Arabic: وَوُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَلَيۡهَا غَبَرَةٞ

Verses.Text: cast in gloom—
Verses.Arabic: تَرۡهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ

Verses.Text: those are the disbelievers, the ˹wicked˺ sinners.
Verses.Arabic: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡكَفَرَةُ ٱلۡفَجَرَةُ

Verses.Text: When the sun is put out,
Verses.Arabic: إِذَا ٱلشَّمۡسُ كُوِّرَتۡ

Verses.Text: and when the stars fall down,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّجُومُ ٱنكَدَرَتۡ

Verses.Text: and when the mountains are blown away,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتۡ

Verses.Text: and when pregnant camels are left untended,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتۡ

Verses.Text: and when wild beasts are gathered together,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتۡ

Verses.Text: and when the seas are set on fire,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتۡ

Verses.Text: and when the souls ˹and their bodies˺ are paired ˹once more˺,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلنُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتۡ

Verses.Text: and when baby girls, buried alive, are asked
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡمَوۡءُۥدَةُ سُئِلَتۡ

Verses.Text: for what crime they were put to death,
Verses.Arabic: بِأَيِّ ذَنۢبٖ قُتِلَتۡ

Verses.Text: and when the records ˹of deeds˺ are laid open,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتۡ

Verses.Text: and when the sky is stripped away,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ كُشِطَتۡ

Verses.Text: and when the Hellfire is fiercely flared up,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتۡ

Verses.Text: and when Paradise is brought near—
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡجَنَّةُ أُزۡلِفَتۡ

Verses.Text: ˹on that Day˺ each soul will know what ˹deeds˺ it has brought along.
Verses.Arabic: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّآ أَحۡضَرَتۡ

Verses.Text: I do swear by the receding stars
Verses.Arabic: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلۡخُنَّسِ

Verses.Text: which travel and hide,
Verses.Arabic: ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡكُنَّسِ

Verses.Text: and the night as it falls
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا عَسۡعَسَ

Verses.Text: and the day as it breaks!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلصُّبۡحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the Word of ˹Allah delivered by Gabriel,˺ a noble messenger-angel,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلُ رَسُولٖ كَرِيمٖ

Verses.Text: full of power, held in honour by the Lord of the Throne,
Verses.Arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ

Verses.Text: obeyed there ˹in heaven˺, and trustworthy.
Verses.Arabic: مُّطَاعٖ ثَمَّ أَمِينٖ

Verses.Text: And your fellow man is not insane.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجۡنُونٖ

Verses.Text: And he did see that ˹angel˺ on the clear horizon,
Verses.Arabic: وَلَقَدۡ رَءَاهُ بِٱلۡأُفُقِ ٱلۡمُبِينِ

Verses.Text: and he does not withhold ˹what is revealed to him of˺ the unseen.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى ٱلۡغَيۡبِ بِضَنِينٖ

Verses.Text: And this ˹Quran˺ is not the word of an outcast devil.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَيۡطَٰنٖ رَّجِيمٖ

Verses.Text: So what ˹other˺ path would you take?
Verses.Arabic: فَأَيۡنَ تَذۡهَبُونَ

Verses.Text: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is only a reminder to the whole world—
Verses.Arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ لِّلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

Verses.Text: to whoever of you wills to take the Straight Way.
Verses.Arabic: لِمَن شَآءَ مِنكُمۡ أَن يَسۡتَقِيمَ

Verses.Text: But you cannot will ˹to do so˺, except by the Will of Allah, the Lord of all worlds.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

Verses.Text: When the sky splits open,
Verses.Arabic: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنفَطَرَتۡ

Verses.Text: and when the stars fall away,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡكَوَاكِبُ ٱنتَثَرَتۡ

Verses.Text: and when the seas burst forth,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتۡ

Verses.Text: and when the graves spill out,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡقُبُورُ بُعۡثِرَتۡ

Verses.Text: ˹then˺ each soul will know what it has sent forth or left behind.
Verses.Arabic: عَلِمَتۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّا قَدَّمَتۡ وَأَخَّرَتۡ

Verses.Text: O humanity! What has emboldened you against your Lord, the Most Generous,
Verses.Arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

Verses.Text: Who created you, fashioned you, and perfected your design,
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّىٰكَ فَعَدَلَكَ

Verses.Text: moulding you in whatever form He willed?
Verses.Arabic: فِيٓ أَيِّ صُورَةٖ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ

Verses.Text: But no! In fact, you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment,
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّا بَلۡ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِٱلدِّينِ

Verses.Text: while you are certainly observed by vigilant,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكُمۡ لَحَٰفِظِينَ

Verses.Text: honourable angels, recording ˹everything˺.
Verses.Arabic: كِرَامٗا كَٰتِبِينَ

Verses.Text: They know whatever you do.
Verses.Arabic: يَعۡلَمُونَ مَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, the virtuous will be in bliss,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٖ

Verses.Text: and the wicked will be in Hell,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلۡفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٖ

Verses.Text: burning in it on Judgment Day,
Verses.Arabic: يَصۡلَوۡنَهَا يَوۡمَ ٱلدِّينِ

Verses.Text: and they will have no escape from it.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا بِغَآئِبِينَ

Verses.Text: What will make you realize what Judgment Day is?
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ

Verses.Text: Again, what will make you realize what Judgment Day is?
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا يَوۡمُ ٱلدِّينِ

Verses.Text: ˹It is˺ the Day no soul will be of ˹any˺ benefit to another whatsoever, for all authority on that Day belongs to Allah ˹entirely˺.
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا تَمۡلِكُ نَفۡسٞ لِّنَفۡسٖ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَٱلۡأَمۡرُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلَّهِ

Verses.Text: Woe to the defrauders!
Verses.Arabic: وَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُطَفِّفِينَ

Verses.Text: Those who take full measure ˹when they buy˺ from people,
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ

Verses.Text: but give less when they measure or weigh for buyers.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمۡ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمۡ يُخۡسِرُونَ

Verses.Text: Do such people not think that they will be resurrected
Verses.Arabic: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبۡعُوثُونَ

Verses.Text: for a tremendous Day—
Verses.Arabic: لِيَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

Verses.Text: the Day ˹all˺ people will stand before the Lord of all worlds?
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

Verses.Text: But no! The wicked are certainly bound for Sijjîn ˹in the depths of Hell˺—
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ

Verses.Text: and what will make you realize what Sijjîn is?—
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٞ

Verses.Text: a fate ˹already˺ sealed.
Verses.Arabic: كِتَٰبٞ مَّرۡقُومٞ

Verses.Text: Woe on that Day to the deniers—
Verses.Arabic: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

Verses.Text: those who deny Judgment Day!
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

Verses.Text: None would deny it except every evildoing transgressor.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

Verses.Text: Whenever Our revelations are recited to them, they say, “Ancient fables!”
Verses.Arabic: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

Verses.Text: But no! In fact, their hearts have been stained by all ˹the evil˺ they used to commit!
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

Verses.Text: Undoubtedly, they will be sealed off from their Lord on that Day.
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ

Verses.Text: Moreover, they will surely burn in Hell,
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمۡ لَصَالُواْ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

Verses.Text: and then be told, “This is what you used to deny.”
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

Verses.Text: But no! The virtuous are certainly bound for ’Illiyûn ˹in elevated Gardens˺—
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ

Verses.Text: and what will make you realize what ’Illiyûn is?—
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ

Verses.Text: a fate ˹already˺ sealed,
Verses.Arabic: كِتَٰبٞ مَّرۡقُومٞ

Verses.Text: witnessed by those nearest ˹to Allah˺.
Verses.Arabic: يَشۡهَدُهُ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ

Verses.Text: Surely the virtuous will be in bliss,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ

Verses.Text: ˹seated˺ on ˹canopied˺ couches, gazing around.
Verses.Arabic: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ

Verses.Text: You will recognize on their faces the glow of delight.
Verses.Arabic: تَعۡرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمۡ نَضۡرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

Verses.Text: They will be given a drink of sealed, pure wine,
Verses.Arabic: يُسۡقَوۡنَ مِن رَّحِيقٖ مَّخۡتُومٍ

Verses.Text: whose last sip will smell like musk. So let whoever aspires to this strive ˹diligently˺.
Verses.Arabic: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكٞۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ

Verses.Text: And this drink’s flavour will come from Tasnîm—
Verses.Arabic: وَمِزَاجُهُۥ مِن تَسۡنِيمٍ

Verses.Text: a spring from which those nearest ˹to Allah˺ will drink.
Verses.Arabic: عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُقَرَّبُونَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, the wicked used to laugh at the believers,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ

Verses.Text: wink to one another whenever they passed by,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِهِمۡ يَتَغَامَزُونَ

Verses.Text: and muse ˹over these exploits˺ upon returning to their own people.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ

Verses.Text: And when they saw the faithful, they would say, “These ˹people˺ are truly astray,”
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

Verses.Text: even though they were not sent as keepers over the believers.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أُرۡسِلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ

Verses.Text: But on that Day the believers will be laughing at the disbelievers,
Verses.Arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

Verses.Text: as they sit on ˹canopied˺ couches, looking on.
Verses.Arabic: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ

Verses.Text: ˹The believers will be asked,˺ “Have the disbelievers ˹not˺ been paid back for what they used to do?”
Verses.Arabic: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ

Verses.Text: When the sky bursts open,
Verses.Arabic: إِذَا ٱلسَّمَآءُ ٱنشَقَّتۡ

Verses.Text: obeying its Lord as it must,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ

Verses.Text: and when the earth is flattened out,
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مُدَّتۡ

Verses.Text: and ejects ˹all˺ its contents and becomes empty,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَلۡقَتۡ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتۡ

Verses.Text: obeying its Lord as it must, ˹surely you will all be judged˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَذِنَتۡ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتۡ

Verses.Text: O humanity! Indeed, you are labouring restlessly towards your Lord, and will ˹eventually˺ meet the consequences.
Verses.Arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ

Verses.Text: As for those who are given their record in their right hand,
Verses.Arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ

Verses.Text: they will have an easy reckoning,
Verses.Arabic: فَسَوۡفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابٗا يَسِيرٗا

Verses.Text: and will return to their people joyfully.
Verses.Arabic: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورٗا

Verses.Text: And as for those who are given their record ˹in their left hand˺ from behind their backs,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ

Verses.Text: they will cry for ˹instant˺ destruction,
Verses.Arabic: فَسَوۡفَ يَدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا

Verses.Text: and will burn in the blazing Fire.
Verses.Arabic: وَيَصۡلَىٰ سَعِيرًا

Verses.Text: For they used to be prideful among their people,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فِيٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ مَسۡرُورًا

Verses.Text: thinking they would never return ˹to Allah˺.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهُۥ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ

Verses.Text: Yes ˹they would˺! Surely their Lord has always been All-Seeing of them.
Verses.Arabic: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا

Verses.Text: So, I do swear by the twilight!
Verses.Arabic: فَلَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِٱلشَّفَقِ

Verses.Text: And by the night and whatever it envelops!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ

Verses.Text: And by the moon when it waxes full!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا ٱتَّسَقَ

Verses.Text: You will certainly pass from one state to another.
Verses.Arabic: لَتَرۡكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٖ

Verses.Text: So what is the matter with them that they do not believe,
Verses.Arabic: فَمَا لَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

Verses.Text: and when the Quran is recited to them, they do not bow down ˹in submission˺?
Verses.Arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ لَا يَسۡجُدُونَۤ۩

Verses.Text: In fact, the disbelievers persist in denial.
Verses.Arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ يُكَذِّبُونَ

Verses.Text: But Allah knows best whatever they hide.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ

Verses.Text: So give them good news of a painful punishment.
Verses.Arabic: فَبَشِّرۡهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ

Verses.Text: But those who believe and do good will have a never-ending reward.
Verses.Arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ

Verses.Text: By the sky full of constellations,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡبُرُوجِ

Verses.Text: and the promised Day ˹of Judgment˺,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡمَوۡعُودِ

Verses.Text: and the witness and what is witnessed!
Verses.Arabic: وَشَاهِدٖ وَمَشۡهُودٖ

Verses.Text: Condemned are the makers of the ditch—
Verses.Arabic: قُتِلَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡأُخۡدُودِ

Verses.Text: the fire ˹pit˺, filled with fuel—
Verses.Arabic: ٱلنَّارِ ذَاتِ ٱلۡوَقُودِ

Verses.Text: when they sat around it,
Verses.Arabic: إِذۡ هُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا قُعُودٞ

Verses.Text: watching what they had ˹ordered to be˺ done to the believers,
Verses.Arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

Verses.Text: who they resented for no reason other than belief in Allah—the Almighty, the Praiseworthy—
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ

Verses.Text: ˹the One˺ to Whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and earth. And Allah is a Witness over all things.
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدٌ

Verses.Text: Those who persecute the believing men and women and then do not repent will certainly suffer the punishment of Hell and the torment of burning.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَتَنُواْ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمۡ يَتُوبُواْ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابُ ٱلۡحَرِيقِ

Verses.Text: Surely those who believe and do good will have Gardens under which rivers flow. That is the greatest triumph.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٞ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ

Verses.Text: Indeed, the ˹crushing˺ grip of your Lord is severe.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ بَطۡشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ

Verses.Text: ˹For˺ He is certainly the One Who originates and resurrects ˹all˺.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ يُبۡدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ

Verses.Text: And He is the All-Forgiving, All-Loving—
Verses.Arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلۡوَدُودُ

Verses.Text: Lord of the Throne, the All-Glorious,
Verses.Arabic: ذُو ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡمَجِيدُ

Verses.Text: Doer of whatever He wills.
Verses.Arabic: فَعَّالٞ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ

Verses.Text: Has the story of the ˹destroyed˺ forces reached you ˹O Prophet˺—
Verses.Arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡجُنُودِ

Verses.Text: ˹the forces of˺ Pharaoh and Thamûd?
Verses.Arabic: فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَثَمُودَ

Verses.Text: Yet the disbelievers ˹still˺ persist in denial.
Verses.Arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي تَكۡذِيبٖ

Verses.Text: But Allah encompasses them from all sides.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱللَّهُ مِن وَرَآئِهِم مُّحِيطُۢ

Verses.Text: In fact, this is a glorious Quran,
Verses.Arabic: بَلۡ هُوَ قُرۡءَانٞ مَّجِيدٞ

Verses.Text: ˹recorded˺ in a Preserved Tablet.
Verses.Arabic: فِي لَوۡحٖ مَّحۡفُوظِۭ

Verses.Text: By the heaven and the nightly star!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلطَّارِقِ

Verses.Text: And what will make you realize what the nightly star is?
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلطَّارِقُ

Verses.Text: ˹It is˺ the star of piercing brightness.
Verses.Arabic: ٱلنَّجۡمُ ٱلثَّاقِبُ

Verses.Text: There is no soul without a vigilant angel ˹recording everything˺.
Verses.Arabic: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ

Verses.Text: Let people then consider what they were created from!
Verses.Arabic: فَلۡيَنظُرِ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ

Verses.Text: ˹They were˺ created from a spurting fluid,
Verses.Arabic: خُلِقَ مِن مَّآءٖ دَافِقٖ

Verses.Text: stemming from between the backbone and the ribcage.
Verses.Arabic: يَخۡرُجُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ ٱلصُّلۡبِ وَٱلتَّرَآئِبِ

Verses.Text: Surely He is fully capable of bringing them back ˹to life˺
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ رَجۡعِهِۦ لَقَادِرٞ

Verses.Text: on the Day all secrets will be disclosed.
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ تُبۡلَى ٱلسَّرَآئِرُ

Verses.Text: Then one will have neither power nor ˹any˺ helper.
Verses.Arabic: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٖ وَلَا نَاصِرٖ

Verses.Text: By the sky with its recurring cycles,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلرَّجۡعِ

Verses.Text: and the earth with its sprouting plants!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ ذَاتِ ٱلصَّدۡعِ

Verses.Text: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a decisive word,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهُۥ لَقَوۡلٞ فَصۡلٞ

Verses.Text: and is not to be taken lightly.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا هُوَ بِٱلۡهَزۡلِ

Verses.Text: They are certainly devising ˹evil˺ plans,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ يَكِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗا

Verses.Text: but I too am planning.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَكِيدُ كَيۡدٗا

Verses.Text: So bear with the disbelievers ˹O Prophet˺. Let them be for ˹just˺ a little while.
Verses.Arabic: فَمَهِّلِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَمۡهِلۡهُمۡ رُوَيۡدَۢا

Verses.Text: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High,
Verses.Arabic: سَبِّحِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ ٱلۡأَعۡلَى

Verses.Text: Who created and ˹perfectly˺ fashioned ˹all˺,
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ

Verses.Text: and Who ordained precisely and inspired accordingly,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ

Verses.Text: and Who brings forth ˹green˺ pasture,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَخۡرَجَ ٱلۡمَرۡعَىٰ

Verses.Text: then reduces it to withered chaff.
Verses.Arabic: فَجَعَلَهُۥ غُثَآءً أَحۡوَىٰ

Verses.Text: We will have you recite ˹the Quran, O  Prophet,˺ so you will not forget ˹any of it˺,
Verses.Arabic: سَنُقۡرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: unless Allah wills otherwise. He surely knows what is open and what is hidden.
Verses.Arabic: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ

Verses.Text: We will facilitate for you the Way of Ease.
Verses.Arabic: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ

Verses.Text: So ˹always˺ remind ˹with the Quran˺—˹even˺ if the reminder is beneficial ˹only to some˺.
Verses.Arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ إِن نَّفَعَتِ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ

Verses.Text: Those in awe ˹of Allah˺ will be mindful ˹of it˺.
Verses.Arabic: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخۡشَىٰ

Verses.Text: But it will be shunned by the most wretched,
Verses.Arabic: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى

Verses.Text: who will burn in the greatest Fire,
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِي يَصۡلَى ٱلنَّارَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰ

Verses.Text: where they will not ˹be able to˺ live or die.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ

Verses.Text: Successful indeed are those who purify themselves,
Verses.Arabic: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ

Verses.Text: remember the Name of their Lord, and pray.
Verses.Arabic: وَذَكَرَ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّهِۦ فَصَلَّىٰ

Verses.Text: But you ˹deniers only˺ prefer the life of this world,
Verses.Arabic: بَلۡ تُؤۡثِرُونَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا

Verses.Text: even though the Hereafter is far better and more lasting.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: This is certainly ˹mentioned˺ in the earlier Scriptures—
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَفِي ٱلصُّحُفِ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

Verses.Text: the Scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
Verses.Arabic: صُحُفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ

Verses.Text: Has the news of the Overwhelming Event reached you ˹O Prophet˺?
Verses.Arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ٱلۡغَٰشِيَةِ

Verses.Text: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be downcast,
Verses.Arabic: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَٰشِعَةٌ

Verses.Text: ˹totally˺ overburdened, exhausted,
Verses.Arabic: عَامِلَةٞ نَّاصِبَةٞ

Verses.Text: burning in a scorching Fire,
Verses.Arabic: تَصۡلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةٗ

Verses.Text: left to drink from a scalding spring.
Verses.Arabic: تُسۡقَىٰ مِنۡ عَيۡنٍ ءَانِيَةٖ

Verses.Text: They will have no food except a foul, thorny shrub,
Verses.Arabic: لَّيۡسَ لَهُمۡ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٖ

Verses.Text: neither nourishing nor satisfying hunger.
Verses.Arabic: لَّا يُسۡمِنُ وَلَا يُغۡنِي مِن جُوعٖ

Verses.Text: On that Day ˹other˺ faces will be glowing with bliss,
Verses.Arabic: وُجُوهٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ نَّاعِمَةٞ

Verses.Text: ˹fully˺ pleased with their striving,
Verses.Arabic: لِّسَعۡيِهَا رَاضِيَةٞ

Verses.Text: in an elevated Garden,
Verses.Arabic: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٖ

Verses.Text: where no idle talk will be heard.
Verses.Arabic: لَّا تَسۡمَعُ فِيهَا لَٰغِيَةٗ

Verses.Text: In it will be a running spring,
Verses.Arabic: فِيهَا عَيۡنٞ جَارِيَةٞ

Verses.Text: along with thrones raised high,
Verses.Arabic: فِيهَا سُرُرٞ مَّرۡفُوعَةٞ

Verses.Text: and cups set at hand,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَكۡوَابٞ مَّوۡضُوعَةٞ

Verses.Text: and ˹fine˺ cushions lined up,
Verses.Arabic: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصۡفُوفَةٞ

Verses.Text: and ˹splendid˺ carpets spread out.
Verses.Arabic: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبۡثُوثَةٌ

Verses.Text: Do they not ever reflect on camels—how they were ˹masterfully˺ created;
Verses.Arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

Verses.Text: and the sky—how it was raised ˹high˺;
Verses.Arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ كَيۡفَ رُفِعَتۡ

Verses.Text: and the mountains—how they were firmly set up;
Verses.Arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلۡجِبَالِ كَيۡفَ نُصِبَتۡ

Verses.Text: and the earth—how it was levelled out?
Verses.Arabic: وَإِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَيۡفَ سُطِحَتۡ

Verses.Text: So, ˹continue to˺ remind ˹all, O  Prophet˺, for your duty is only to remind.
Verses.Arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٞ

Verses.Text: You are not ˹there˺ to compel them ˹to believe˺.
Verses.Arabic: لَّسۡتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِمُصَيۡطِرٍ

Verses.Text: But whoever turns away, persisting in disbelief,
Verses.Arabic: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ

Verses.Text: then Allah will inflict upon them the major punishment.
Verses.Arabic: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرَ

Verses.Text: Surely to Us is their return,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ إِلَيۡنَآ إِيَابَهُمۡ

Verses.Text: then surely with Us is their reckoning.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا حِسَابَهُم

Verses.Text: By the dawn,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡفَجۡرِ

Verses.Text: and the ten nights,
Verses.Arabic: وَلَيَالٍ عَشۡرٖ

Verses.Text: and the even and the odd,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلشَّفۡعِ وَٱلۡوَتۡرِ

Verses.Text: and the night when it passes!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَسۡرِ

Verses.Text: Is all this ˹not˺ a sufficient oath for those who have sense?
Verses.Arabic: هَلۡ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٞ لِّذِي حِجۡرٍ

Verses.Text: Did you not see how your Lord dealt with ’Ȃd—
Verses.Arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ

Verses.Text: ˹the people˺ of Iram—with ˹their˺ great stature,
Verses.Arabic: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ ٱلۡعِمَادِ

Verses.Text: unmatched in any other land;
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّتِي لَمۡ يُخۡلَقۡ مِثۡلُهَا فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

Verses.Text: and Thamûd who carved ˹their homes into˺ the rocks in the ˹Stone˺ Valley;
Verses.Arabic: وَثَمُودَ ٱلَّذِينَ جَابُواْ ٱلصَّخۡرَ بِٱلۡوَادِ

Verses.Text: and the Pharaoh of mighty structures?
Verses.Arabic: وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ ذِي ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ

Verses.Text: They all transgressed throughout the land,
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ طَغَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

Verses.Text: spreading much corruption there.
Verses.Arabic: فَأَكۡثَرُواْ فِيهَا ٱلۡفَسَادَ

Verses.Text: So your Lord unleashed on them a scourge of punishment.
Verses.Arabic: فَصَبَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّكَ سَوۡطَ عَذَابٍ

Verses.Text: ˹For˺ your Lord is truly vigilant.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِٱلۡمِرۡصَادِ

Verses.Text: Now, whenever a human being is tested by their Lord through ˹His˺ generosity and blessings, they boast, “My Lord has ˹deservedly˺ honoured me!”
Verses.Arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَأَكۡرَمَهُۥ وَنَعَّمَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَكۡرَمَنِ

Verses.Text: But when He tests them by limiting their provision, they protest, “My Lord has ˹undeservedly˺ humiliated me!”
Verses.Arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِذَا مَا ٱبۡتَلَىٰهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقَهُۥ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّيٓ أَهَٰنَنِ

Verses.Text: Absolutely not! In fact, you are not ˹even˺ gracious to the orphan,
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَل لَّا تُكۡرِمُونَ ٱلۡيَتِيمَ

Verses.Text: nor do you urge one another to feed the poor.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَا تَحَـٰٓضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ

Verses.Text: And you devour ˹others’˺ inheritance greedily,
Verses.Arabic: وَتَأۡكُلُونَ ٱلتُّرَاثَ أَكۡلٗا لَّمّٗا

Verses.Text: and love wealth fervently.
Verses.Arabic: وَتُحِبُّونَ ٱلۡمَالَ حُبّٗا جَمّٗا

Verses.Text: Enough! When the earth is entirely crushed over and over,
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا

Verses.Text: and your Lord comes ˹to judge˺ with angels, rank upon rank,
Verses.Arabic: وَجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَٱلۡمَلَكُ صَفّٗا صَفّٗا

Verses.Text: and Hell is brought forth on that Day—this is when every ˹disbelieving˺ person will remember ˹their own sins˺. But what is the use of remembering then?
Verses.Arabic: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ

Verses.Text: They will cry, “I wish I had sent forth ˹something good˺ for my ˹true˺ life.”
Verses.Arabic: يَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي قَدَّمۡتُ لِحَيَاتِي

Verses.Text: On that Day He will punish ˹them˺ severely, like no other,
Verses.Arabic: فَيَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ

Verses.Text: and bind ˹them˺ tightly, like no other.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُۥٓ أَحَدٞ

Verses.Text: ˹Allah will say to the righteous,˺ “O tranquil soul!
Verses.Arabic: يَـٰٓأَيَّتُهَا ٱلنَّفۡسُ ٱلۡمُطۡمَئِنَّةُ

Verses.Text: Return to your Lord, well pleased ˹with Him˺ and well pleasing ˹to Him˺.
Verses.Arabic: ٱرۡجِعِيٓ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةٗ مَّرۡضِيَّةٗ

Verses.Text: So join My servants,
Verses.Arabic: فَٱدۡخُلِي فِي عِبَٰدِي

Verses.Text: and enter My Paradise.”
Verses.Arabic: وَٱدۡخُلِي جَنَّتِي

Verses.Text: I do swear by this city ˹of Mecca˺—
Verses.Arabic: لَآ أُقۡسِمُ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ

Verses.Text: even though you ˹O Prophet˺ are subject to abuse in this city—
Verses.Arabic: وَأَنتَ حِلُّۢ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ

Verses.Text: and by every parent and ˹their˺ child!
Verses.Arabic: وَوَالِدٖ وَمَا وَلَدَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, We have created humankind in ˹constant˺ struggle.
Verses.Arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِي كَبَدٍ

Verses.Text: Do they think that no one has power over them,
Verses.Arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ أَحَدٞ

Verses.Text: boasting, “I have wasted enormous wealth!”?
Verses.Arabic: يَقُولُ أَهۡلَكۡتُ مَالٗا لُّبَدًا

Verses.Text: Do they think that no one sees them?
Verses.Arabic: أَيَحۡسَبُ أَن لَّمۡ يَرَهُۥٓ أَحَدٌ

Verses.Text: Have We not given them two eyes,
Verses.Arabic: أَلَمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عَيۡنَيۡنِ

Verses.Text: a tongue, and two lips;
Verses.Arabic: وَلِسَانٗا وَشَفَتَيۡنِ

Verses.Text: and shown them the two ways ˹of right and wrong˺?
Verses.Arabic: وَهَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلنَّجۡدَيۡنِ

Verses.Text: If only they had attempted the challenging path ˹of goodness instead˺!
Verses.Arabic: فَلَا ٱقۡتَحَمَ ٱلۡعَقَبَةَ

Verses.Text: And what will make you realize what ˹attempting˺ the challenging path is?
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡعَقَبَةُ

Verses.Text: It is to free a slave,
Verses.Arabic: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ

Verses.Text: or to give food in times of famine
Verses.Arabic: أَوۡ إِطۡعَٰمٞ فِي يَوۡمٖ ذِي مَسۡغَبَةٖ

Verses.Text: to an orphaned relative
Verses.Arabic: يَتِيمٗا ذَا مَقۡرَبَةٍ

Verses.Text: or to a poor person in distress,
Verses.Arabic: أَوۡ مِسۡكِينٗا ذَا مَتۡرَبَةٖ

Verses.Text: and—above all—to be one of those who have faith and urge each other to perseverance and urge each other to compassion.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡمَرۡحَمَةِ

Verses.Text: These are the people of the right.
Verses.Arabic: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَيۡمَنَةِ

Verses.Text: As for those who deny Our signs, they are the people of the left.
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ

Verses.Text: The Fire will be sealed over them.
Verses.Arabic: عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَارٞ مُّؤۡصَدَةُۢ

Verses.Text: By the sun and its brightness,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلشَّمۡسِ وَضُحَىٰهَا

Verses.Text: and the moon as it follows it,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَىٰهَا

Verses.Text: and the day as it unveils it,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّىٰهَا

Verses.Text: and the night as it conceals it!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشَىٰهَا

Verses.Text: And by heaven and ˹the One˺ Who built it,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا بَنَىٰهَا

Verses.Text: and the earth and ˹the One˺ Who spread it!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا طَحَىٰهَا

Verses.Text: And by the soul and ˹the One˺ Who fashioned it,
Verses.Arabic: وَنَفۡسٖ وَمَا سَوَّىٰهَا

Verses.Text: then with ˹the knowledge of˺ right and wrong inspired it!
Verses.Arabic: فَأَلۡهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقۡوَىٰهَا

Verses.Text: Successful indeed is the one who purifies their soul,
Verses.Arabic: قَدۡ أَفۡلَحَ مَن زَكَّىٰهَا

Verses.Text: and doomed is the one who corrupts it!
Verses.Arabic: وَقَدۡ خَابَ مَن دَسَّىٰهَا

Verses.Text: Thamûd rejected ˹the truth˺ out of arrogance,
Verses.Arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِطَغۡوَىٰهَآ

Verses.Text: when the most wicked of them was roused ˹to kill the she-camel˺.
Verses.Arabic: إِذِ ٱنۢبَعَثَ أَشۡقَىٰهَا

Verses.Text: But the messenger of Allah warned them, “˹Do not disturb˺ Allah’s camel and her ˹turn to˺ drink!”
Verses.Arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا

Verses.Text: Still they defied him and slaughtered her. So their Lord crushed them for their crime, levelling all to the ground.
Verses.Arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا

Verses.Text: He has no fear of consequences.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقۡبَٰهَا

Verses.Text: By the night when it covers,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا يَغۡشَىٰ

Verses.Text: and the day when it shines!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ

Verses.Text: And by ˹the One˺ Who created male and female!
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱلذَّكَرَ وَٱلۡأُنثَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Surely the ends you strive for are diverse.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ سَعۡيَكُمۡ لَشَتَّىٰ

Verses.Text: As for the one who is charitable, mindful ˹of Allah˺,
Verses.Arabic: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أَعۡطَىٰ وَٱتَّقَىٰ

Verses.Text: and ˹firmly˺ believes in the finest reward,
Verses.Arabic: وَصَدَّقَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ

Verses.Text: We will facilitate for them the Way of Ease.
Verses.Arabic: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡيُسۡرَىٰ

Verses.Text: And as for the one who is stingy, indifferent ˹to Allah˺,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۢ بَخِلَ وَٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰ

Verses.Text: and ˹staunchly˺ denies the finest reward,
Verses.Arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ

Verses.Text: We will facilitate for them the path of hardship.
Verses.Arabic: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُۥ لِلۡعُسۡرَىٰ

Verses.Text: And their wealth will be of no benefit to them when they tumble ˹into Hell˺.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ

Verses.Text: It is certainly upon Us ˹alone˺ to show ˹the way to˺ guidance.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ عَلَيۡنَا لَلۡهُدَىٰ

Verses.Text: And surely to Us ˹alone˺ belong this life and the next.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلۡأٓخِرَةَ وَٱلۡأُولَىٰ

Verses.Text: And so I have warned you of a raging Fire,
Verses.Arabic: فَأَنذَرۡتُكُمۡ نَارٗا تَلَظَّىٰ

Verses.Text: in which none will burn except the most wretched—
Verses.Arabic: لَا يَصۡلَىٰهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡأَشۡقَى

Verses.Text: who deny and turn away.
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ

Verses.Text: But the righteous will be spared from it—
Verses.Arabic: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا ٱلۡأَتۡقَى

Verses.Text: who donate ˹some of˺ their wealth only to purify themselves,
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِي يُؤۡتِي مَالَهُۥ يَتَزَكَّىٰ

Verses.Text: not in return for someone’s favours,
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةٖ تُجۡزَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: but seeking the pleasure of their Lord, the Most High.
Verses.Arabic: إِلَّا ٱبۡتِغَآءَ وَجۡهِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ

Verses.Text: They will certainly be pleased.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَسَوۡفَ يَرۡضَىٰ

Verses.Text: By the morning sunlight,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلضُّحَىٰ

Verses.Text: and the night when it falls still!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلَّيۡلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ

Verses.Text: Your Lord ˹O Prophet˺ has not abandoned you, nor has He become hateful ˹of you˺.
Verses.Arabic: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ

Verses.Text: And the next life is certainly far better for you than this one.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَلۡأٓخِرَةُ خَيۡرٞ لَّكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

Verses.Text: And ˹surely˺ your Lord will give so much to you that you will be pleased.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَسَوۡفَ يُعۡطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرۡضَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Did He not find you as an orphan then sheltered you?
Verses.Arabic: أَلَمۡ يَجِدۡكَ يَتِيمٗا فَـَٔاوَىٰ

Verses.Text: Did He not find you unguided then guided you?
Verses.Arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَآلّٗا فَهَدَىٰ

Verses.Text: And did He not find you needy then satisfied your needs?
Verses.Arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ عَآئِلٗا فَأَغۡنَىٰ

Verses.Text: So do not oppress the orphan,
Verses.Arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلۡيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقۡهَرۡ

Verses.Text: nor repulse the beggar.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلسَّآئِلَ فَلَا تَنۡهَرۡ

Verses.Text: And proclaim the blessings of your Lord.
Verses.Arabic: وَأَمَّا بِنِعۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثۡ

Verses.Text: Have We not uplifted your heart for you ˹O Prophet˺,
Verses.Arabic: أَلَمۡ نَشۡرَحۡ لَكَ صَدۡرَكَ

Verses.Text: relieved you of the burden
Verses.Arabic: وَوَضَعۡنَا عَنكَ وِزۡرَكَ

Verses.Text: which weighed so heavily on your back,
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنقَضَ ظَهۡرَكَ

Verses.Text: and elevated your renown for you?
Verses.Arabic: وَرَفَعۡنَا لَكَ ذِكۡرَكَ

Verses.Text: So, surely with hardship comes ease.
Verses.Arabic: فَإِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرًا

Verses.Text: Surely with ˹that˺ hardship comes ˹more˺ ease.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ مَعَ ٱلۡعُسۡرِ يُسۡرٗا

Verses.Text: So once you have fulfilled ˹your duty˺, strive ˹in devotion˺,
Verses.Arabic: فَإِذَا فَرَغۡتَ فَٱنصَبۡ

Verses.Text: turning to your Lord ˹alone˺ with hope.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَٱرۡغَب

Verses.Text: By the fig and the olive ˹of Jerusalem˺,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيۡتُونِ

Verses.Text: and Mount Sinai,
Verses.Arabic: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ

Verses.Text: and this secure city ˹of Mecca˺!
Verses.Arabic: وَهَٰذَا ٱلۡبَلَدِ ٱلۡأَمِينِ

Verses.Text: Indeed, We created humans in the best form.
Verses.Arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ

Verses.Text: But We will reduce them to the lowest of the low ˹in Hell˺,
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ رَدَدۡنَٰهُ أَسۡفَلَ سَٰفِلِينَ

Verses.Text: except those who believe and do good—they will have a never-ending reward.
Verses.Arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ

Verses.Text: Now, what makes you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment?
Verses.Arabic: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعۡدُ بِٱلدِّينِ

Verses.Text: Is Allah not the most just of all judges?
Verses.Arabic: أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَحۡكَمِ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ

Verses.Text: Read, ˹O Prophet,˺ in the Name of your Lord Who created—
Verses.Arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ بِٱسۡمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ

Verses.Text: created humans from a clinging clot.
Verses.Arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِنۡ عَلَقٍ

Verses.Text: Read! And your Lord is the Most Generous,
Verses.Arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡأَكۡرَمُ

Verses.Text: Who taught by the pen—
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِٱلۡقَلَمِ

Verses.Text: taught humanity what they knew not.
Verses.Arabic: عَلَّمَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مَا لَمۡ يَعۡلَمۡ

Verses.Text: Most certainly, one exceeds all bounds
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَيَطۡغَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: once they think they are self-sufficient.
Verses.Arabic: أَن رَّءَاهُ ٱسۡتَغۡنَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: ˹But˺ surely to your Lord is the return ˹of all˺.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ٱلرُّجۡعَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Have you seen the man who prevents
Verses.Arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي يَنۡهَىٰ

Verses.Text: a servant ˹of Ours˺ from praying?
Verses.Arabic: عَبۡدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰٓ

Verses.Text: What if this ˹servant˺ is ˹rightly˺ guided,
Verses.Arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: or encourages righteousness?
Verses.Arabic: أَوۡ أَمَرَ بِٱلتَّقۡوَىٰٓ

Verses.Text: What if that ˹man˺ persists in denial and turns away?
Verses.Arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰٓ

Verses.Text: Does he not know that Allah sees ˹all˺?
Verses.Arabic: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَم بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرَىٰ

Verses.Text: But no! If he does not desist, We will certainly drag him by the forelock—
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

Verses.Text: a lying, sinful forelock.
Verses.Arabic: نَاصِيَةٖ كَٰذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٖ

Verses.Text: So let him call his associates.
Verses.Arabic: فَلۡيَدۡعُ نَادِيَهُۥ

Verses.Text: We will call the wardens of Hell.
Verses.Arabic: سَنَدۡعُ ٱلزَّبَانِيَةَ

Verses.Text: Again, no! Never obey him ˹O Prophet˺! Rather, ˹continue to˺ prostrate and draw near ˹to Allah˺.
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعۡهُ وَٱسۡجُدۡۤ وَٱقۡتَرِب۩

Verses.Text: Indeed, ˹it is˺ We ˹Who˺ sent this ˹Quran˺ down on the Night of Glory.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ

Verses.Text: And what will make you realize what the Night of Glory is?
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ

Verses.Text: The Night of Glory is better than a thousand months.
Verses.Arabic: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ

Verses.Text: That night the angels and the ˹holy˺ spirit descend, by the permission of their Lord, for every ˹decreed˺ matter.
Verses.Arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ

Verses.Text: It is all peace until the break of dawn.
Verses.Arabic: سَلَٰمٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطۡلَعِ ٱلۡفَجۡرِ

Verses.Text: The disbelievers from the People of the Book and the polytheists were not going to desist ˹from disbelief˺ until the clear proof came to them:
Verses.Arabic: لَمۡ يَكُنِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ

Verses.Text: a messenger from Allah, reciting scrolls of ˹utmost˺ purity,
Verses.Arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

Verses.Text: containing upright commandments.
Verses.Arabic: فِيهَا كُتُبٞ قَيِّمَةٞ

Verses.Text: It was not until this clear proof came to the People of the Book that they became divided ˹about his prophethood˺—
Verses.Arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلۡبَيِّنَةُ

Verses.Text: even though they were only commanded to worship Allah ˹alone˺ with sincere devotion to Him in all uprightness, establish prayer, and pay alms-tax. That is the upright Way.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓاْ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ حُنَفَآءَ وَيُقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَيُؤۡتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ ٱلۡقَيِّمَةِ

Verses.Text: Indeed, those who disbelieve from the People of the Book and the polytheists will be in the Fire of Hell, to stay there forever. They are the worst of ˹all˺ beings.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ شَرُّ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ

Verses.Text: Indeed, those who believe and do good—they are the best of ˹all˺ beings.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ

Verses.Text: Their reward with their Lord will be Gardens of Eternity, under which rivers flow, to stay there for ever and ever. Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. This is ˹only˺ for those in awe of their Lord.
Verses.Arabic: جَزَآؤُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّـٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ رَّضِيَ ٱللَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُواْ عَنۡهُۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُۥ

Verses.Text: When the earth is shaken ˹in˺ its ultimate quaking,
Verses.Arabic: إِذَا زُلۡزِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ زِلۡزَالَهَا

Verses.Text: and when the earth throws out ˹all˺ its contents,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَخۡرَجَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ أَثۡقَالَهَا

Verses.Text: and humanity cries, “What is wrong with it?”—
Verses.Arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا لَهَا

Verses.Text: on that Day the earth will recount everything,
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُحَدِّثُ أَخۡبَارَهَا

Verses.Text: having been inspired by your Lord ˹to do so˺.
Verses.Arabic: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوۡحَىٰ لَهَا

Verses.Text: On that Day people will proceed in separate groups to be shown ˹the consequences of˺ their deeds.
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

Verses.Text: So whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it.
Verses.Arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ

Verses.Text: And whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.
Verses.Arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ

Verses.Text: ’ By the galloping, panting horses,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡعَٰدِيَٰتِ ضَبۡحٗا

Verses.Text: striking sparks of fire ˹with their hoofs˺,
Verses.Arabic: فَٱلۡمُورِيَٰتِ قَدۡحٗا

Verses.Text: launching raids at dawn,
Verses.Arabic: فَٱلۡمُغِيرَٰتِ صُبۡحٗا

Verses.Text: stirring up ˹clouds of˺ dust,
Verses.Arabic: فَأَثَرۡنَ بِهِۦ نَقۡعٗا

Verses.Text: and penetrating into the heart of enemy lines!
Verses.Arabic: فَوَسَطۡنَ بِهِۦ جَمۡعًا

Verses.Text: Surely humankind is ungrateful to their Lord—
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لِرَبِّهِۦ لَكَنُودٞ

Verses.Text: and they certainly attest to this—
Verses.Arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٞ

Verses.Text: and they are truly extreme in their love of ˹worldly˺ gains.
Verses.Arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لِحُبِّ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ لَشَدِيدٌ

Verses.Text: Do they not know that when the contents of the graves will be spilled out,
Verses.Arabic: ۞أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

Verses.Text: and the secrets of the hearts will be laid bare—
Verses.Arabic: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ

Verses.Text: surely their Lord is All-Aware of them on that Day.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّخَبِيرُۢ

Verses.Text: The Striking Disaster!
Verses.Arabic: ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ

Verses.Text: What is the Striking Disaster?
Verses.Arabic: مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ

Verses.Text: And what will make you realize what the Striking Disaster is?
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡقَارِعَةُ

Verses.Text: ˹It is˺ the Day people will be like scattered moths,
Verses.Arabic: يَوۡمَ يَكُونُ ٱلنَّاسُ كَٱلۡفَرَاشِ ٱلۡمَبۡثُوثِ

Verses.Text: and the mountains will be like carded wool.
Verses.Arabic: وَتَكُونُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ كَٱلۡعِهۡنِ ٱلۡمَنفُوشِ

Verses.Text: So as for those whose scale is heavy ˹with good deeds˺,
Verses.Arabic: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ

Verses.Text: they will be in a life of bliss.
Verses.Arabic: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٖ رَّاضِيَةٖ

Verses.Text: And as for those whose scale is light,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَوَٰزِينُهُۥ

Verses.Text: their home will be the abyss.
Verses.Arabic: فَأُمُّهُۥ هَاوِيَةٞ

Verses.Text: And what will make you realize what that is?
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا هِيَهۡ

Verses.Text: ˹It is˺ a scorching Fire.
Verses.Arabic: نَارٌ حَامِيَةُۢ

Verses.Text: Competition for more ˹gains˺ diverts you ˹from Allah˺,
Verses.Arabic: أَلۡهَىٰكُمُ ٱلتَّكَاثُرُ

Verses.Text: until you end up in ˹your˺ graves.
Verses.Arabic: حَتَّىٰ زُرۡتُمُ ٱلۡمَقَابِرَ

Verses.Text: But no! You will soon come to know.
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ

Verses.Text: Again, no! You will soon come to know.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, if you were to know ˹your fate˺ with certainty, ˹you would have acted differently˺.
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّا لَوۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ عِلۡمَ ٱلۡيَقِينِ

Verses.Text: ˹But˺ you will surely see the Hellfire.
Verses.Arabic: لَتَرَوُنَّ ٱلۡجَحِيمَ

Verses.Text: Again, you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيۡنَ ٱلۡيَقِينِ

Verses.Text: Then, on that Day, you will definitely be questioned about ˹your worldly˺ pleasures.
Verses.Arabic: ثُمَّ لَتُسۡـَٔلُنَّ يَوۡمَئِذٍ عَنِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

Verses.Text: By the ˹passage of˺ time!
Verses.Arabic: وَٱلۡعَصۡرِ

Verses.Text: Surely humanity is in ˹grave˺ loss,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَفِي خُسۡرٍ

Verses.Text: except those who have faith, do good, and urge each other to the truth, and urge each other to perseverance.
Verses.Arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ

Verses.Text: Woe to every backbiter, slanderer,
Verses.Arabic: وَيۡلٞ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٖ لُّمَزَةٍ

Verses.Text: who amasses wealth ˹greedily˺ and counts it ˹repeatedly˺,
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالٗا وَعَدَّدَهُۥ

Verses.Text: thinking that their wealth will make them immortal!
Verses.Arabic: يَحۡسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُۥٓ أَخۡلَدَهُۥ

Verses.Text: Not at all! Such a person will certainly be tossed into the Crusher.
Verses.Arabic: كَلَّاۖ لَيُنۢبَذَنَّ فِي ٱلۡحُطَمَةِ

Verses.Text: And what will make you realize what the Crusher is?
Verses.Arabic: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا ٱلۡحُطَمَةُ

Verses.Text: ˹It is˺ Allah’s kindled Fire,
Verses.Arabic: نَارُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمُوقَدَةُ

Verses.Text: which rages over the hearts.
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى ٱلۡأَفۡـِٔدَةِ

Verses.Text: It will be sealed over them,
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّهَا عَلَيۡهِم مُّؤۡصَدَةٞ

Verses.Text: ˹tightly secured˺ with long braces.
Verses.Arabic: فِي عَمَدٖ مُّمَدَّدَةِۭ

Verses.Text: Have you not seen ˹O Prophet˺ how your Lord dealt with the Army of the Elephant?
Verses.Arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ

Verses.Text: Did He not frustrate their scheme?
Verses.Arabic: أَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡ كَيۡدَهُمۡ فِي تَضۡلِيلٖ

Verses.Text: For He sent against them flocks of birds,
Verses.Arabic: وَأَرۡسَلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ طَيۡرًا أَبَابِيلَ

Verses.Text: that pelted them with stones of baked clay,
Verses.Arabic: تَرۡمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٖ مِّن سِجِّيلٖ

Verses.Text: leaving them like chewed up straw.
Verses.Arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ كَعَصۡفٖ مَّأۡكُولِۭ

Verses.Text: ˹At least˺ for ˹the favour of˺ making Quraysh habitually secure—
Verses.Arabic: لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيۡشٍ

Verses.Text: secure in their trading caravan ˹to Yemen˺ in the winter and ˹Syria˺ in the summer—
Verses.Arabic: إِۦلَٰفِهِمۡ رِحۡلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيۡفِ

Verses.Text: let them worship the Lord of this ˹Sacred˺ House,
Verses.Arabic: فَلۡيَعۡبُدُواْ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡبَيۡتِ

Verses.Text: Who has fed them against hunger and made them secure against fear.
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

Verses.Text: Have you seen the one who denies the ˹final˺ Judgment?
Verses.Arabic: أَرَءَيۡتَ ٱلَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِٱلدِّينِ

Verses.Text: That is the one who repulses the orphan,
Verses.Arabic: فَذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِي يَدُعُّ ٱلۡيَتِيمَ

Verses.Text: and does not encourage the feeding of the poor.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ ٱلۡمِسۡكِينِ

Verses.Text: So woe to those ˹hypocrites˺ who pray
Verses.Arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُصَلِّينَ

Verses.Text: yet are unmindful of their prayers;
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَن صَلَاتِهِمۡ سَاهُونَ

Verses.Text: those who ˹only˺ show off,
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ يُرَآءُونَ

Verses.Text: and refuse to give ˹even the simplest˺ aid.
Verses.Arabic: وَيَمۡنَعُونَ ٱلۡمَاعُونَ

Verses.Text: Indeed, We have granted you ˹O Prophet˺ abundant goodness.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّآ أَعۡطَيۡنَٰكَ ٱلۡكَوۡثَرَ

Verses.Text: So pray and sacrifice to your Lord ˹alone˺.
Verses.Arabic: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَٱنۡحَرۡ

Verses.Text: Only the one who hates you is truly cut off ˹from any goodness˺.
Verses.Arabic: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ ٱلۡأَبۡتَرُ

Verses.Text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “O you disbelievers!
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

Verses.Text: I do not worship what you worship,
Verses.Arabic: لَآ أَعۡبُدُ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

Verses.Text: nor do you worship what I worship.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعۡبُدُ

Verses.Text: I will never worship what you worship,
Verses.Arabic: وَلَآ أَنَا۠ عَابِدٞ مَّا عَبَدتُّمۡ

Verses.Text: nor will you ever worship what I worship.
Verses.Arabic: وَلَآ أَنتُمۡ عَٰبِدُونَ مَآ أَعۡبُدُ

Verses.Text: You have your way, and I have my Way.”
Verses.Arabic: لَكُمۡ دِينُكُمۡ وَلِيَ دِينِ

Verses.Text: When Allah’s ˹ultimate˺ help comes and the victory ˹over Mecca is achieved˺,
Verses.Arabic: إِذَا جَآءَ نَصۡرُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡفَتۡحُ

Verses.Text: and you ˹O Prophet˺ see the people embracing Allah’s Way in crowds,
Verses.Arabic: وَرَأَيۡتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدۡخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفۡوَاجٗا

Verses.Text: then glorify the praises of your Lord and seek His forgiveness, for certainly He is ever Accepting of Repentance.
Verses.Arabic: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا

Verses.Text: May the hands of Abu Lahab perish, and he ˹himself˺ perish!
Verses.Arabic: تَبَّتۡ يَدَآ أَبِي لَهَبٖ وَتَبَّ

Verses.Text: Neither his wealth nor ˹worldly˺ gains will benefit him.
Verses.Arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

Verses.Text: He will burn in a flaming Fire,
Verses.Arabic: سَيَصۡلَىٰ نَارٗا ذَاتَ لَهَبٖ

Verses.Text: and ˹so will˺ his wife, the carrier of ˹thorny˺ kindling,
Verses.Arabic: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ حَمَّالَةَ ٱلۡحَطَبِ

Verses.Text: around her neck will be a rope of palm-fibre.
Verses.Arabic: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبۡلٞ مِّن مَّسَدِۭ

Verses.Text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “He is Allah—One ˹and Indivisible˺;
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ

Verses.Text: Allah—the Sustainer ˹needed by all˺.
Verses.Arabic: ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ

Verses.Text: He has never had offspring, nor was He born.
Verses.Arabic: لَمۡ يَلِدۡ وَلَمۡ يُولَدۡ

Verses.Text: And there is none comparable to Him.”
Verses.Arabic: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدُۢ

Verses.Text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I seek refuge in the Lord of the daybreak
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلۡفَلَقِ

Verses.Text: from the evil of whatever He has created,
Verses.Arabic: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ

Verses.Text: and from the evil of the night when it grows dark,
Verses.Arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ

Verses.Text: and from the evil of those ˹witches casting spells by˺ blowing onto knots,
Verses.Arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّـٰثَٰتِ فِي ٱلۡعُقَدِ

Verses.Text: and from the evil of an envier when they envy.”
Verses.Arabic: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ

Verses.Text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I seek refuge in the Lord of humankind,
Verses.Arabic: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ

Verses.Text: the Master of humankind,
Verses.Arabic: مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ

Verses.Text: the God of humankind,
Verses.Arabic: إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ

Verses.Text: from the evil of the lurking whisperer—
Verses.Arabic: مِن شَرِّ ٱلۡوَسۡوَاسِ ٱلۡخَنَّاسِ

Verses.Text: who whispers into the hearts of humankind—
Verses.Arabic: ٱلَّذِي يُوَسۡوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ

Verses.Text: from among jinn and humankind.”
Verses.Arabic: مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
